yin no/ /bram ze dang khyim bdag dag lnga po 'di dag ni bag yod pa'i phan yon yin te/ lnga gang zhe na/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dag bag yod pa bag yod pa la gnas pa'i rgyus longs spyod chen po las nyams par
mi 'gyur te/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dag bag yod pa bag yod pa la gnas pa'i rgyus longs spyod chen po las nyams par mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa 'di ni bag yod pa'i phan yon dang po yin no/ /bram ze dang
khyim bdag dag gzhan yang bag yod pa bag yod pa la gnas pa'i rgyus phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su dge ba dang / grags pa dang / sgra dang / tshigs su bcad pa rgya chen po grags par 'gyur te/

bram ze dang khyim bdag dag bag yod pa bag yod pa la gnas pa'i rgyus phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su dge ba dang / grags pa dang / sgra dang / tshigs su bcad pa rgya chen po grags par 'gyur ba gang yin pa 'di ni bag yod pa'i

phan yon gnyis pa yin no/ /bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gzhan yang bag yod pa bag yod pa la gnas pa'i rgyus rgyal rigs kyi 'khor du'ang rung / bram ze'i 'khor du'ang rung / khyim bdag gi 'khor du'ang rung / dge sbyong gi 'khor

du'ang rung / 'khor gang dang gang du 'gro ba'i 'khor de dang der zhum zhum po ma yin pa dang / dga' ba dang bag tsha ba med pas 'gro bar 'gyur te/ /bram ze dang khyim bdag dag bag yod pa bag yod pa la gnas pa'i rgyus zhes bya ba

nas/ bag tsha ba med pa zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du gang yin pa 'di ni bag yod pa'i phan yon gsum pa yin no/ /bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gzhan yang bag yod pa bag yod pa la gnas pa'i rgyus yid la gcags pa
med par 'chi bar 'gyur te/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dag bag yod pa bag yod pa la gnas pa'i rgyus yid la gcags pa med par 'chi bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa 'di ni bag yod pa'i phan yon bzhi pa yin no/ /

bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gzhan yang bag yod pa bag yod pa la gnas pa'i rgyus lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur te/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dag bag yod pa bag yod

pa la gnas pa'i rgyus lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa 'di ni bag yod pa'i phan yon lnga pa yin no/ /de nas dmar bu can gyi grong gi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams

stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi gnas su do mod bzhugs

par gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dmar bu can gyi grong gi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / / de nas dmar bu can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig

nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ngo / /ma ga d+ha'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed kyis dge sbyong gau ta ma ma ga d+ha'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na dmar bu

can gyi grong du gshegs nas dmar bu can gyi grong gi dmar bu can gyi mchod rten na bzhugs te/ de la dmar bu can gyi grong gi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis bkur sti byas so zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang rta rgod ma dang ldan

pa'i shing rta thams cad nas dkar ba'i nang du zhugs nas gser gyi khar ba dang ril ba spyi blugs thogs te bram ze'i khye'u yi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing / bram ze'i khye'u yi tshogs kyis mdun gyis bltas nas dmar bu can

gyi grong nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir song ngo / /de ji tsam bzhon pa'i sa'i bar du bzhon pas song nas bzhon pa las babs te rkang pas kun dga' ra bar zhugs nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba

der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig mngon du yang dag par dga' ba dang / yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan

'das kyis ma ga d+ha'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/ yang dag par gzeng bstod par mdzad/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/ yang dag par rab

tu dga' bar mdzad de/ rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par gzeng bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo / /de nas ma ga d+ha'i

sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gau

ta ma dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ma ga d+ha'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed la cang mi gsung bas gnang

ngo / /de nas ma ga d+ha'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed kyis bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ma ga d+ha'i sna chen po la gtogs

pa bram ze dbyar byed song nas ring po ma lon par thugs su chud nas 'dug gnas gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas/ 'dug gnas kyi phyi rol du zhabs gnyis bkrus te 'dug gnas su zhugs nas gdan bshams pa nyid la

bzhugs te/ dkyil mo dkrung bcas nas sku drang por bsrang ste dgongs pa mngon du phyogs par bzhag go/ /bcom ldan 'das 'dug gnas na nyin par gyi gnas pas bzhugs pa na lha'i spyan rnam par dag pa mi'i las

'phags pas dmar bu can gyi grong na mthu che ba mthu che ba'i lha rnams gnas kyis 'bre ba gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang dgongs ka nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs te 'dug gnas nas byung nas/ 'dug gnas kyi grib ma la dge

slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis dmar bu can gyi grong gi grong khyer rtsig

par brtson pa su yin ci thos/ btsun pa bdag gis ma ga d+ha'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed lags par thos so/ /kun dga' bo legs so/ /legs so/ /ma ga d+ha'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar

byed ni mkhas pa yin te/ 'di ltar sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang lhan cig bgros pa lta zhig /kun dga' bo 'di na nga 'dug gnas na nyin par gyi gnas pas bzhugs pa na lha'i spyan rnam par dag pa mi'i las 'das pas dmar bu can

gyi grong na mthu che ba mthu che ba'i lha rnams gnas kyis 'bre ba gzigs so/ /kun dga' bo phyogs gang du mthu che ba mthu che ba'i lha rnams kyis gnas kyi sa bres pa'i phyogs der 'di lta ste/ gnas kyi phyir mthu che ba mthu che ba'i mi rnams

kyi sems gzhol bar 'gyur ro/ /phyogs gang du lha bar ma dang phal pas gnas kyi sa bres pa'i phyogs der ni 'di lta ste/ gnas kyi phyir mi bar ma dang phal pa rnams kyi sems gzhol bar 'gyur ro/ kun dga' bo phyogs 'dir

ni mthu che ba mthu che ba'i lha rnams kyis gnas kyi sa bres pas phyogs 'dir 'di lta ste/ gnas kyi phyir dbang che ba dbang che bar grags pa'i mi rnams kyi sems gzhol bar 'gyur te/ kun dga' bo ya rabs kyi gnas dang / ya

rabs kyi tha snyad ji snyed pa dang / zong 'grems pa rnams kyi nang na yang 'di lta ste/ dmar bu can gyi grong khyer 'di mchog tu 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo 'di la bar chad gsum 'byung bar rig par bya ste/ me dang / chu dang / nang 'khrug gis so/ /

de nas ma ga d+ha'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed kyis de nyid kyi nub mo nas gtsang zhing bsod pa zhes bya ba nas/ phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin te/ gser gyi bya ma bum

thogs te gsol ba 'debs shing spyan sngar 'dug go/ /'di skad ces kyang gsol te/ kye gau ta ma sbyin pa 'di las bsod nams kyi rgyu 'thun pa dang / dge ba'i rgyu 'thun pa dang / bde ba'i gzhi ci mchis pa de dmar bu can na

gnas pa'i lha rnams kyi yun ring po'i don dang / phan pa dang bde ba'i slad du yon bsngo ba mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gang zag dad pa can/ /gang zhig lha rnams mchod

byed pa/ /ston pa'i bka' bzhin byed pa ste/ /de ni sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsngags/ /mkhas shing yid ni gzhungs pa yis/ /gang gi phyogs su gnas 'cha' ba/ /tshul khrims ldan pa bshos gsol nas/ /de yi 'og tu

yon bsngo bya/ /de rnams rjed pas rjed 'gyur zhing / /mchod pas kyang ni mchod par 'gyur/ /de nas lto nas byung ba yi/ /bu la ma bzhin 'di la brtse/ /lha rnams brtse ba'i skyes bus ni/ /bde ba bzang po mthong bar 'gyur/ /

de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ma ga d+ha'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam yang dag par bstan yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par gzeng bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar

mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so/ /de nas ma ga d+ha'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed kyis der rgyu lhag gang yin pa de thams cad sbyin par btang nas bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes bzhin rjes bzhin du 'brang zhing /

'di snyam du sems kyis sems la mngon par 'du byed de/ bcom ldan 'das gau ta ma dmar bu can gyi grong gi sgo gang nas phyir gshegs pa de ni bdag gis gau ta ma'i sgo zhes gdags so/ /chu bo gang gA'i 'jug ngogs gang nas rgal ba

de yang gau ta ma'i 'jug ngogs zhes gdags so snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis ma ga d+ha'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed kyi bsam pa mkhyen nas/ dmar bu can gyi grong gi dbus thog thag /

gshegs nas byang phyogs su rgyu ste/ chu bo gang gA gang na bar gshegs so/ /de nas lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra 'di snyam du sems te/ ma la bdag nyid kho nas bcom ldan 'das mchod pa bya ba la lhag par

spro bar bya'o snyam du bsams nas/ rtsibs brgya dang ldan pa'i gdugs lnga brgya bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi steng du bzung ba dang / yangs pa can gyi lid tsa bi rnams kyis bsams pa/ lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma

skyes dgra 'di bcom ldan 'das mchod pa la rang nyid lhag par spro bar gyur na/ ci'i phyir na bdag cag gis spro bar mi bya snyam nas de rnams kyis kyang rtsibs brgya dang ldan pa'i gdugs lnga brgya bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi steng du

bzung ngo / /klu rnams kyis bsams pa/ re shig mi 'di rnams bcom ldan 'das mchod pa bya ba la lhag par spro bar gyur na/ bdag cag klu rnams ni rnam par lhung ba'i lus can yin na ci'i phyir bdag cag spro bar mi bya snyam nas/ de dag

gis kyang rtsibs brgya dang ldan pa'i gdugs lnga brgya bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi steng du bzung ngo / /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis bsams pa/ re shig mi bsod nams mngon sum du ma mthong ba 'di dag kyang

bcom ldan 'das mchod pa bya ba la lhag par spro bar gyur na/ mngon sum du mthong ba bdag cag gis lta ci'i phyir spro bar mi bya snyam nas/ de rnams kyis kyang rtsibs brgya dang ldan pa'i lha'i gdugs lnga brgya bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i

gtsug gi steng du bzung ngo / /sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyis bsams pa/ lha dang mi 'di rnams bcom ldan 'das mchod pa bya ba la spro bar gyur na/ bdag cag gis ci'i phyir spro bar mi bya snyam nas/ de dag gis kyang rtsibs

brgya dang ldan pa'i gdugs lnga brgya bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi steng du bzung ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ ji ltar 'di dag phyir zhing dad pa mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur ba de ltar byin gyis brlab bo snyam nas de nas

bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar re re'i yid la bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi steng na bdag gdugs 'dzin to snyam pa de ltar byin gyis brlabs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa la gdugs nyis

stong lnga brgya lha dang mi rnams kyis steng du bzung ngo / /dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phrin las ci zhig mdzad na/ des na bcom ldan 'das mngon par

rdzogs par byang chub pa la gdugs nyis stong lnga brgya lha dang mi rnams kyis dbu'i gtsug gi steng du bzung bar gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis sngon gyi

tshe rabs gzhan na las byas shing bsags pa tshogs rnyed pa zhes bya ba nas/ lus can rnams la 'bras bur 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhir

rnam par rgyal ba chos dang ldan pa/ chos kyi rgyal po rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa legs mthong chen po zhes bya ba byung ste/ rgyal po de la bu stong du gcig gis ma tshang ba zhig yod do/ /rgyal po de'i kun du spyod pa ni bu btsas

shing btsas pa dag phyi bzhin khrid de 'khyam par byed do/ /btsun mo rnams kyis bsams pa/ rgyal po 'di'i kun du spyod pa ni sras btsas shing btsas pa dag phyi bzhin khrid nas 'khyam par mdzad pas bdag cag bu yod

bzhin du bu med pa dang 'dras/ da ni nang khrims zhig bca' ste/ gal te bdag cag las 'ga' zhig sems can dang ldan par gyur na/ des rgyal po la gdas par mi bya'o zhes bcas so/ /ji tsam na btsun mo zhig sems

can dang ldan par gyur nas/ de dag gis phyogs dben pa zhig tu bzhag ste/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das pa dang khye'u gzugs bzang ba/ blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa/ lpags pa'i mdog gser 'dra ba mgo gdugs lta bu/

lag pa ring ba/ 'phral ba'i dbyes che ba/ smin ma 'jar ba sna'i gzangs mtho ba/ yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas so/ /ji tsam na chen por gyur pa dang btsun mo de dag thams cad khye'u de la bu'i sdug pa skyes so// //

'dul ba gzhi/ bam po nyi shu bdun pa/ de nas dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po legs mthong chen po shar gyi lus 'phags kyi gling nas rin po che sna bdun gyis sna drangs shing khams kyi rgyal phran stong gis yongs su bskor te bu stong du gcig

gis ma tshang bas zla ba kham pa lta bur bskor nas/ gzi brjid nyi ma'i 'od zer stong bas lhag par spa zhing 'ong ba gzhon nu khang bzangs kyi steng na 'dug pa des mthong nas/ des ma la dris/ yum mchi ba pha bi su lags/ bu khyod kyi yab rgyal

po legs mthong chen po yin no/ /yum de 'das na bdag rgyal por 'gyur ram/ bu rgyal po de'i sras stong du gcig gis ma tshang ba zhig yod pa de dag thams cad kyi phu bo gang yin pa de de 'das na rgyal por 'gyur na khyod ni thams cad kyi nu bo yin no/ /

des smras pa/ yum gal te de 'das na bdag rgyal por mi 'gyur na gnang bar mdzod cig dang / bdag dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar bgyi'o/ /btsun mo de dag thams cad kyis smras pa/ bu khyod la bdag

cag gis bu'i sdug pa nyams su myong gis de ltar ma byed cig /yum gdon mi 'tshal bar rab tu 'byung bar bgyi'o/ /de dag gis de gdon mi za bar gal gyis 'chu bar shes nas smras pa/ bu gal te de lta na dam zhig bcas nas gnang bar

bya ste/ gang yang khyod kyis yon tan gyi tshogs cung zad rtogs na de khyod kyis bdag cag la smros shig /de bzhin du bgyi'o/ /de de dag gis gnang nas des mtha' gcig tu song ste/ mkhan po dang slob dpon med par byang chub kyi

phyogs sum bcu rtsa bdun gyi chos bskyed nas rang byang chub mngon sum du byas so/ /rang sangs rgyas des bsams pa/ bdag gis ma de rnams la khas blangs pa smra dgos pas song la sngon gyi dam bcas pa mthar dbyung ngo snyam nas/

bdag nyid chen po de dag ni ngag gis chos mi ston gyi lus kyis yin pas des de rnams kyi mdun du 'bar ba dang / gsal ba dang / char 'bebs pa dang / glog 'byin pa dag gi cho 'phrul dag bya bar brtsams so/ /so so'i skye bo ni rdzu 'phrul la

myur du sems gtod pa yin pas de dag shing rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas smras pa/ 'phags pa khyod kyis yon tan gyi tshogs 'di lta bu rtogs sam/ rtogs so/ /'phags pa khyod ni bsod snyoms bzhed pa

lags la/ bdag cag kyang bsod nams 'tshal ba lags na/ khyod 'di nyid du bskyed mos tshal du bzhugs shig /bdag cag gis rgyun du bsod snyoms dbul bar bgyi'o/ /rang sangs rgyas de khas blangs nas de dag gis

rang sangs rgyas la bsod snyoms kyis bkur stir bya bar brtsams so/ /rang sangs rgyas des bsams pa/ bdag gi lus rnag can 'dis bya ba gang yin pa de ni byas kyis/ ma la bdag phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su

'jug go snyam nas/ de nas de ngang pa'i rgyal po 'dab ma brgyang ba ltar steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas 'bar ba dang / gsal ba dang / char 'bebs pa dang / glog 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul dag kyang bstan nas phung po lhag ma med pa'i

mya ngan las 'das pa zhi ba'i dbyings su zhugs so/ /de nas de dag gis shing dri zhim po thams cad spungs te/ spungs nas bsregs te me'i phung po de 'o mas bsad nas rus pa de dag gser gyi bum pa'i nang du bcug ste/ bskyed mos

tshal de nyid du rus pa'i mchod rten brtsigs te mgul gdub dang / gdu bu rgyan can dang / gzhan yang rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan cing gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag btsugs so/ /de nas dus gzhan zhig na rgyal

po legs mthong chen po btsun mo'i 'khor gyis bskor nas so ka'i dus la bab pa na me tog gi shing rnams kha 'bus shing ngang pa dang / krung krung dang / rma bya dang / ne tso dang / ri skegs dang / bya ko ki la dang / shang shang de'u skad 'byin pa'i tshal

gseb tu bskyed mos tshal gyis gzhir song nas/ de bskyed mos tshal na 'khyam pa las dgra bcom pa'i mchod rten de mthong ngo / /de nas bskyed mos tshal srung ba'i mi la smras pa/ kwa'i nang rje 'di ci yin/ des smras pa/ lha bdag gis

ni ma 'tshal te/ 'on kyang 'di'i don ni btsun mos 'tshal to/ /de nas des btsun mo'i 'khor rnams la smras pa dang / de dag gis rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/ lha mi 'jigs pa stsal du gsol/ des smras pa/ de bzhin du sbyin no/ /

de dag gis skabs de rgyas par smras pa dang rgyal pos smras pa/ khyed cag gis bu rgyal srid la mngon par dga' na de kho bo la ma gsol ba bzang po ma yin pa zhig byas so/ /gal te gsol bar gyur pa dang kho bo de kho na la rgyal srid dbang bskur bar 'gyur ba

zhig /'on kyang ngas bdag nyid chen po de mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa gdugs dang / cod pan dang / thor tshugs gdags so zhes de nas des bu la byams pas rang sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten de la gdugs dang / cod pan dang / thor tshugs rnams

btags so/ /dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rgyal po chen po legs mthong gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/ /gang yang ngas de na bu la byams pas rang sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten de la gdugs dang / cod pan dang / thor tshugs btags

te/ las de'i rnam par smin pas ngas 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po nyis stong lnga brgya byas so/ /las de kho na'i lhag mas da ltar nga mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa na lha dang mi rnams kyis rtsibs brgya dang ldan pa'i gdugs nyis stong

lnga brgya dbu'i gtsug gi steng du bzung bar gyur to/ /gal te ngas yon tan gyi tshogs 'di lta bu rtogs par ma gyur na gzhan du yang ngas 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po nyis stong lnga brgya byed par 'gyur ro/ /de lta bas na nga'i bsod nams kyi rnam

par smin pa can gang yin pa de ngas nyan thos rnams kyi longs spyod du rnam par smin par bsngos te/ gal te mu tig bre gang gis 'bras bre gang khugs kyang 'on kyang nga'i nyan thos rnams ni bsod snyoms kyis phongs par mi 'gyur ro/ /

dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la zhes bya ba nas btsal bar bya ste/ dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /

bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras gru zam 'jugs

su bcug pa dang / yangs pa can gyi lid tsa bi rnams kyis kyang de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gru zam btsugs so/ /klu rnams kyis bsams pa/ bdag cag klu rnams ni rnam par ltung ba'i lus can yin pas/ ma la

bdag cag gis gdengs ka'i zam pas bcom ldan 'das chu bo gang gA bsgral bar bya'o snyam nas de rnams kyis gdengs ka'i zam pa btsugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong

dag khyed cag las gang zhig lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i gru zam las chu bo gang gA rgal bar spro ba de ni de las rgol cig /gang zhig yangs pa can gyi lid tsa bi rnams kyis gru zam btsugs pa

las spro ba gang yin pa de yang de las rgol cig /nga yang dge slong kun dga' bo dang thabs gcig klu rnams kyi gdengs ka'i zam pa las chu bo gang gA brgal bar bya'o/ /de na kha cig ni lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po

ma skyes dgra'i gru zam las rgal to/ /kha cig ni yangs pa can gyi lid tsa bi rnams kyi gru zam las rgol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang thabs cig tu klu rnams kyi gdengs ka'i zam pa las

rgal to/ /de nas dge bsnyen zhig gis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ kha cig zam pa btsugs nas chu bran bor te rgya mtsho rgal/ /skye bo rnams ni gzings 'cha' mkhas pa'i skye bo rnams chu rgal/ /sangs rgyas

bcom ldan 'das bram ze rgal bar gyur nas skam la bzhugs/ /dge slong dag 'dir khrus byed nyan thos rnams ni gzings 'cha'o/ /gal te kun na chu yod na/ /khron pa'i chus ni ci zhig bya/ /sred pa'i rtsa ba bcad nas ni/ /

su zhig spyod pa tshol bar byed/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis sa phyogs gzhan zhig na mtho zhing mtho ba'i sa phyogs zhig gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod rgyal po

sgra chen 'dzin gyi lha'i mchod sdong srid du 'dom stong yod la sboms su 'dom drug bcu yod pa/ thams cad gser las byas pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa zhig yod de/ sbyin pa dag byin/ bsod nams dag byas nas chu bo

gang gA'i nang du bor ba gang yin pa de lta bar 'dod dam/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ba'i dus la bab lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa de'i tshod la bab lags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gang mchod sdong de bsgreng na dge slong rnams lta

bar 'gyur lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor lo dang bkra shis dang / g.yung drung 'khyil pa dang / dra bas 'brel ba/ bsod nams brgya phrag du mas bskyed pa/ 'jigs pa rnams dbugs 'byin par mdzad pa'i phyag

gis sa la reg par mdzad pa dang / klu rnams kyis bsams pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i phyir sa la reg par mdzad snyam na/ mchod sdong gzigs par bzhed par mthong ngo / /de nas de dag gis bsgreng ba dang / dge slong rnams kyis

mchod sdong blta bar brtsams so/ /tshe dang ldan pa legs ldan ni 'dod pa chung ba yin pas mtha' gcig tu song nas phyag dar khrod pa dag 'tshem mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong

dag mchod sdong nub par 'gyur gyis rtags zung shig ces pa las de nub par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis zhus pa/ btsun pa dge slong rnams mchod sdong la lta bar bgyid na/ tshe dang ldan pa legs

ldan ni 'dod pa chung bas mtha' gcig tu mchis nas phyag dar khrod pa 'tshem pa la gzigs/ ci lags re shig 'dod chags dang bral ba'i slad du 'am/ 'on te sngon bsten pa'i slad du lags/ gal te re shig 'dod chags dang bral ba'i

slad du lags na ni gzhan yang 'dod chags dang bral ba mchis lags so/ /'on te sngon bsten pa'i slad du lags na ni/ 'dis gang du bsten lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir yang yin la

sngon yang bsten pa'i phyir yang yin no/ /'dis sngon gang du bsten lags/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba rgyal po rab sgrogs zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/ de lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang grogs por gyur to/ /de bu 'dod kyang bu med nas lag pa la

'gram pa gtad de sems khongs su chud cing 'dug ste nor rdzas mang po zhig bsags na bdag la bu med pas bdag shi na rgyal po'i gdung rgyud chad par 'gyur ro snyam mo/ /de nas brgya byin gyis mthong nas dris pa/ grogs po khyod ci'i phyir

lag pa la 'gram pa gtad nas sems khongs su chud cing 'dug /des smras pa/ kau sh-i ka nor rdzas 'di snyed cig bsags na bdag la bu med pas bdag shi nas rgyal po gdung rgyud chad par 'gyur bas so/ /brgya byin gyis smras pa/

grogs po khyod sems khongs su chud par ma byed cig /gal te lha'i bu 'ga' zhig 'chi 'pho'i chos byung bar gyur na/ de khyod kyi bur bsko bar bya'o/ /chos nyid kyis lha'i bu 'chi 'pho'i chos 'byung ba la ni snga ltas lnga 'byung bar 'gyur te gos ma rnyings

pa rnams rnyings par 'gyur ba dang / me tog gi phreng ba ma rnyings pa rnams rnyings par 'gyur ba dang / lus las dri mi zhim pa 'byung ba dang / mchan khung nas rngul 'dzag pa dang / rang gi stan la mi dga' bar 'gyur ba'o/ /ji tsam na lha'i bu zhig la snga ltas

lnga byung bar gyur nas de la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis smras pa/ grogs po rgyal po rab sgrogs kyi btsun mo dam pa'i mngal du nying mtshams sbyor cig /des smras pa/ kau shi ka de ni bag med pa'i gnas yin te/ kau shi ka rgyal po rnams ni nyes pa

mang po byed pa yin pas chos ma yin pas rgyal srid byas nas sems can dmyal bar gzhol bar gyur na mi rung ngo / /brgya byin gyis smras pa/ grogs po khyod la ngas dran par bya'o/ /kau shi ka lha rnams ni dga' ba mang pos bag med pa yin no/ /

grogs po de ni bden na 'on kyang kho bos khyod la dran par bya'o/ /des rgyal po rab sgrogs kyi btsun mo dam pa'i mngal du nying mtshams sbyar to/ /gang gi nyi ma kho na la nying mtshams blangs pa de'i nyi ma kho na la skye bo'i tshogs chen pos

sgra phyung bar gyur to/ /de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das nas khye'u zhig btsas te zhes bya ba nas/ sna'i gzangs mtho ba zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/ /de'i nye du dag 'dus shing tshogs nas ming 'dogs par byed de/ khye'u yi ming cir gdags/

gnyen rnams kyis smras pa/ gang gi nyi ma kho na la khye'u 'di ma'i mngal du zhugs pa de'i nyi ma kho na la skye bo'i tshogs chen pos sgra phyung bar gyur pas/ de bas na khye'u yi ming sgra chen zhes bya bar gdags so zhes de'i ming sgra chen zhes bya bar

btags te/ khye'u sgra chen ma ma brgyad la rjes su gtad nas zhes bya ba nas brtag pa brgyad dang / dbye ba dang / klog pa la mkhas shing bshes gnyen can du gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur cing

yul gyi dbang phyug dang mthu dang / brtson 'grus thob pa/ sa'i dkyil 'khor chen po mngon par zil gyis mnan nas gnas pa rnams kyi bzo'i gnas dang las kyi gnas tha dad pa gang yin pa 'di lta ste/ glang po che'i gnyar zhon pa dang / rta la

zhon pa dang / shing rta'i thabs dang / ral gri'i thabs dang / mda' gzhu dang / phyir bsnur ba dang / mdun du bsnur ba dang / lcags kyus sgyur thabs dang / zhags pas gdab pa dang / mda' bo che 'phen pa dang / dbyug pas rdeg pa dang / 'dzin stangs dang /

gom stangs dang / gcod pa dang / dral ba dang / dbug pa dang / rgyang nas phog pa dang / sgra grag par phog pa dang / gnad du phog pa dang / mi 'chor bar phog pa dang / tshabs che ba dag ste/ gnas lnga po de rnams la shin tu byang bar gyur to/ /chos nyid

kyis re shig pha ji tsam gson gyi bar du bu'i ming mi grag pa yin no/ /dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po rab sgrogs shi nas sgra chen rgyal srid la bzhag pa dang / des tha gi tsam zhig chos bzhin gyis rgyal srid byed du bcug nas/ de nas chos

bzhin ma yin pas rgyal srid byed du bcug par gyur to/ /de nas brgya byin gyis smras pa/ grogs po kho bos khyod rgyal po rab sgrogs kyi bur bskos te chos bzhin ma yin pas rgyal srid ma byed cig /sems can dmyal bar gzhol

bar gyur ta re zhes ma bsgo 'am/ des tha gi tsam zhig chos bzhin gyis rgyal srid byed du bcug nas slar yang chos bzhin ma yin pas rgyal srid byed du bcug par gyur to/ /lan gnyis su yang brgya byin gyis smras

pa/ grogs po kho bos khyod rgyal po rab sgrogs kyi bur bskos te chos bzhin ma yin pas rgyal srid ma byed cig /sems can dmyal bar gzhol bar gyur ta re zhes ma bsgo 'am/ des smras pa/ kau shi ka bdag cag rgyal po rnams

ni dga' ba mang pos bag med pas skad cig tu brjed par 'gyur gyis/ bdag la khyod kyis mtshan ma zhig zhog shig dang / bdag gis mthong nas nges par sbyin pa dag sbyin/ bsod nams dag bgyi'o/ /de nas lha'i dbang po

brgya byin gyis lha'i bu las thams cad pa la bsgo ba/ las thams cad pa song la khyod kyis rgyal po sgra chen gyi gnas su lha'i 'khor gyi khyams dang / lha'i mchod sdong srid du 'dom stong yod la/ sboms su 'dom drug bcu yod pa/ thams cad

gser las byas shing rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa zhig sprul cig /de nas lha'i bu las thams cad pas rgyal po sgra chen gyi gnas su lha'i 'khor gyi khyams dang / lha'i mchod sdong srid du 'dom stong yod pa/ sboms su 'dom

drug bcu yod pa/ thams cad gser las byas pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa zhig sprul to/ /de nas rgyal po sgra chen gyis mchod sbyin gyi khang pa rtsig tu bcug nas rang gi zhang po mya ngan med ces bya ba mchod sdong gi

zhal ta bar bzhag go/ /de nas mchod sdong la 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas pa'i mi thams cad lta bar spro bas lhags nas zas zos shing mchod sdong lta bas rang gi las sgrub par mi byed do/ /de nas zhing las kyi mtha' rnams

bar chad byas pas rgyal po'i dpya thang bzhin mi 'du bar gyur to/ /blon po rnams kyis dpya nyung ngu phul ba dang rgyal po sgra chen gyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag ci'i phyir dpya nyung zad gcig 'bul/ lha 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas

pa'i skye bo'i tshogs mchis nas 'tshal ma 'tshal cing mchod sdong la lta zhing mchis te rang gi las sgrub par mi byed pas zhing las kyi mtha' rnams kyi bar chad bgyis pas dpya thang bzhin mi 'du lags so/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ mchod

sbyin gyi khang pa drol cig /de rnams kyis de dral na yang de bzhin du skye bo'i tshogs de rang rang gi rgyags blangs nas za zhing mchod sdong la rtog cing 'dug ste/ rang rang gi las sgrub par mi byed pas zhing las kyi mtha' rnams kyi bar

chad byas pas de bzhin rgyal po'i dpya thang bzhin mi 'du bar gyur to/ /rgyal pos dris pa/ shes ldan dag mchod sbyin gyi khang pa dral na ci'i phyir da dung dpya nyung bar gyur/ blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha skye bo'i tshogs rang rang gi

rgyags blangs nas 'tshal zhing mchod sdong la rtog cing mchis te rang gi las sgrub par mi bgyid pas/ zhing las kyi mtha' rnams kyi bar chad bgyis pas des na dpya nyung bar gyur to/ /de nas rgyal po sgra chen gyis sbyin pa dag

sbyin/ bsod nams dag byas nas mchod sdong chu bo gang gA'i nang du bor ro/ /dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ rgyal po rab sgrogs kyi zhang po mya ngan med ces bya ba gang yin pa de ni dge slong legs ldan 'di nyid yin te/ 'dis

sngon 'di bsten to/ /btsun pa mchod sdong 'di gang du zhig par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ma 'ongs pa na mi rnams kyis tshe lo brgyad khri thub par 'gyur te/ mi tshe lo brgyad khri pa rnams

kyi rgyal po dung zhes bya ba yang dag par sdom pa/ 'khor los bsgyur ba mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba/ chos dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal po rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa zhig 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i rin po che sna bdun ni 'di lta bu dag

'byung bar 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ 'khor lo rin po che dang / glang po rin po che dang / rta rin po che dang / nor bu rin po che dang / bud med rin po che dang / khyim bdag rin po che dang / bdun pa ni blon po rin po che nyid do/ /de la bu dpa' ba/

rtul phod pa/ yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/ pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms par byed pa stong yang tshang bar 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de rgya mtsho la thug pa'i sa chen po ma lus par gnod par sdo ba med

cing 'tshe ba med pa 'di nyid chad pa med cing mtshon gyis bda' ba med la/ chos dang 'thun zhing snyoms pas legs par phab ste gnas par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po dung gi mdun na 'don bram ze tshangs pa'i tshe zhes bya ba zhig 'byung

ste/ de'i chung ma ni tshangs ldan ma zhes bya ba zhig 'byung ngo / /de byams pa tshad med pa'i yan lag gis rgyas par byas pas bu byams pa zhes bya ba zhig btsa' bar 'gyur ro/ /bram ze tshangs pa'i tshe bram ze'i khye'u brgyad khri la bram

ze rnams kyi gsang tshig klog tu 'jug go/ /des bram ze'i khye'u de rnams byams pa la gtad nas bram ze'i khye'u byams pas bram ze'i khye'u brgyad khri po rnams bram ze rnams kyi gsang tshig klog tu 'jug go/ /de nas rgyal po

chen po bzhi po rnams kyis gter chen po bzhi po/ ka ling ka nas dmar ser te/ /mi thi la nas skya bo yi/ /sa 'dzin nas ni e la'i 'dab/ /bA rA Na sI'i grong nas dung / /mchod sdong 'di yang khyer nas rgyal po dung la 'bul bar 'gyur ro/ /

rgyal po dung gis kyang bram ze tshangs pa'i tshe la sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /bram ze tshangs pa'i tshes kyang bram ze'i khye'u byams pa la'o/ /bram ze'i khye'u byams pas kyang bram ze'i khye'u de rnams la'o/ /de nas bram ze'i khye'u de rnams

kyis mchod sdong de dum bu dum bur bcad nas 'ged par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bram ze'i khye'u byams pas mchod sdong de'i mi rtag pa nyid mthong nas/ de nyid kyis skyo ba skyes nas nags su 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /gang gi nyi ma kho na la

nags su song ba de kho na'i nyi ma la byams pa tshad med pa'i yan lag gis rgyas par byas nas bla na med pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur te/ de'i mtshan bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa/ bla na med pa yang dag

par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /gang gi nyi ma kho na la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pas bla na med pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur ba de kho na'i nyi ma la rgyal po dung gi rin po che sna bdun nub par

'gyur ro/ /rgyal po dung yang khams kyi rgyal phran brgyad khri'i 'khor dang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa rab tu 'byung ba'i rjes su rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i chung ma rin po che sa ga zhes bya ba yang bud med brgyad

khri'i 'khor dang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa rab tu 'byung ba'i rjes su rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /bram ze tshangs pa'i tshe yang bram ze'i khye'u brgyad khri'i 'khor dang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

sangs rgyas byams pa rab tu 'byung ba'i rjes su rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa 'khor dge slong 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug dang ri bya gag rkang gang na ba der gshegs par 'gyur ro/ /

de na dge slong 'od srung gi rus pa'i tshogs ma zhig pa 'dug pas ri bya gag rkang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa la kha dbye bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pas dge

slong 'od srung gi rus pa'i tshogs ma zhig pa phyag g.yas pas blangs nas phyag g.yon par bzhag ste nyan thos rnams la 'di skad ces/ dge slong dag skye dgu rnams kyi tshe lo brgya thub pa na ston pa shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du

byung ba de'i nyan thos rnams las chog shes pa dang 'dod pa chung ba dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog ni 'od srung yin no zhes bstan pa gang yin pa de ni 'di yin te/ shAkya thub pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas de'i

bstan pa yang 'dis yang dag par bsdus so zhes chos ston par 'gyur ro/ /de rnams kyis mthong nas skyo ba skyes te/ 'di 'dra ba'i lus kyis ji ltar 'di lta bu'i yon tan gyi tshogs thob par gyur snyam nas de rnams skyo ba de nyid kyis dgra

bcom pa mngon sum du byed par 'gyur te/ 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug dgra bcom pa nyid dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan mngon du bya ba la brtson par 'gyur ro/ /mchod sdong de ni der zhig par 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa rgyu gang dang rkyen gang

gis dkon mchog gnyis 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ smon lam gyi dbang gis so/ /bcom ldan 'das gang du smon lam btab lags/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba yul dbus su rgyal po

gos sbyin zhes bya ba 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang bde ba dang lo legs pa dang skye bo dang / mi mang pos rab tu gang ba na rgyal srid byed du 'jug go/ /de'i shing rnams me tog dang 'bras bu rtag pa dang / lhas dus dus su char gyi rgyun legs par phab

pas lhag par lo tog rnams phun sum tshogs par gyur to/ /byang phyogs na rgyal po nor ldan zhes bya ba 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang bde ba dang lo legs pa dang / skye bo dang mi mang pos rab tu gang ba na rgyal srid byed du 'jug go/ /de'i shing rnams

me tog dang 'bras bu rtag pa dang / lhas dus su char gyi rgyun legs par phab pas lhag par lo tog rnams phun sum tshogs par gyur to/ /de dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po gos sbyin gyi mdun na 'don las khye'u spyi gtsug rin po ches

brgyan pa zhig btsas te/ de'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas de'i ming rin chen gtsug tor can zhes btags so/ /de dus gzhan zhig na rga ba dang na ba dang 'chi ba yang dag par mthong nas skyo ba skyes te nags su song ngo / /gang gi nyi ma kho na la

nags su song ba de kho na'i nyi ma la des bla na med pa'i ye shes thob nas de'i ming yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can zhes bya bar gyur to/ /de nas

dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po nor ldan steng gi khang bzangs kyi gzhir song ste blon po'i tshogs kyis bskor nas 'dug go/ /des blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag nga'i ci 'dra ba de ltar rgyal po gzhan 'ga'i yul na 'byor pa dang /

rgyas pa dang bde ba dang lo legs pa dang / skye bo dang mi mang pos rab tu gang ba dang / shing rnams me tog dang 'bras bu rtag pa dang / lhas dus dus su char gyi rgyun legs par phab pas lo tog rnams phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba lta

yod dam/ yul dbus nas tshong pa zong thogs te byang phyogs su 'ongs pa de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha yul dbus na rgyal po gos sbyin zhes bya ba zhig mchis so/ /rgyal po nor ldan gyis thos ma thag tu mi bzod pa chen po skyes te/

de mi bzod pa skyes nas blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go skon cig dang yul 'khor gzhom par bya'o/ /de nas rgyal po nor ldan dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa glang po che'i tshogs

dang rta pa'i tshogs dang shing rta pa'i tshogs dang / dpung bu chung gi tshogs go skon te/ yul dbus su dong nas chu bo gang gA'i lho phyogs kyi 'gram na 'khod do/ /rgyal po gos sbyin gyis rgyal po nor ldan dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi

pa glang po che'i tshogs dang rta pa'i tshogs dang / shing rta pa'i tshogs dang dpung bu chung gi tshogs go bskon nas yul dbus su 'ongs te chu bo gang gA'i lho phyogs kyi 'gram na 'khod do zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang des kyang dpung gi

tshogs yan lag bzhi pa glang po che'i tshogs dang / rta pa'i tshogs dang shing rta pa'i tshogs dang dpung bu chung gi tshogs go bskon nas chu bo gang gA'i byang phyogs logs kyi 'gram na 'dug go/ /de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs

rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyis de gnyis kyi gdul ba'i dus mkhyen nas chu bo gang gA'i 'gram du nub mo nye bar rten cing bzhugs so/ /de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyis 'jig rten pa'i

thugs bskyed do/ /chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa de'i tshe brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha rnams kyi sems kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi
dgongs pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /de nas brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ yang dag par rdzogs

pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ de rnams kyi kha dog gi mthus snang ba rgya chen po byung bar gyur pa rgyal po nor ldan gyis mthong ngo / /mthong

nas kyang blon po rnams la dris pa/ shes ldan dag rgyal po gos sbyin gyi yul na snang ba rgya chen po byung ba 'di ci yin/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha rgyal po gos sbyin gyi yul du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin

chen gtsug tor can byung ste/ de la blta ba'i phyir brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa mchis pa des na snang ba chen po 'di byung ste/ de ni rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba lags pas 'di ni de'i mthu lags so/ /rgyal po nor ldan

gyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag gang gi yul du gang la brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa yang blta ba'i phyir 'ong ba'i rkang gnyis bsod nams kyi zhing de lta bu byung ba de la bdag gis gnod pa ci 'dra ba zhig bya zhes/

des de la pho nya btang ste/ grogs po khyod de la bdag cung zad kyang mi byed kyis tshur spyon/ khyod ni bsod nams kyi mthu chen po can zhig pas khyod kyi yul na gang la brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa yang blta ba'i phyir 'ong ba

rkang gnyis bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can bzhugs so/ /'on kyang khyod kyi mgul nas 'khyud nas 'gro bar bya ste/ de lta na bdag cag phan tshun yid bde bar 'gyur ro

zhes spring ngo / /rgyal po gos sbyin yid ma ches nas de yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyi zhabs
gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas rgyal po gos sbyin gyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun

pa bdag la rgyal po nor ldan gyis spring pa/ grogs po sdug pa khyod la bdag cag ci yang mi byed kyis tshur shog /khyod kyi mgul pa nas 'khyud nas 'gro bar bya ste/ de lta na bdag cag phan tshun yid bde bar 'gyur ro

zhes mchi na de la bdag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po song shig dang khyod la legs par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das ci

bdag gis de'i rkang pa gnyis la gtug par bgyi 'am/ rgyal po chen po rgyal po dpung chen po rnams la ni gtug par bya dgos so/ /de nas rgyal po gos sbyin stan las langs te/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin

chen gtsug tor can gyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas chas te rgyal po nor ldan gang na ba der song ste phyin nas rgyal po nor ldan gyi rkang pa gnyis la gtugs so/ /de nas rgyal po nor ldan gyis mgul nas 'khyud

de yid gcugs par byas te btang ngo / /de nas rgyal po gos sbyin yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can

gyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ rgyal po gos sbyin gyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /

btsun pa rgyal po thams cad kyis rkang pa gnyis la gtugs pa'i rgyal po gang lags/ rgyal po chen po 'khor los sgyur ba yin no/ /de nas rgyal po gos sbyin stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar

nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan

'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyis gos sbyin la cang mi gsung

bas gnang ngo / /de nas rgyal po gos sbyin yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyi spyan snga nas dong

ngo de nas rgyal po gos sbyin gyis de nyid kyi nub mo nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag sta gon byas te/ nang par sngar langs nas gdan bshams te nor bu'i chu snod bzhag nas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs

rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can la spyan 'dren gyis dus tshod gsol pa/ btsun pa gdugs tshod bshams lags shing mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/ de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs

rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can snga dro sham thabs mnabs lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams te/ dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun gyis bltas nas/ rgyal po gos sbyin gyi bkad

sa gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /de nas rgyal po gos sbyin gyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can la sogs pa dge

slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas stobs shing tshim par byed de/ rnam pa du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag

nas bstabs shing tshim par byas so/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyis gsol nas phyag gnyis bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas zhabs gnyis la gtugs te smon lam gdab par

brtsams pa/ btsun pa sbyin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur cig ces smras nas de ma thag dung yang bus so/ /de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyis rgyal

po gos sbyin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rgyal po chen po khyod skye dgu'i tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po dung zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas skad chen po'i sgra dag byung ngo / /rgyal po nor ldan

gyis ca co'i sgra dag thos nas blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag rgyal po gos sbyin gyi yul na ca co'i sgra grag pa de ci zhig yin/ de rnams kyis legs par brtags nas smras pa/ lha yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyis rgyal po gos sbyin 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por lung bstan pas skye bo'i tshogs dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang rab tu dga' bas des na ca co'i sgra grag pa lags so/ /de nas

rgyal po nor ldan yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas

te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas rgyal po nor ldan gyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa 'khor los bsgyur ba thams cad kyis rkang

pa gnyis la gtug par bgyi ba gang lags/ rgyal po chen po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin no/ /de nas rgyal po nor ldan stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar

nas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig sang bdag gi

sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyis rgyal po nor ldan la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas rgyal po nor ldan yang dag par rdzogs

pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin

chen gtsug tor can gyi spyan snga nas song ngo / /de nas rgyal po nor ldan gyis de nyid kyi nub mo nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag sta gon byas nas nang par sngar langs te gdan bshams shing nor bu'i chu snod bzhag nas/

yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can la spyan 'dren gyis dus tshod gsol pa/ btsun pa gdugs tshod bshams lags shing mchis na bcom ldan 'das da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/ /de nas
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can snga dro sham thabs mnabs lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams te/ dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing
dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun gyis bltas te rgyal po nor ldan gyi bkad sa gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs

so/ /de nas rgyal po nor ldan gyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas

stobs shing tshim par byed de/ rnam pa du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas bstabs shing tshim par byas so/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyis gsol nas phyag

bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas zhabs gnyis la gtugs te 'jig rten 'di dag thams cad la byams pa tshad med pa'i yan lag gis rgyas par byas nas smon lam gdab par brtsams pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag

'jig rten gyi ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su gyur cig ces btab bo/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen

po khyod skye dgu'i tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag de ltar na smon lam gyi dbang gis dkon mchog

gnyis gcig car 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo grong spyil bu can zhes bya ba gang na ba der 'dong ngo / /btsun pa bka'

bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das yul spong byed ces bya ba nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang / grong spyil bu can du byon to/ /

grong spyil bu can gyi grong khyer gyi byang phyogs kyi shing sha pa'i tshal na bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'di ni tshul khrims yin no/ /'di ni ting nge 'dzin yin no 'di ni shes

rab yin no/ /dge slong dag tshul khrims goms par byas na ting nge 'dzin yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ro/ /ting nge 'dzin goms par byas na shes rab yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ro/ /shes rab goms par byas na 'di lta ste/
'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug dag las sems yang dag pa kho nar rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/ /de ltar sems yang dag pa kho nar rnam par grol ba'i 'phags pa'i nyan thos kyis ni bdag gi zag

pa ni zad do/ /tshangs par spyod pa ni bsten to bya ba ni byas so/ /'di las srid pa gzhan mi shes so zhes yang dag pa kho nar shes par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom

ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo sgra can gang na bar 'dong ngo / /btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang

ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dang spong byed nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang / sgra can du byon nas sgra can gyi drang srong sgra sgrogs kyi gnas na bzhugs so/ /de'i

tshe sgra can gyi skye bo'i tshogs la mi ngas byung nas de'i tshe dge bsnyen brtan pa yang shi nye ba dang lhag par brtson dang / brtson pa'i khyu mchog dang mdzes pa dang / nye mdzes dang yid 'ong dang nye bar yid 'ong dang bzang po dang shin

tu bzang dang grags pa dang grags byin dang dge bsnyen grags mchog kyang shi'o/ /de nas dge slong rab tu mang po snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te sgra can du bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs so/ /dge

slong rab tu mang po sgra can du bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyu bas sgra can gyi skye bo'i tshogs la mi ngas byung ste/ de'i tshe dge bsnyen brtan pa yang shi nye ba dang lhag par brtson dang / brtson pa'i khyu mchog dang mdzes pa dang nye mdzes dang /

yid 'ong dang nye bar yid 'ong dang bzang po dang shin tu bzang dang grags pa dang grags byin dang dge bsnyen grags mchog kyang shi'o zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang sgra can du bsod snyoms la rgyus te zas kyi bya ba byas nas zas

phyi ma'i bsod snyoms spangs shing / lhung bzed dang chos gos mkhos su phab nas rkang pa gnyis bkrus te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong nas lhags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas

te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas dge slong rab tu mang pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag dge slong rab tu mang po 'dir snga dro sham thabs

'tshal lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs nas sgra can du bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs te/ btsun pa bdag cag dge slong rab tu mang po sgra can du bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyu ba na sgra can 'dir skye bo'i tshogs la mi ngas byung nas/ de'i tshe

dge bsnyen brtan pa yang gum/ nye ba dang lhag par brtson dang brtson pa'i khyu mchog dang / mdzes pa dang nye mdzes dang yid 'ong dang nye bar yid 'ong dang bzang po dang shin tu bzang dang / grags pa dang grags byin dang dge bsnyen grags mchog

kyang gum mo zhes thos lags na/ btsun pa de rnams kyi 'gro ba ni gang skye ba ni gang / sngon du 'gro ba ni gang lags/ dge slong dag dge bsnyen brtan pa ni tha ma'i cha dang 'thun pa'i kun du sbyor ba lnga rnams spangs pas rdzus te

skyes te der yongs su mya ngan las 'da' zhing 'jig rten 'dir yang phyir mi ldog pa'i chos can gyi phyir mi 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /nye ba dang lhag par brtson dang brtson pa'i khyu mchog dang mdzes pa dang nye mdzes dang yid 'ong dang nye bar

yid 'ong dang bzang po dang shin tu bzang dang grags pa dang grags byin dang / dge bsnyen grags mchog kyang tha ma'i cha dang 'thun pa'i kun du sbyor ba lnga spangs pas brdzus te skyes te der yongs su mya ngan las 'da' zhing 'jig rten

'dir yang phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos can gyi phyir mi 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag sgra can 'di nyid du dge bsnyen nyis brgya lnga bcu lhag cig shi ba de dag kyang tha ma'i cha dang 'thun pa'i kun du sbyor ba lnga rnams spangs pas rdzus

te skyes te der yongs su mya ngan las 'da' zhing 'jig rten 'dir yang phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos can gyi phyir mi 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag sgra can 'di nyid du dge bsnyen sum brgya shi ba de dag ni kun du sbyor ba gsum yang

spangs la 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang / gti mug dag kyang bsrabs pa'i phyir lan cig phyir 'ong ba yin te/ 'jig rten 'dir lan cig phyir 'ongs nas sdug bsngal mthar byed par 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag grong khyer sgra can

'di nyid du dge bsnyen lnga brgya lhag cig shi ba de dag ni kun du sbyor ba gsum spangs pas rgyun du zhugs pa rnam par mi ltung ba'i chos can rdzogs pa'i byang chub la nges par gzhol ba/ re ltar thogs na srid pa bdun pa

yin te/ lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du lan bdun du nying mtshams sbyar zhing 'khor nas sdug bsngal gyi mthar byed par 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag khyed dus las 'das shing shi bar gyur pa rnams de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu ba zhu bar byed pa ni

de bzhin gshegs pa la tho 'tsham pa yin te/ des na de bzhin gshegs pa bde bar mi 'gyur ro/ /'on kyang skye ba yod na 'chi ba'i dus byed pa yin na ngo mtshar ci zhig yod/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung ma byung yang rung chos

rnams kyi chos nyid dang chos gnas pa nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings 'di ni gnas pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi mngon par mkhyen pas mngon par byang chub nas gsungs te/ 'dogs par mdzad rab tu 'jog par mdzad rnam par 'byed par mdzad/

rnam par 'grel par mdzad gsal bar mdzad 'chad par mdzad/ yang dag par rab tu 'chad par mdzad pa yin te 'di lta ste/ 'di yod pas 'di 'byung 'di skyes pas 'di skye bar 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed

rnams 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/ ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug /skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/ tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa

sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/ srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang 'khrugs pa rnams rab tu

'byung bar 'gyur te/ de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig pa 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /'di lta ste 'di med na 'di mi 'byung la 'di 'gag na 'di 'gag par 'gyur te 'di lta ste ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag 'du byed
'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag /rnam par shes pa 'gags pas ming dang gzugs 'gag /ming dang gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug 'gag /skye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gag reg pa 'gags pas
tshor ba 'gag tshor ba 'gags pas sred pa 'gag /sred pa 'gags pas len pa 'gag /len pa 'gags pas srid pa 'gag /srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag /skye ba 'gags pas rga shi dang mya ngan dang smre sngags

'don pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'gag par 'gyur te/ de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di 'gag par 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag 'on kyang khyed la chos kyi

me long gi chos kyi rnam grangs bshad kyis de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad do/ /chos kyi me long gi chos kyi rnam grangs gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la shes nas dad pa ni chos kyi

me long gi chos kyi rnam grangs yin no/ /'phags pa dgyes pa'i tshul khrims ni chos kyi me long gi chos kyi rnam grangs yin te/ ngas khyed la chos kyi me long gi chos kyi rnam grangs bshad do zhes gang gsungs pa

bshad pa ni de yin no/ /a mra skyong mas bcom ldan 'das spong byed nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na sgra can du byon nas/ sgra can gyi drang srong sgra sgrogs kyi gnas na bzhugs so/ /zhes thos so thos nas kyang a mra skyong

ma de la ne tso bzhin rgyas zhes bya ba mi skad shes pa zhig yod de/ ne tso bzhin rgyas la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bzhin rgyas tshur shog /khyod bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song la phyin nas kho mo'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs

gnyis la mgo bos phyag byos la/ gnod pa nyung ngam nyam nga ba chung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam 'tsho 'am gnod pa ma mchis sam/ stobs dang bde bar rig par spyod dam zhes snyun gsol la/ 'di skad ces a mra skyong ma'i mchid nas/ btsun pa bcom

ldan 'das nam yangs pa can du gshegs pa de'i tshe thugs brtse bar dgongs te/ thog mar bdag gi a mra'i tshal du gshegs par gsol cig /de nas ne tso bzhin rgyas kyis a mra skyong ma'i ltar mnyan nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der

song ba de yangs pa can gyi li tsa bi'i khye'u dag gis mthong nas de dag gis smras pa/ shes ldan dag ne tso 'gro ba 'di ni smad 'tshong ma'i yin no zhes de dag gis de la mda' 'phang bar brtsams pa na/ de yang de dag gi steng du babs so/ /de nas

ne tso des tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ yul 'khor gzhan yang 'gyed par yang / pho nya mi gsod ces grag na/ /bdag lta rgyal ba'i pho nya bas/ /lus can kun gyis ga la sod/ /de rnams kyis kyang tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ khyod

kyi tshig gis mda' 'phangs pa/ /ldog na bdag cag smos ci dgos/ /khyod ni rdzu 'phrul ches bskyabs pas/ /'jigs pa med par 'gro bar gyis/ /de nas ne tso bzhin rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom

ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la a mra skyong ma mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba chung ngam

bskyod pa yang ngam 'tsho 'am gnod pa ma mchis sam/ stobs dang bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes snyun gsol lags so/ /bzhin rgyas khyod dang a mra skyong ma bde bar gyur cig /btsun pa a mra skyong ma'i mchid nas bcom

ldan 'das nam yangs pa can du gshegs pa de'i tshe thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/ thog mar bdag gi a mra'i tshal du gshegs su gsol zhes de skad mchi lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis ne tso bzhin rgyas la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /

de nas ne tso bzhin rgyas kyis bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo / /de bcom ldan 'das la dang ba bskyed nas

song ba las ring po ma lon pa kho nar 'ol bas srog dang phral te dus byas nas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams su skyes so/ /chos nyid kyis skyes nas ring po ma lon pa'i lha'i bu 'am lha'i bu mo ni sems gsum skye bar 'gyur

te/ gang nas shi 'phos pa dang gang du skyes pa dang las gang gis yin pa'o/ /des bltas nas dud 'gro las shi 'phos pa dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams su skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sems mngon par dad pas so/ /

de nas sngon ne tso byed pa'i lha'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag zhag lon nas bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag la rigs pa ma yin gyis/ ci nas kyang bdag zhag ma lon pa kho nar bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir

'gro'o snyam nas/ de nas sngon ne tso byed pa'i lha'i bu rna cha gdub 'khor dri ma med pa g.yo ba thogs shing se mo do dang / do shal gyis lus brgyan nas/ de nyid kyi nub mo lha rnams kyi me tog ud pa la dang / pad ma
dang / ku mu da dang / pad ma dkar po dang / man dA ra ba'i me tog gis/ thu ba bkang nas shin tu 'phags shing mngon par 'phags pa'i kha dog gis/ de'i nub mo bcom ldan
'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te/ bcom ldan

'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ /de'i tshe sngon ne tso byed pa'i lha'i bu'i kha dog gi mthus snang ba rgya chen pos sgra sgrogs kyi 'dug gnas thams cad gsal bar gyur to// //'dul ba gzhi bam po nyi shu brgyad pa/ de nas bcom

ldan 'das kyis sngon ne tso byed pa'i lha'i bu'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin mkhyen nas de dang mthun pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad de de thos pas sngon ne tso

byed pa'i lha'i bus 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te bden pa mthong nas lan gsum du ched du brjod pas ched du brjod pa/ btsun pa 'di lta bu

ni bdag la mas ma bgyis te/ phas ma lags sdug pas ma lags rang gi skye bo dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyis ma lags/ rgyal pos ma lags lha rnams kyis ma lags/ snga ma 'das pa rnams kyis ma lags/ dge sbyong dang bram ze

rnams kyis ma lags pa gang lags pa de bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la mdzad de/ sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro dang / yi dgas rnams nas ni rkang pa drangs/ lha dang mi rnams la ni rab tu bzhag /'khor ba las ni ring du mdzad/

khrag dang / mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams/ rus pa'i ri bo las ni bsgral/ /ngan song gi sgo rnams ni bkum/ mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams ni phye/ thog ma med pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes

bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bgyis lags te/ btsun pa bdag ni 'phags so/ /mngon par 'phags so/ /bdag bcom ldan 'das dang chos dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyis bdag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/

deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du srog dang yang bsdos te skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dad lags so/ /de nas sngon ne tso byed pa'i lha'i bu bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' zhing rjes su yi rang nas tshong pa zong rnyed pa lta bu dang / zhing pa lo

tog legs pa lta bu dang / dpa' bo g.yul ngor rgyal ba lta bu dang / nad pa nad thams cad las yongs su thar pa bzhin du 'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid dang rang gi gnas su song ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe

dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo yangs pa can gang na ba der 'dong ngo / btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das spong byed nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs

pa na yangs pa can du byon nas yangs pa can gyi a mra'i tshal na a mra skyong mas bcom ldan 'das spong byed nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na yangs pa can du byon nas yangs pa can gyi bdag gi a mra'i tshal kho na na bzhugs so zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang

rgyan thams cad kyis rgyan nas bud med kyi 'khor gyis yongs su bskor te/ bzhon pa bzang po la zhon nas yangs pa can nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ste/ des ji tsam bzhon pa'i

sa'i bar du bzhon pas song nas bzhon pa las babs te rkang pa kho nas kun dga' ra bar zhugs so/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i gung la chos 'chad cing bzhugs pa na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis a mra skyong ma rgyang ring po kho na nas

gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang yang dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ a mra skyong ma pha bi 'ong gis brtson 'grus dang shes bzhin dang dran pa dang ldan pas gnas par gyis shig /ngas rjes su bstan pa ni 'di yin no/ /ji ltar na dge slong brtson 'grus la gnas pa

yin zhe na/ 'di la dge slong gis sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spang ba'i phyir 'dun pa skyed do 'bad do brtson 'grus rtsom mo sems rab tu 'dzin to rab tu 'jog go sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi bskyed pa'i phyir 'dun pa skyed do 'bad do brtson

'grus rtsom mo sems rab tu 'dzin to rab tu 'jog go dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir 'dun pa skyed do/ 'bad do brtson 'grus rtsom mo sems rab tu 'dzin to rab tu 'jog go dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams gnas pa dang nyams par mi 'gyur

ba dang goms par yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang phyir zhing 'byung bar bya ba dang / ye shes rgya chen po mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir 'dun pa skyed do 'bad do/ /brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /sems rab tu 'dzin cing rab tu 'jog pa ste/ de ltar na dge slong

brtson 'grus can yin no/ /ji ltar na dge slong shes bzhin can yin zhe na/ 'di la dge slong gis 'gro ba dang / ldog pa la shes bzhin gyis gnas shing lta ba dang / rnam par lta ba dang bskum pa dang brkyang ba dang snam sbyar dang /

chos gos dang lhung bzed thogs pa dang 'gro ba dang / 'greng ba dang 'dug pa dang nyal ba dang / gnyid ma log pa dang smra ba dang mi smra ba dang / gnyid kyis snyom pas dub pa rnams la shes bzhin gyis gnas pa ste/ de ltar na dge slong

shes bzhin can yin no/ /ji ltar na dge slong dran pa dang ldan pa yin zhe na/ 'di la dge slong nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing brtson 'grus dang / shes bzhin dang dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten la gnod sems dang

yid mi bde ba spangs nas gnas so/ /phyi'i lus dang nang dang phyi'i lus dang / nang gi tshor ba rnams dang phyi'i tshor ba rnams dang nang dang phyi'i tshor ba rnams dang / nang gi sems dang phyi'i sems dang nang dang phyi'i sems dang / nang gi

chos rnams dang phyi'i chos rnams dang nang dang phyi'i chos rnams la chos rjes su lta zhing brtson 'grus dang / shes bzhin dang dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten la gnod sems dang yid mi bde ba spangs nas gnas pa ste/ de ltar

na dge slong dran pa dang ldan pa yin no/ /dge slong dag ngas a mra skyong ma pha bi 'ong gis btson 'grus dang / shes bzhin dang dran pa dang ldan pas gnas par gyis shig /ngas rjes su bstan pa ni 'di yin zhes ngas gang gsungs

pa bshad pa ni de yin no/ /de nas a mra skyong ma bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan

'das kyis a mra skyong ma la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/ yang dag par gzeng bstod par mdzad/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/ rnam grangs du mar

chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par gzeng bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo / /de nas a mra skyong ma stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa
gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu sang bdag gi sdum par

gdugs tshod/ sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis a mra skyong ma la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas a mra skyong mas bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas

bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo / /yangs pa can gyi lid tsa bi rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das spong byed nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang yangs pa

can du phyin te/ yangs pa can gyi a mra skyong ma'i tshal na bzhugs so zhes thos so thos nas kyang so so nas shing rta dang rta rnams la zhon te/ kha cig ni rta sngon po dang / shing rta sngon po dang / srab skyogs dang / lcag sngon po dang / thor tshugs dang /

gdugs dang / ral gri shubs sngon po dang / rnga yab nor bu'i yu ba can dang / gos dang / rgyan dang / byug pa sngon po dang / 'khor sngon por/ kha cig ni rta ser po dang / shing rta ser po dang / srab skyogs dang / lcag ser po dang / thor tshugs

dang / gdugs dang / ral gri shubs ser po dang / rnga yab nor bu'i yu ba can dang / gos dang / rgyan dang / byug pa ser po dang / 'khor ser por/ kha cig ni rta dmar po dang / shing rta dmar po dang / srab skyogs dang / lcag dmar po dang / thor tshugs

dang gdugs dang / ral gri shubs dmar po dang / rnga yab nor bu'i yu ba can dang / gos dang rgyan dang / byug pa dmar po dang / 'khor dmar por/ kha cig ni rta dkar po dang / shing rta dkar po dang / srab skyogs dang / lcag dkar po dang / thor tshugs

dang / gdugs dang / ral gri shubs dkar po dang / rnga yab nor bu'i yu ba can dang / gos dang / rgyan dang / byug pa dkar po dang / 'khor dkar por chas te skad mthon po dang / skad chen por slar khyer ces zer zhing yangs pa can nas byung ste/

bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar dong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis yangs pa can gyi lid tsa bi rnams rgyang ring po kho na nas 'ong ba gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang dge slong rnams

la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed cag las sus sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams bskyed mos tshal gyi gnas su 'gro ba ma mthong ba de yangs pa can gyi lid tsa bi rnams la ltos shig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong dag

sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyang ji ltar da ltar gyi yangs pa can gyi lid tsa bi dag bzhin du rdzu 'phrul 'di dang / 'byor pa 'di dang / cha lugs 'dis bskyed mos tshal gyi gnas su 'gro'o/ /ji tsam bzhon pa'i sa'i bar du

bzhon pas song nas bzhon pa las babs te rkang pa kho nas kun dga'i ra bar zhugs so/ /de nas yangs pa can gyi lid tsa bi rnams bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag

byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yangs pa can gyi lid tsa bi rnams la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/ yang

dag par gzeng bstod par mdzad/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/ rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par gzeng bstod/ /yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas

cang mi gsung ngo / /de'i tshe bram ze'i khye'u ser skya'i bu 'khor 'dus pa de nyid du 'dug par gyur to/ /de nas bram ze'i khye'u ser skya'i bu stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba

btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag ni spobs lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa bdag ni spobs lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis ser skya'i bu khyod spobs par gyis shig ces bka' stsal pa dang /

de nas bram ze'i khye'u ser skya'i bus de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ ang ga'i rgyal po nor bu'i go 'chang ba/ /ma ga'i dbang pos rnyed pa rab rnyed de/ /de yi yul du byung ba'i sangs rgyas ni/ /grags pa'i sgra dag gangs kyi ri bo bzhin/ /

ji ltar pad ma bzang po legs 'khrungs pa/ /rgongs ka kha 'bye dri zhim ldan pa bzhin/ /bar snang la ni nyi ma lhag ge bar/ /snang ba lta bur nyi ma'i rgyud la ltos/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi shes rab stobs/ /ji ltar mtshan mo

me 'bar lta bu ltos/ /de ni mig byed snang ba byed pa ste/ /lhags pa rnams kyi the tshom rnam par 'dul/ /lid tsa bi lnga brgyas bram ze'i khye'u ser skya'i bu legs par smras so/ /bram ze'i khye'u ser skya'i bu legs par smras so/ /

zhes bla gos lnga brgya legs par smras pa'i phyir byin no/ /de nas yangs pa can gyi lid tsa bi rnams stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom

ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ /gnas 'jog dag nga sngar a mra skyong mas spyan

drangs so/ /btsun pa a mra skyong ma dman pa shes rab dman pa des bdag cag bslus lags te/ des na bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das thog ma nyid du blta ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyid cing mchi ba'i rngo ma thog mod kyi da dung yang bdag cag bcom ldan 'das

dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la gnas 'jog de ni legs par smras so zhes bka' stsal to/ /de nas yangs pa can gyi lid tsa bi rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon

par dga' ste rjes su yi rang nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ngo / /bram ze'i khye'u ser skya'i bu ni de nyid na 'dug go/ /de nas bram ze'i khye'u ser skya'i bus yangs pa

can gyi lid tsa bi rnams dong nas ring po ma lon par shes nas stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /

btsun pa 'dir bdag la lid tsa bi lnga brgyas bla gos lnga brgya legs par smras pa'i phyir stsal ba 'di dag bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste bzhes su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze'i khye'u ser skya'i

bu la thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste bla gos lnga brgya bzhes so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze'i khye'u ser skya'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig

rten du byung na ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos rnam pa lnga 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na/ ser skya'i bu 'di la ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/

bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du 'byung zhing de chos thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba tha mar dge ba/

don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba/ tshangs par spyod pa ston par 'gyur te/ ser skya'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung na ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos 'jig rten du 'byung ba dang po yin no/ /gang dag chos de zhe sa dang bcas pas nyan cing bla mar byed/ dam par byed/ yid la byed cing sems rtse gcig tu rna blags nas sems thams

cad bsdus nas nyan par byed pa 'di ni ser skya'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung na ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos 'jig rten du 'byung ba gnyis pa yin no/ /chos de gang dag

gis thos nas de lta de ltar sgrub par byed pa 'di ni ser skya'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung na ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos 'jig rten du 'byung ba gsum pa

yin no/ /chos de gang dag gis thos nas dga' ba dang mgu ba dang / nges par 'byung ba dang ldan pa'i dge ba rgya chen po 'thob pa 'di ni ser skya'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du

byung na ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos 'jig rten du 'byung ba bzhi pa yin no/ /chos de gang dag gis thos nas don zab mo'i gzhi shes kyis so sor rtogs par byed pa 'di ni ser skya'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang

dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung na ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos 'jig rten du 'byung ba lnga pa yin no/ /ser skya'i bu skyes bu dam pa dag ni byas pa gzo ba dang byas pa tshor ba can yin te/ de dag cung zad tsam

byas na yang chud gzon par mi byed na mang po lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de lta bas na ser skya'i bu khyod kyis 'di ltar byas pa gzo ba dang byas pa tshor ba can du bslab par bya ste/ cung zad tsam byas na yang chud mi gzon na

mang po lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ ser skya'i bu khyod kyis de lta bur bslab par bya'o/ /de nas bram ze'i khye'u ser skya'i bu bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste yi rang nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs

gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo / /de nas a mra skyong mas de nyid kyi mtshan mo nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag sta gon byas te/ nang par sngar langs nas gdan bshams

te nor bu'i chu snod dag bzhag nas bcom ldan 'das la spyan 'dren gyis dus tshod gsol pa/ btsun pa gdugs tshod bshams lags na bcom ldan 'das da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro

sham thabs mnabs/ lhung bzed dang na bza' chos gos bsnams te dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun gyis bltas nas a mra skyong ma'i bkad sa gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas

dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /de nas a mra skyong mas sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi

lag nas stobs shing tshim par byed de/ rnam grangs du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas bstabs shing tshim par byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin nas phyag bcabs te lhung bzed

gyu bar rig nas stan dma' ba zhig blangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis a mra skyong mas sbyin pa phul ba de la rjes su yi rang bas rjes su yi rang bar

mdzad de/ gang zhig sbyin la dga' 'gyur skye bo sten/ /snyan pa 'thob cing de yi grags pa 'phel/ /ser sna med cing tshogs par 'gro ba na/ /zhum par mi 'gyur 'jigs pa med par 'gyur/ /de lta bas na mkhas pa bde

'dod pas/ /ser sna'i dri ma spangs te sbyin pa gtong / /de dag yun ring sum bcu rtsa gsum gnas/ /lha rnams dang ni skal pa mnyam par dga'/ /sbyin gtong dge byed de ni shi 'phos nas/ /rang gi 'od kyi dga' ba'i

tshal na rgyu/ /de na de gnyis rtsen cing dga' byed pa/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag dang ldan/ /ma bcings skyob pa de yi gsung thos nas/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i nyan thos mtho ris dga'/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis

a mra skyong ma la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par gzeng bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas stan las langs te song ngo / /dge slong rnams the tshom skyes te the tshom

thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa yangs pa can gyi lid tsa bi rnams kyis las ci zhig bgyis na/ des gal te lha rnams su skyes na yang lha mthu che bar 'gyur la/ gal te mi rnams su

skyes na yang mi mthu chen por gyur cing / da ltar sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi dper yang bstan lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag yangs pa can gyi lid tsa bi rnams kyis las tshogs

rnyed pa/ rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/ 'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/ gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i las dag byas shing bsags pas/ 'di dag nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor

myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/ me'i khams la mi 'gyur/ rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi/ 'di ltar

dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/ las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni/ /chud mi za ba 'ang tshogs dang dus/ /rnyed na lus can

rnams la ni/ /'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu rnams kyi tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs

su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung bar gyur te/ de 'khor dge slong

nyi khri dang grong khyer bA rA Na sI drang srong smra ba ri dgas kyi nags na nye bar brten cing bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe bA rA Na sI na dge bsnyen lnga brgya gnas so/ /de rnams kyis rgya mtsho chen por 'dong ba'i zong sta gon byas te/ rgya mtsho chen po'i gru bo che

bsgrubs nas rim gyis rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa dang / rjes su 'thun pa'i rlung gis rin po che'i gling du phyin to/ /de nas rin po che rnams kyis gru bo che yongs su bkang nas chas pa dang de nas rlung gis bdas nas rgya mtsho chen po'i klong

zhig tu phyin to/ /de rnams bred cing re ba med par gyur nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi phyir bye ma las mchod rten byas nas rin po che sna tshogs kyis mchod pa byas so/ /de nas lha zhig gis smras pa/ khyed cag

ma 'jigs par bag yod par byos shig dang / zhag bdun gyi nyin par dus rlabs 'ong bar 'gyur te/ des khyed cag bde legs su 'dzam bu'i gling du phyin par 'gyur ro/ /nam nangs nas de rnams phan tshun du smra zhing gros bya bar

brtsams te/ shes ldan dag bdag cag la lhas mi 'jigs pa bstan pa gang yin pa de ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi mthu yin pas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi mchod rten la bdag

cag gis rin po che phul ba dag slar blangs te 'dong ba ni mi rigs so/ /zhes de rnams kyis gtugs te smon lam gdab par brtsams pa/ gang yang bdag cag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od

srung bsod nams kyi zhing bla na med pa la bya ba byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis gal te bdag cag lha rnams su skyes par gyur na bdag cag mthu che ba kho nar gyur cig gal te mi'i nang du mi rnams su skyes par gyur na mthu che ba dang mi rnams su

skyes na yang sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi dper rung bar gyur cig ces byas so/ /dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ dge bsnyen lnga brgya po gang yin pa de dag ni lid tsa bi lnga brgya po 'di dag nyid yin te/ 'di dag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

sangs rgyas 'od srung gi phyir bye ma'i mchod rten byas shing rin po che dag gi mchod pa byas pas des na mi mthu chen po rnams su skyes par gyur te/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi yang dper rung bar gyur to/ /dge slong dag de lta

bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin/ 'dren ma rnams kyi ni 'dren ma yin/ gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi ni gcig tu dkar ba yin no/ /dge slong dag de lta bas na gang yang las gcig tu

gnag pa rnams dang 'dren ma rnams ni spongs la/ las gcig tu dkar ba rnams la brtsal bar bya ste/ dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/

kun dga' bo yangs pa can gyi grong khyer du song la sgo'i them pa la rkang pa zhog la gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dang / tshigs su bcad pa 'di smros shig /bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs
