brtsams pa dang / shes rab can gyis thob par bya ba de shes rab can gyis 'thob par 'gyur ba'i gnas de ni yod do/ /kye gau ta ma rigs ni bzhi po 'di dag ste/ rgyal rigs dang / bram ze dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs

lags la/ de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos gdams ngag stsol ba 'am/ rjes su ston pa 'am/ chos ston pa/ rnyed par gyur cing de dag gtso bo'i yan lag lnga dang ldan par gyur la/ de dag gis

kyang mnyam mtshungs par spangs par gyur na de dag gis rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba la khyad par ram/ bsam pa 'am/ tha dad du bya ba 'ga' mchis sam/ de'i phyir rgyal po chen po khyod nyid la dri yis/ khyod kyis ji

ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lan thob shig /rgyal po chen po dper na shar phyogs nas bram ze gzhon nu zhig 'ongs pa dang / de la 'ga' zhig gis 'di skad du gzhon nu tshur/ shing sA la skam po las gtsub stan byos la

steng du gtsub shing zhog ste me dbyung ba'i phyir gtsubs la me phyung shig ces smras pa dang / des shing sA la skam po las gtsub stan byas nas steng du gtsub shing bzhag ste/ me de dbyung ba'i phyir gtsubs nas me phyung / nub phyogs

nas rje'u rigs gzhon nu zhig 'ongs pa dang / de la 'ga' zhig gis 'di skad du rje'u rigs gzhon nu tshur/ shug pa skam po las gtsub stan byos la steng du gtsub shing zhog ste/ me dbyung ba'i phyir gtsubs la me phyung shig ces

smras pa dang / des shug pa skam po las gtsub stan byas nas steng du gtsub shing bzhag ste/ me dbyung ba'i phyir gtsubs nas me phyung / byang phyogs nas dmangs rigs gzhon nu zhig 'ongs pa dang / de la 'ga' zhig gis 'di skad du kye

dmangs rigs gzhon nu tshur tsan dan skam po las gtsub stan byos la steng du gtsub shing zhog ste me dbyung ba'i phyir gtsubs la me phyung shig ces smras pa dang / des tsan dan skam po las gtsub stan byas nas steng du gtsub shing

bzhag ste me dbyung ba'i phyir gtsubs nas me phyung ba dang / de dag 'ga' zhig gis gcig tu bsdus nas 'dam bu bcer ba 'am/ sog ma'i phung por bcug na rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/ mi rigs tha dad pas shing sna tshogs
las phyung ba'i me de las ji ga me 'di ni 'od dang ldan pa/ kha dog dang ldan pa/ gsal ba'o// //'dul ba gzhi/ bam po sum bcu rtsa gsum pa/ me 'di ni de lta ma yin no/ /me 'dis ni me'i

bya ba byed nus so/ /me 'dis ni mi nus so zhes bya ba'i khyad par ram/ bsam pa 'am/ tha dad du bya ba 'ga' yod dam/ 'on te me de thams cad 'od dang ldan pa/ kha dog dang ldan pa/ gsal ba yin zhing me de thams cad

kyis me'i bya ba byed nus/ kye gau ta ma zhugs de thams cad 'od dang ldan pa/ kha dog dang ldan pa/ gsal ba lags shing zhugs de thams cad kyis zhugs kyi bgyi ba bgyid rngo thog lags so/ /rgyal po chen po de bzhin du

bag yod pas thob pa gtso bos gtsubs pa'i me de la ni 'di lta ste/ rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba la khyad par dang / bsam pa dang / tha dad du bya ba 'ga' yang med do/ /shes ldan gau ta mas de skad gsungs pa ni rigs pa'i tshul

lags so/ /re zhig zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du skabs phye na shes ldan khyod la bdag gzhan yang phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu lags so/ /rgyal po chen po ci dang ci 'dod pa zhus shig /kye gau ta ma lha rnams mchis sam/ rgyal po chen po lha gang dag

yin par shes/ lha gang dag sha khon dang bcas/ 'gran zla dang bcas/ gnod pa dang bcas shing 'di lta bur 'ong zhing 'ong bar 'gyur ba 'am/ lha gang dag sha khon med/ 'gran zla med/ gnod pa med cing 'di lta bur mi 'ong zhing 'ong bar mi 'gyur ba yin/

lha de dag ni re shig der bas/ lha gang dag sha khon dang bcas/ 'gran zla dang bcas/ gnod pa dang bcas shing / 'di lta bur mchi zhing mchi bar 'gyur ba'i lha de dag tshe bas/ sug las bas/ bsod nams bas nas gnas/

de nas 'chi 'pho bar 'gyur ba de na lha 'am lha'i bus/ lha 'am lha'i bu gnas de nas 'chi 'pho bar bgyi ba 'am/ spyug par rngo thog lags sam/ rgyal po chen po lha gang dag sha khon dang bcas/ 'gran zla dang bcas/ gnod pa dang

bcas shing 'di lta bur 'ong zhing 'ong bar 'gyur ba de dag las zad/ tshe zad bsod nams zad nas gnas de nas 'chi 'pho bar 'gyur ba de na lha 'am lha'i bus/ lha 'am lha'i bu gnas de nas 'chi 'pho bar bya ba 'am/ spyug par mi nus

so/ /kye gau ta ma de na lha gang dag sha khon dang bcas/ 'gran zla dang bcas/ gnod pa dang bcas shing 'di lta bur mchi zhing mchi bar 'gyur ba de dag gis lha gnod pa ma mchis pa de dag gnas de nas 'chi 'pho bar bgyi ba 'am/

spyug pa'i rngo thog lags sam/ de nas sde dpon 'phags skyes pos ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la 'di skad ces smras so/ /dge sbyong gau ta ma ni 'di skad ces lha rnams ni tshe lhag par ring ba/ lhag par yun ring du gnas pa

yin no zhes gsung bar 'gyur ba gang lags pa'i gnas de mchis so/ /de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs na rdul yab thogs nas bcom ldan 'das la g.yob cing 'dug par gyur to/ /

de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'di snyam du sems te/ sde dpon lus 'phags po 'di ni ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi bu yin la/ bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi chos nyid kyi sras yin pas sras dang bu ni lhan cig gtam

byar rung ngo snyam du rig nas sde dpon lus 'phags po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /sde dpon ji snyam du sems/ ko sa la'i rgyal po'i rang gi yul yin la/ de na yang de'i tshig gis khrims su bca' ba la dbang sgyur na sems can dbang

chung ngu kha cig gnas de nas 'chi 'pho bar bya ba 'am/ spyug par nus sam/ dge sbyong nus so/ /sde dpon ji snyam du sems/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi rang gi yul ma yin la/ de na yang de'i tshig gis khrims su

bca' ba la dbang mi sgyur na/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis sems can dbang chung ba kha cig gnas de nas 'chi 'pho bar bya ba 'am/ spyug par nus sam/ dge sbyong ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal rang gi yul ma yin la/

de na yang de'i tshig gis khrims su bca' ba la dbang mi sgyur na/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis sems can dbang chung ngu kha cig gnas de nas 'chi 'pho bar bya ba 'am/ spyug par mi nus so/ /sde dpon khyod kyis sum bcu rtsa

gsum pa'i lha rnams yod skad thos sam/ dge sbyong ko sa la'i bdag po rgyal po 'di nyid las thos so/ /sde dpon ji snyam du sems/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams gnas de nas

'chi 'pho bar bya ba 'am/ spyug par nus sam/ dge sbyong re shig ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams mthong ba yang nyams su mi myong na gnas de nas 'chi 'pho bar bya ba 'am/ spyug pa lta smos

kyang ci dgos/ sde dpon de bzhin du gnod pa dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis gnod pa med pa'i lha rnams mthong ba yang nyams su mi myong na gnas de nas 'chi 'pho bar bya ba 'am/ spyug pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te de ni gnas med do/ /

de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /kye gau ta ma dge sbyong 'di'i ming ci lags/ rgyal po chen po kun dga' bo yin no/ /shes ldan kun dga' bos de skad du smras pa ni rigs

pa'i tshul yin no/ /shes ldan kun dga' bos de skad du smras pa ni shin tu rigs pa'i tshul yin no/ /de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /re zhig gal te zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du/

shes ldan gau ta ma la bdag zhu ba gzhan yang phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu lags so/ /rgyal po chen po gang dang gang 'dod pa zhus shig /kye gau ta ma ci lags/ tshangs pa de mchis lags sam/ rgyal po chen po tshangs pa

gang yin par shes tshangs pa gang zhig gnod pa dang bcas pas 'di lta bur 'ong bar 'gyur ba 'am/ tshangs pa gang zhig gnod pa med pas 'di lta bur mi 'ong zhing 'ong bar mi 'gyur ba yin/ kye gau ta ma bdag ni de la tshangs pa gang zhig

gnod pa ma mchis pas 'di lta bur mi mchi zhing mchi bar mi 'gyur ba'i tshangs pa de lags par 'tshal lo/ /ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig skabs kyi gtam de lta bu glengs so/ /de nas

mi des bkra shis ldan gyi bu bram ze'i khye'u yang dag rgyal ba khrid nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha de 'di lags so/ /

de nas bkra shis ldan gyi bu bram ze'i khye'u yang dag rgyal bas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la rgyal ba dang tshe spel ba dag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang bkra shis ldan gyi bu bram ze'i khye'u

yang dag rgyal ba can la ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis 'di skad ces smras so/ /bram ze'i khye'u nyi ma snga ma dang / tshes snga ma la rgyal po'i pho brang du rgyal po dang blon po dang 'khor rnams 'dus shing 'dug pa na/ dge sbyong gau ta ma 'di

skad ces dge sbyong dang bram ze gzhan gyis thams cad shes pa 'am/ mthong ba gang yin pa ni gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med de de ni gnas med do zhes gsung ngo zhes pa'i gtam de lta bu sus smras dran nam/ lha dran lags te

'di lta ste/ sde dpon 'phags skyes po de skad mchi'o/ /'di lta ste/ bkra shis ldan gyi bu bram ze'i khye'u yang dag rgyal ba'o zhes de dag phan tshun de ltar gtam khungs 'byin par byed do/ /de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi rim gro

pa'i mis ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha gshegs pa'i dus la bab lags so/ /lha dus la bab lags so/ /de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces

gsol to/ /shes ldan gau ta ma bdag gis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las brtsams te zhu ba zhus pa yang shes ldan gau ta mas bdag la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid zhu ba zhus pa lung bstan lags/ 'dir rigs rnam par dag pa dang /

lhag pa'i lha dang / lhag pa'i tshangs pa las brtsams te/ shes ldan gau ta ma la bdag gis zhu ba zhus pa yang shes ldan gau ta mas bdag la lhag pa'i tshangs pa zhu ba zhus pa lung bstan lags te/ shes ldan gau ta ma la bdag gis

zhu ba gang dang gang zhus pa de dang de kho na shes ldan gau ta mas bdag la zhu ba lung bstan lags pas/ shes ldan gau ta ma la bdag gis gzhan gsol du ci mchis/ shes ldan gau ta ma bdag ni bgyi ba dang bsgrub pa mang lags pas

da mchi lags so/ /rgyal po chen po de'i dus la bab par shes par gyis shig /de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste yi rangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs

gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das ko sa la nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang mnyan yod du byon nas mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin

gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das ko sa la nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang mnyan yod du byon nas mnyan yod na bdag kho na'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs
so zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /phyogs
gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/ yang dag par gzeng

stod par mdzad/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/ rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug yang dag par gzeng bstod yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi

gsung ngo / /de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan

'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol zhes bya ba nas/ stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos nyan

pa'i phyir 'dug go zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par

mdzad/ yang dag par gzeng stod par mdzad/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/ rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug yang dag par gzeng stod yang dag
par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so/ /bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa skabs skabs su gdugs tshod gsol bar byed pa na/

dge slong rnams kyis thog mar sprang po rnams la kha zas chung zad byin pa dang / bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams 'phya bar byed pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/

rang gis longs spyad nas lhung bzed kyi lhag ma la sbyin par bya'o/ de na sprang po gnyis po bram ze'i khye'u zhig dang / rgyal rigs kyi khye'u zhig yod pa las/ bram ze'i khye'us dus ma shes nas de dang por slong bar brtsams pa las/

de la dge slong 'gas kyang chung zad kyang ma byin no/ /rgyal rigs kyi khye'us phyi nas slong ba dang / des phal cher rnyed nas des bram ze'i khye'u la smras pa/ khyod kyis cung zad rnyed dam/ des khros nas smras pa/ gal te kho bo la dbang

zhig yod na shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong thams cad mgo drung nas bcad de sa la dor ba zhig /rgyal rigs kyi khye'us smras pa/ gal te kho bo la 'byor pa zhig yod na kho bos nyi ma re re sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la

zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pas bstabs pa zhig /de gnyis de ltar gcig la gcig smra zhing mnyan yod nas byung nas shing drung zhig tu nyal ba dang / shing rtas 'khyam pa zhig phyogs der 'ongs te/ des bram ze'i khye'u de'i

mgo bcad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba de la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ chos rnams sngon du yid 'gro yid gtso yin/ /yid mgyogs rab tu sdang ba'i yid kyis ni/ /smras sam byas na de nas sdug bsngal de/ /

'thob 'gyur 'khor lo 'phyan pas mgo bo bcad/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bka' stsal pa de'i don ci lags/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis bram ze'i khye'u

sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la sems gdug pas tshig rtsub po phyung ba gang yin pa de mthong ngam/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so/ /de sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la sems gdug pas tshig

rtsub po phyung nas mnyan yod nas byung ste shing drung zhig tu nyal ba dang / shing rtas 'khyam pas de'i mgo bcad par gyur to/ /ngas de las dgongs nas/ chos rnams sngon du yid 'gro yid gtso yin/ zhes bya ba nas snga ma bzhin du/ 'thob
'gyur 'khor lo 'phyan pas mgo bo bcad/ /ces bya ba'i bar gsungs so/ /de'i tshe mnyan yod na tshong dpon zhig bu med par shi'o/ /mnyan yod kyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams 'dus nas smras pa/ su zhig

tshong dpon du gzhug /kha cig gis smras pa/ su bsod nams kyi mthu chen po dang ldan pa'o/ /ji ltar shes par bya/ brtag mod ces de nas de rnams brtag par brtsams pa las/ de rnams kyis rgyal rigs kyi khye'u de shing

gi grib ma la nyal ba na shing gzhan rnams kyi grib ma yol bar gzhol/ yol bar 'bab/ yol bar bab na/ shing de'i grib ma ni khye'u de'i lus las ma yol bar mthong nas/ de rnams kyis de bslang ste tshong dpon du dbang bskur

ba dang de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag la dpal gyi 'byor pa'i skal ba ci yod pa de dag thams cad ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la brten te yin gyis/ ma la bdag gis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu

gdugs tshod la spyan drang ngo snyam nas/ de bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ bcom

ldan 'das kyis tshong dpon de la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/ yang dag par gzeng stod par mdzad/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/ rnam grangs

du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par gzeng bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo / /de nas tshong dpon de stan las langs te bla gos phrag

pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu sang bdag gi sdum par

gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol zhes bya ba nas stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de nas bcom

ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin mkhyen nas/ de dang 'thun pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad de zhes bya ba nas/ thog ma med pa'i

dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ btsun pa bdag ni 'phags so/ /mngon par 'phags so zhes bya

ba dang / bdag bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyis/ bdag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/ deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsdos te skyabs su mchi bar mngon

par dad lags so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u tshong dpon de la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par gzeng bstod/
yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang du gshegs nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa la bzhugs te tshigs su bcad

de bka' stsal pa/ chos rnams sngon du yid 'gro yid gtso yin/ /yid mgyogs rab tu dang ba'i yid kyis ni/ /smras sam byas na de nas bde ba de/ /'thob 'gyur grib ma yol bar mi 'gyur bzhin/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa
kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pas bka' stsal pa de'i don ci lags/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis rgyal rigs kyi khye'u sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la sems dang

ba bskyed pa gang yin pa de mthong ngam/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so/ /de sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la sems dang ba bskyed nas mnyan yod nas byung ste shing drung zhig tu nyal ba las

mnyan yod kyi bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gis tshong dpon du dbang bskur nas/ de mthong ba'i chos kho na la longs spyod mngon par 'phel bar gyur to/ /ngas de las dgongs nas/ chos rnams sngon du yid 'gro yid gtso yin/ /zhes bya ba nas

snga ma bzhin du 'thob 'gyur grib ma yol bar mi 'gyur bzhin/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gsungs so/ /gdub bu can du byon nas gdub bu can du sangs rgyas bzhi'i gdan zhes bya ba rgyas par gong ma bzhin du'o/ /sa can du byon nas sa can du

sangs rgyas bzhi'i gdan zhes bya ba gong ma bzhin du'o/ /seng ge can gyi grong du byon nas seng ge can gyi grong du sangs rgyas bzhi'i gdan zhes bya ba rgyas par gong ma bzhin du'o/ /grong gsar du byon nas grong gsar du sangs rgyas

bzhi'i gdan zhes bya ba gong ma bzhin du'o/ /grong khyer can du byon nas grong khyer can du sangs rgyas bzhi'i gdan zhes bya ba gong ma bzhin du'o/ /rgyal po'i khab tu byon nas de'i tshe kun du rgyu khri'u brtsegs zhes bya ba ma ga d+ha bzang

mo'i rdzing gi 'gram na gnas te/ de mtshan mo mchil pas nya bshor cing za bar byed do/ /de nam langs nas ni khri'u'i steng du khri'u bzhag pa la 'dug nas tshigs su bcad pas smra ste/ chos kyi chos mchog gis 'tsho srog

chags dag /'ga' la yang 'tshe mi byed dge slong 'gyur/ /zhi ba'i yid kyis spong dang brtul zhugs spyad/ /dul ba de ni zhi ba'i rjes su 'thun/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i gdul ba'i dus mkhyen nas de'i drung du gshegs

te bka' stsal pa/ tshigs bcad de ni ji lta bar/ /gal te khyod kyang de 'dra na/ /khyod kyang dam par brtsir rung na/ /spong ba khyod ni de mi 'dra/ /re zhig nye bar zhi zhing dul ba dang / /srog chags 'ga' la'ang 'tshe bar ma

byed par/ /zhi ba'i yid kyis spong dang brtul zhugs spyod/ /dul ba de ni zhi ba'i rjes su mthun/ /gang la lus dang ngag dang yid kyis ni/ /nyes par byas pa yod pa ma yin la/ /gang zhig gnas gsum dag gis bsdams

gyur pa/ /dul ba de ni zhi ba'i rjes su mthun/ /de nas kun du rgyu khri'u brtsegs kyis bsams pa/ dge sbyong gau ta ma'i thugs kyis ni bdag gi sems mkhyen to snyam du rig nas mngon par dad par gyur to/ /de nas
bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin mkhyen nas de dang mthun pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos bshad mdzad de/ thos pas kun

du rgyu khri'u brtsegs zhes bya ba nas thog ma med pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/ /

dge slong dag gis de khri'u'i steng du khri'u bzhag pa la 'dug pa mthong nas/ dge slong zhig gis khri'u'i steng du khri'u bzhag ste chos mnyan na de bden pa'i snod du gyur kyang bden pa ma mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis

dgongs pa/ ci'i phyir dge slong 'dis bden pa ma mthong snyam na ma gus pas yin par gzigs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ nyes dmigs gang ci byung ba de ni dge slong dag khri'u'i steng

du khri'u bzhag nas 'dug pa yin no snyam nas de lta bas na dge slong gis khri'u'i steng du khri'u bzhag pa la 'dug par mi bya'o/ /'dug na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab nas n+ya gro d+har byon

nas de nas snga dro sham thabs mnabs/ na bza' chos gos dang lhung bzed bsnams te n+ya gro d+har bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang / ser skya'i gzhi'i bram ze'i bu mo zhig n+ya gro d+har bag mar btang ba dang / bram ze'i bu mos bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen

po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus mdzes pa/ sku 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ 'od zer nyi ma stong bas lhag pa/ gshegs na rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun nas

bzang ba mthong ngo / /mthong ma thag tu de 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni shAkya'i rigs dga' ba las 'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs kyi rgyal srid kyang spangs/ btsun mo mang po dang / mdzod dang / bang mdzod kyi 'byor pa

rnams kyang spangs nas rab tu byung ba de yin te/ de da ltar bsod snyoms la rgyus/ gal te bdag las bsod snyoms kyi zan bzhes na ni de la bdag gis dbul lo snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis de'i sems mkhyen nas lhung

bzed bzed de/ sring mo gal te khyod kyis yongs su btang na lhung bzed 'dir phul cig /de nas de lhag par dad pa skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis bdag gi sems mkhyen to snyam du rig nas dad pa drag pos bcom

ldan 'das la bsod snyoms kyi zan phul ba dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe zhes bya ba nas/ mdzod spur nub par gyur to

zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ rgyu ma mchis rkyen ma mchis par ni zhes bya ba nas/ 'dzum pa mdzad ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /kun dga' bo khyod

kyis bram ze'i bu mo gang zhig dad pa skyes nas nga la bsod snyoms kyi zan phul ba de mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong lags so/ /kun dga' bo bram ze'i bu mo de dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bskal pa bcu gsum du log par 'gro bar mi 'gyur zhing

lha dang mi rnams su nying mtshams sbyar cing 'khor nas srid pa phyi ma dang / skye gnas phyi ma dang / lus phyi ma dang / bdag gis ngo bo thob pa phyi ma la rang sangs rgyas shin tu legs smon zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /kun du bram ze'i bu mo che ge mo zhig

dad pa skyes nas bcom ldan 'das la bsod snyoms zan zhig phul bas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de rang byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes sgra grags so/ /de'i khyo me tog dang yam sreg shing gi phyir dgon par song ba des bdag gi chung mas dge sbyong

gau ta ma la bsod snyoms zan zhig phul bas/ dge sbyong gau ta mas de rang byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang mi bzod pa skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /shes

ldan gau ta ma bdag gi sdum par byon tam/ bram ze son to/ /shes ldan gau ta ma bdag gi mchis 'brang gis bsod snyoms bshos shig phul nas khyod kyis de rang byang chub tu lung bstan skad na mad dam/ bram ze bden no/ /kye gau ta ma khyod 'khor los

sgyur ba'i rgyal srid spangs nas rab tu byung na/ da bsod snyoms bshos tsam gyi slad du ji ltar shes bzhin gyi brdzun gyi tshig gsung / sa bon 'di tsam gyi 'bras bu 'di'o zhes bgyi ba khyod la su zhig yid ches par 'gyur/ bram ze de'i phyir khyod nyid

la dri yis/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lan thob shig /bram ze ji snyam du sems/ khyod kyis ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos mthong ba 'ga' yod dam/ kye gau ta ma re shig ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos gzhan lta zhog /n+ya gro d+ha 'di nyid du

ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos shig mthong ba de re shig gson cig /kye gau ta ma n+ya gro d+ha 'di'i shar phyogs na n+ya gro d+ha'i shing chen po zhig mchis te/ de'i ming gis grong 'di n+ya gro d+ha zhes bgyi'o/ /de'i 'og na shing rta lnga brgya ma reg cing phan tshun ma

thug par mchis lags so/ /bram ze n+ya gro d+ha de'i sa bon tshad ji tsam zhig yod/ ci re shig zhing rnang tsam 'am/ kye gau ta ma ma lags so/ /re lde tsam 'am/ til 'dru ba'i 'khor lo tsam 'am/ shing rta'i 'khor lo tsam 'am/ ba'i ko ba tsam 'am/ bil

ba tsam 'am/ ka pid tha'i 'bras bu tsam 'am/ kye gau ta ma ma lags so/ /kye gau ta ma ye yungs kar gyi bzhi cha tsam mchis lags so/ /bram ze sa bon de tsam gyi 'bras bu shing chen po de tsam zhig skyes so zhes bya ba khyod la su zhig yid ches par

'gyur/ shes ldan gau ta ma yid ches kyang rung ma ches kyang rung bdag gi mngon sum du gyur lags so/ /kye gau ta ma re shig zhing snag che ba ser sme ba dog sa tshwa sgo ma mchis pa'i phyogs su sa bon sar pa grung po ma nyams par mchis pa la dus dus

su lhas char phab na des na shing n+ya gro d+ha chen po 'dir 'khrungs lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba de la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ bram ze khyod kyis ji lta bur/ /zhing dang sa bon mngon sum ltar/ /de bzhin las kyi rnam smin yang / /

de bzhin gshegs pa'i mngon sum mo/ /ji ltar bram ze khyod kyi sa bon ni/ /chung dang shin tu shing chen de mthong ba/ /bram ze ngas kyang sa bon chung ngu dang / /phun sum chen po de yang de bzhin mthong / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal nas ljags brkyang bas

dbu skra la thug pa'i bar zhal gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad g.yogs nas bram ze de la bka' stsal pa/ bram ze de ji snyam du sems/ gang gi zhal nas ljags byung bas zhal gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad yog par byed pa de ci ga 'khor los sgyur

ba'i rgyal srid stong gi phyir yang shes bzhin du brdzun gyi tshig gsung ngam/ kye gau ta ma ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ nga yi ljags ni sgyu med bden pas bskyed pa dag /ci ga mi bden pa ni gsung bar

'gyur srid dam/ /bram ze nga yis ji skad bshad pa de bzhin bas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yin zhes rtogs par bya ba'i rigs/ /de nas bram ze de mngon par dad nas de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams

dang / rang bzhin mkhyen nas zhes bya ba nas/ thog ma med pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ btsun pa bdag ni 'phags

so/ /mngon par 'phags so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /bdag bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyis bdag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/ deng slan chad ji

srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsdos te skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dad lags so/ /de nas bram ze de bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' nas yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo

bos phyag byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo // // sdom la/ kim pi la dang sbrul gdugs dang / /ma thu la dang yul 'khor skyong / /glang chen grong dang grong khyer che/ /srug na dang ni bram ze'i grong / /

grong khyer nag po ro hi ta/ /gsing ma can dang de bzhin du/ /dga' ba 'phel bas tshogs su ni/ /byas te yang dag brjod pa yin/ /bcom ldan 'das kim pi lar byon nas kim pi la'i nags khrod na bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan

'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kim pi la la bka' stsal pa/ kim pi la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la brtsams te bsgom pa khyod la bshad kyis/ de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad do zhes de skad bka' stsal pa na/ tshe dang ldan pa kim pi

la cang mi smra'o/ /lan gnyis su yang de bzhin/ lan gsum du yang de bzhin brjod par bya'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos tshe dang ldan pa kim pi la la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa kim pi la khyod la ston pa gsung ngo / /tshe dang

ldan pa kun dga' bo 'tshal to/ /tshe dang ldan pa gau ta ma rab tu 'tshal to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de'i dus la bab lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa de'i dus la

bab lags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi las brtsams te bsgom pa bshad na/ de'i slad du dge slong rnams kyis thos nas 'dzin par 'gyur lags so/ /kun dga' bo de'i phyir legs par

nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad do/ /'di la dge slong gang yang grong dang grong rdal zhes bya ba dang / dran bzhin du dbugs brngubs na dbugs brngubs so zhes slob ste zhes bya ba nas/ 'gog pa'i rjes su lta zhing dbugs phyung ba slob

ste zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /gang gi tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos dran bzhin du dbugs brngubs na/ dran bzhin du dbugs brngubs so zhes slob pa zhes bya ba nas/ lus kyi 'du byed shin tu sbyangs te lus

la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing dbugs phyung ngo zhes slob ste zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de'i tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas so/ /de'i tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos gnas pa

na nang gi yid la byed pa yod par shes so/ /kun dga' bo dper na lam po che'i bzhi mdor rdul gyi mchod rten zhig brtsigs par 'gyur la de nas shar phyogs nas bzhon pa can nam/ khyogs sam/ shing rtas 'khyam pa

zhig 'ongs na/ kun dga' bo ji snyam du sems/ rdul gyi mchod rten 'jig par 'gyur ram/ btsun pa 'gyur lags so/ /de bzhin du gang gi tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos dran bzhin du dbugs brngubs so/ /zhes bya ba

nas nang gi yid la byed pa yod par shes pa zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /gang gi tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos dga' ba so sor myong ba zhes bya ba nas/ sems kyi 'du byed shin tu sbyangs te tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i

rjes su lta zhing dbugs phyung ngo zhes/ slob bo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de'i tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos gnas pa na nang gi yid la byed pa yod par shes so/ /dper na kun dga' bo lam po che'i gzhi mdor rdul gyi

mchod rten zhig brtsigs par gyur la/ de nas lho phyogs nas bzhon pa can nam/ khyogs sam/ shing rtas 'khyam pa zhig 'ongs na zhes bya ba nas/ tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjes su lta'o zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin

du'o/ /de'i tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos gnas pa na nang gi yid la byed pa yod par shes so gang gi tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos sems so sor myong ba dang / sems rab tu dga' ba dang / sems mnyam par 'jog pa dang sems

rnam par grol bar byed cing dbugs brngubs na sems rnam par grol bar byed cing dbugs brngubs so zhes slob bo/ /sems rnam par grol bar byed cing dbugs phyung na sems rnam par grol bar byed cing dbugs phyung ngo zhes slob

ste/ sems la sems kyi rjes su lta'o/ /gang gi tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos gnas pa na nang gi yid la byed pa yod par shes te mchod rten de nyid la nub phyogs nas zhes dper bya'o/ /de lus de dang tshor ba de dang sems de la brnab sems

yid mi bde ba gnyis ka nub pas chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing btang snyoms su gnas so/ /de'i tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos gnas pa na nang gi yid la byed pa yod par shes te dper na lam po che'i bzhi mdor rdul gyi mchod

rten brtsigs par gyur la/ de nas byang phyogs nas bzhon pa can nam khyogs sam/ shing rtas 'khyam pa zhig 'ongs na/ kun dga' bo ji snyam du sems/ rdul gyi mchod rten 'jig par 'gyur ram/ btsun pa de ltar 'gyur lags

so zhes bya ba nas de ltar chos la chos kyi rjes su lta ba zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de'i tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos gnas pa na nang gi yid la byed pa yod par shes te/ kun dga' bo de ltar na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi'i

dbang du byas te/ bsgoms pa yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das ri 'or zhig tu byon to/ /ri 'or de na tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po'i zhang po drang srong rnams kyi nang du rab tu byung ba de tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos

'dul bar 'gyur bas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ maud gal gyi bu zhang po la soms shig /btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen

pos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan te/ de'i gdul ba'i dus shes nas drang srong rnams kyi bsti gnas su 'jug par brtsams so/ /de nas drang srong des smras pa/ dge sbyong 'dug shig /bram ze rnams kyi bsti gnas 'dir ma 'jug

shig /des smras pa/ nga yang bram ze yin no/ /drang srong des tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ bram ze khyod la bsang byed med/ /glugs gzar yang ni yod ma yin/ /khyod ni mgo reg me mchod min/ /bram ze bdag ces ci ste

smra/ /tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos kyang tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ bram ze nga yi ngo tsha shes/ bsang byed glugs gzar shes rab nyid/ /chu rgyun rtag 'bab dad pa ni/ /nga yi ril ba spyi blugs yin/ /nang du legs par

mnyam bzhag pa'i/ /bden pa kho bo me mchod de/ /yang dag sdom dang dul ba yis/ /nyin mtshan du ni sbyin sreg byed/ /gal te de ltar gyur na yang dge sbyong mgo reg la ni 'dir skabs mi 'byed do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu

chen pos rlung dang char drag btang nas mtsho bran dang nye ba zhig tu song nas shing zhig gi drung du rten cing 'dug go/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' bo'i 'khor zhig gnas pa des bsams pa/ 'di ni 'phags pa maud gal gyi bu

chen po yin te/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' bo gnyis kyis bla mar bya ba yin gyis/ ma la bdag gis 'di'i mchod pa bya ba la brtson par bya'o snyam ste/ klu de gnas nas byung nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po'i lus

la lan bdun du dkris te steng nas mgo'i gdengs ka chen po byas nas 'dug go/ /drang srong rnams kyi chos nyid kyis gal te sdug bsngal la ma bsams na drang srong gi chos las nyams par 'gyur bas de nas drang srong de

'di snyam du sems te/ rab tu byung ba de rlung dang char drag gis nyen nas shi bar gyur te/ bdag drang srong gi chos las nyams par gyur na mi rung ngo snyam nas/ de nas bsti gnas de nas phyir byung ste/ blta bar brtsams pa na des de

mthong nas smras pa/ kye rab tu byung ba kho bo cag gi bsti gnas su zhugs shig /des smras pa/ drang srong chen po khyod drang srong gi chos de las nyams par gyur tam/ drang srong des de'i nga ro las ngo shes nas smras pa/ 'phags pa maud gal gyi bu chen po

lags sam/ drang srong bdag skye bos de ltar shes so/ /'phags pa don ci zhig la byon/ khyod nyid kyi gdul ba'i dus shes nas 'ongs so tshur spyon bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du bzhud do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos zhang

po khrid nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad

ces gsol to/ /bdag gi zhang po drang srong gi nang du rab tu byung ba 'di lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di la chos bshad pa'i rigs so/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang khams dang

rang bzhin mkhyen nas de dang mthun pa'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ de thos pas drang srong des phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas nas de nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das

gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob pa

lta na/ bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de dge slong tshur shog zhes bya bas rab tu phyung ngo zhes bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pas tshur shog bka' stsal pas/

skra byi snam sbyar gyon pa'i lus ldan zhing / /mod la dbang po rab zhir gnas gyur te/ /sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus gzugs bkab par gyur/ /ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po

song ba dang klu gzhon nu de gnas de na gcig tu mi dga' bar gyur nas/ de nas ri 'or der yams kyi nad dag btang ste/ bdag nyid drang srong gi cha byad du mngon par sprul nas bsti gnas der song ste gnas so/ /de nas ri 'or na gnas pa'i

skye bo'i tshogs de bsti gnas der lhags nas de rnams kyis smras pa/ drang srong chen po bdag cag la yams kyi nad byung na bdag cag gis ji ltar bgyi/ drang srong gis smras pa/ phyogs 'di nyid du shog la 'dug shig dang /

zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas ri 'or na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs de phyogs der lhags nas gnas so/ /phyogs der sbrul gyis gdugs byas pas sbrul gdugs sbrul gdugs shes bya bar grags te/ dad pa can rnams kyis
gtsug lag khang yo byad thams cad yod pa zhig brtsigs so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ma thul na 'bab chu rab tu bzang ldan zhes bya ba'i 'gram slob pa rnams kyi a mra'i tshal na bzhugs so/ /de nas

bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag bdag nyid gling dang / bdag nyid skyabs dang chos kyi gling dang / chos kyi skyabs la gnas par bya'i/ gling gzhan ma yin/ skyabs gzhan ma yin no/ /

dge slong dag khyed kyis bdag nyid gling dang bdag nyid skyabs dang / chos kyi gling dang chos kyi skyabs kyis gnas par bya'i/ gling gzhan ma yin zhing skyabs gzhan ma yin pa 'di la so sor yang dag par bslab par bya'o/ /

mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams ni ji lta bu zhig yin/ gang zhig yod na ci la brten nas ci la mngon par zhen te/ bdag ni ci yin zhes rjes su lta ba rnams la mya ngan dang /

smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa gang dag ma skyes pa ni skye zhing skyes pa rnams ni phyir zhing 'phel zhing rgyas par 'gyur/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ni chos rnams kyi rtsa ba lags bcom ldan 'das ni 'dren pa lags bcom

ldan 'das ni ston pa lags pas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid dge slong rnams la bshad na/ bcom ldan 'das las dge slong rnams kyis thos nas 'dzin par 'gyur lags so/ /dge slong dag de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig

dang bshad do/ /dge slong dag gzugs yod na gzugs la brten nas gzugs la mngon par zhen te gzugs ni bdag yin no zhes rjes su lta ba rnams la mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba dang 'khrug pa

gang dag ma skyes pa ni skye zhing skyes pa rnams ni phyir zhing 'phel zhing rgyas par 'gyur/ dge slong dag tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yod na/ rnam par shes pa la brten nas rnam par shes pa la

mngon par zhen te rnam par shes pa ni bdag yin no zhes rjes su lta ba rnams la mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa gang dag ma skyes pa ni skye zhing skyes pa rnams ni phyir zhing 'phel

zhing rgyas par 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag khyed kyis ltos shig ces bya ba nas/ dran bzhin du dbugs brngubs na brngubs so zhes slob ste/ tshor ba la tshor ba'i rjes su lta'o zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de'i tshe 'phags pa'i

nyan thos tshor ba la tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing gnas so/ /de'i tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos gnas pa na nang gi yid la byed pa yod par shes te/ dper na kun dga' bo lam po che'i bzhi mdor rdul gyi mchod rten zhig brtsigs

par gyur la lho phyogs nas bzhon pa can nam khyogs sam shing rtas 'khyam pa 'ongs na zhes bya ba nas/ tshor ba la tshor ba'i rjes su lta'o zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de'i tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos gnas pa na nang gi yid

la byed pa yod par shes so/ /gang gi tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos sems so sor myong ba dang sems rab tu dga' ba dang sems mnyam par 'jog pa dang sems rnam par grol bar byed cing dbugs brngubs so zhes slob pa dang sems rnam par grol bar

byed cing dbugs phyung na sems rnam par grol bar byed cing dbugs phyung ngo zhes slob ste sems la sems kyi rjes su lta ba de'i tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos sems la sems kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas so/ /de'i tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos gnas pa na

nang gi yid la byed pa yod par shes so/ /dpe ni nub phyogs nas khyogs 'ong ba de nyid bya'o de lus de dang tshor ba de dang sems de la brnab sems dang / yid mi bde ba de dag nub pas chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing btang snyoms su gnas so/ /de'i tshe 'phags

pa'i nyan thos chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas so/ /de'i tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos gnas pa na nang gi yid la byed pa yod par shes te/ 'di lta ste lam po che'i bzhi mdor rdul gyi mchod rten zhig brtsigs par gyur la/ de nas byang phyogs nas ni

bzhon pa can nam khyogs sam/ shing rtas 'khyam pa 'ongs na/ kun dga' bo ji snyam du sems/ rdul gyi mchod rten 'jig par 'gyur ram/ btsun pa de ltar 'gyur lags so zhes bya ba nas de ltar chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta'o zhes bya ba'i

bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de'i tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos gnas pa na nang gi yid la byed pa yod par shes te kun dga' bo de ltar na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la brten nas bsgoms pa yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das yul sgra ngan nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na

bang mdzod stug po can du byon nas/ bang mdzod stug po can na bang mdzod stug po can gyi tshal na bzhugs so/ /bang mdzod stug po can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das yul sgra ngan nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na bang mdzod stug po can

du byon nas/ bang mdzod stug po can na bang mdzod stug po'i tshal na bzhugs so zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang tshogs nas tshogs dang / khyu nas khyur 'dus shing phrad nas bang mdzod stug po can nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste lhags

pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bang mdzod stug po can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam

gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/ yang dag par gzeng stod par mdzad/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do// //'dul ba gzhi/ bam po sum bcu rtsa bzhi pa/ de'i tshe

khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong 'khor de nyid du 'dus shing 'dug par gyur to/ /de nas khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong 'di snyam du sems te/ ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag gis shes pa ltar na khyim pa khyim

na gnas pas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du tshangs par spyod pa gcig tu sal gyis dag pa/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ rnam par byang ba spyad pa 'di ni sla ba ma yin pas ma la bdag skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur

smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung ngo snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mar bang mdzod stug po can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam

gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par gzeng bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo / /de nas bang mdzod stug po can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis

gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste yi rangs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ngo / /khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong gis bang mdzod stug po can gyi

bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams dong nas ring po ma lon par rig nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces

gsol to/ /btsun pa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob pa lta na/ bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/ /

khyim bdag gi bu pha dang ma gnyis kyis gnang ngam/ btsun pa ma gnang ngo / /khyim bdag gi bu de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams ni pha dang ma gnyis kyis ma gnang ba rab tu 'byin pa dang /

bsnyen par rdzogs par mi byed do/ /btsun pa bdag gis ci nas pha dang mas gnang ba de ltar bgyi lags so/ /de nas khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste yi

rangs nas/ rang gi khyim gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / pha dang ma la 'di skad ces smras so/ /yab yum mkhyen par mdzod cig /bdag dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim ma mchis par rab tu 'byung bar bgyi'o/ /bu yul

'khor skyong shes par gyis shig /khyod nged kyi bu gcig pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba bzod pa mi mthun pa med pa yin pas khyod shi bar gyur na nged mi 'dod bzhin du 'bral grang / gson bzhin du ga la btang / yab yum gal te re shig

gnang na legs/ gal te ma gnang na deng slan bcad 'tshal ma yang mi 'tshal/ phyag yang mi 'tshal lo/ /de nas khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong gis nyi ma gcig kyang zan bcad pa byas so/ /gnyis dang gsum nas bdun gyi bar du zan

bcad pa byas so/ /de nas khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong gi pha dang mas khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bu yul 'khor skyong shes par gyis shig /khyod ni shin tu gzhon pa bde ba 'dod pa yin

pas khyod kyi sdug bsngal mi shes te/ tshangs par spyod pa spyad dka'o/ /rab tu dben pa bya dka'o/ /gcig pu nyid la mngon par dga' ba dka'o/ /gnas mal dgon pa dang / nags khrod dang / bas mthar gnas pa ni mnags

dka'o/ /bu yul 'khor skyong tshur 'dug la 'dod pa dag la yang spyod cig /sbyin pa dag kyang byin cig /bsod nams dag kyang gyis shig /de skad smras na khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong cang mi smra'o/ /de nas khyim

bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong gi pha dang mas nye du rnams la bcol ba/ kye nye du dag re shig bu yul 'khor skyong slong shig /de nas khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong gi nye du rnams khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong gang na

ba der dong ste phyin nas/ khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bu yul 'khor skyong mkhyen par mdzod cig /khyod ni shin tu gzhon pas bde ba bzhed pa lags zhes bya ba nas bsod nams dag gyis shig ces bya

ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de skad smras na khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong cang mi smra'o/ /de nas khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong gi pha dang mas yul 'khor skyong gi ne'u ldangs rnams la bcol ba/ kye gzhon nu dag re

shig bu yul 'khor skyong slong shig /de nas khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong gi ne'u ldangs rnams kyis yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye sras des pa yul 'khor skyong mkhyen par mdzod cig /khyod ni shin

du gzhon pas bde ba bzhed pa lags la zhes bya ba nas/ bsod nams dag mdzod cig ces bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin du'o/ /des de skad smras na khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong cang mi smra'o/ /de nas gzhon nu dag gis yul 'khor skyong

gi pha dang ma la 'di skad ces smras so/ /yab yum sras yul 'khor skyong 'di gum pas ci zhig bgyi/ rab tu 'byung du gnong dang / gal te dga' bar gyur na 'di gson po nyid du gzigs par 'gyur la/ gal te mngon par mi dga'

bar gyur na yang bu'i gnas pha ma gnyis ma lags pa gzhan su zhig mchis/ gzhon nu dag bdag cag la gal te rab tu byung nas lta bar byed na de bzhin du gnang bar bya'o/ /de nas yul 'khor skyong gi ne'u ldangs dag gis

khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces smras so/ /des pa yul 'khor skyong mkhyen par mdzod cig /pha dang mas gnang ste 'di skad ces gal te rab tu byung nas lta bar byed na'o zhes kyang zer ro/ /shes ldan dag blta bar bya'o/ /

de nas khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong rim gyis lus kyi mthu dang stobs bskyed nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go phyogs gcig tu
'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bdag ni pha dang mas gnang lags kyis/ btsun pa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la

rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob pa lta na/ bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/ /khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong gis legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul

ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong rab tu phyung bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas bang mdzod stug po can du ji tsam bzhed

kyi bar du bzhugs nas mnyan yod gang na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs te/ rim gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang mnyan yod du byon nas mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de nas tshe

dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong bsnyen par rdzogs te lo bcu lon nas dgra bcom pa thob ste rnam par grol ba'i dga' ba dang bde ba nyams su myong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ sngon bdag khyim par gyur pa na pha dang ma la rab tu byung nas blta bar

bya'o zhes khas blangs pa yod kyis/ ma la bdag gis khas blangs pa de mthar dbyung ngo snyam nas/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos

phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa sngon bdag khyim par gyur pa na pha dang ma la blta bar bgyi'o

zhes g.yar gyis blangs pas bdag g.yar gyis blangs pa de mthar 'byin du mchi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi sems khyab par mdzad cing khyab par mdzad nas thugs la mdzad cing / thugs la

mdzad nas 'di snyam du dgongs te/ rigs kyi bu yul 'khor skyong ni slar yang khyim na gnas pa 'am/ sogs 'jog spyod pas 'dod pa dag la longs spyod pa'i 'os ma yin no snyam du mkhyen nas/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces bka' stsal

to/ /yul 'khor skyong khyod song la sems can ma rgal ba rnams ni sgrol cig /ma grol ba rnams ni grol bar gyis shig dbugs ma phyin pa rnams ni dbugs phyung shig /yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams ni yongs su mya ngan las zlos shig /

de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste yi rang nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo / /de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul

'khor skyong de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs te/ mnyan yod du bsod snyoms spyad nas zas kyi bya ba byas te zas phyi ma'i bsod snyoms las slar

log nas gnas mal ji ltar spyad pa mkhos su phab ste lhung bzed dang chos gos blangs nas bang mdzod stug po can gang na ba der song ste/ rim gyis spyad pa spyod cing rgyu ba na bang mdzod stug po can du phyin nas/ bang mdzod stug po

can gyi bang mdzod stug po'i tshal du 'dug go/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas snga dro sham thabs bgos/ lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te bang mdzod stug po can du bsod snyoms la zhugs nas/

de rim gyis bang mdzod stug po can nas bsod snyoms la rgyu ba na rang gi khyim gang na der song nas/ de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi pha bar sgo'i khyams na skyes pa skra mkhan gyis skra dang kha spu 'chos pa na/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor

skyong gi phas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong sgo drung na 'dug pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang kha zer bar byed de/ dge sbyong mgo reg 'o ni dag gis kho bo'i rigs kyi rgyun bcad de/ 'o ni dag gis kho bo'i bu gcig pa sdug pa yid

du 'ong ba bzod pa mi mthun pa med pa yul 'khor skyong rab tu phyung bsnyen par rdzogs par byas na/ dge sbyong mgo reg 'o ni rnams la su zhig bsod snyoms sbyin par bya bar sems/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis rang gi

khyim nas rgya gag ma gtogs pa sbyin pa yang ma thob/ bskrad kyang ma bskrad pa dang myur ba myur bar phyir byung ngo / /de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi sngon gyi bran mo rgan mo zhig zan dron rul pa zhag lon pa zhig dor ba'i phyir thogs

te sgor byung ba dang / tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis sngon gyi bran mo rgan mo de mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang bran mo rgan mo de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /sring mo gal te zan dron rul pa zhag lon pa 'dor ba yin na kho bos bzas lhung bzed 'dir chug

shig /'phags pa gsol cig /de nas sngon gyi bran mo rgan mo des zan dron rul pa zhig lon pa lhung bzed du 'jug pa na tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / bzhin dang / sna dang / smre dngags dag gi mtshan ma shin tu legs

par bzung nas 'di skad ces kyang smras so/ /rje'i sras yul 'khor skyong lags sam/ sring mo kho bo skye bo dag gis de ltar shes so/ /de nas sngon gyi bran mo rgan mo de rings pa rings par tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi pha gang na ba der song ste phyin

nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi pha la 'di skad ces smras so/ /jo bo mkhyen par mdzod cig /sras yul 'khor skyong bang mdzod stug po can du byon nas ring mo zhig lags na nyid kyi khab tu ni byon mi bzhed do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan

pa yul 'khor skyong gi phas lag pa g.yon pas skra bsdus nas ras yug gcig gi smad g.yogs bgos bzhin du tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gang na ba der song ba dang / de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong rtsig drung zhig tu 'dug nas

zan dron rul pa zhag lon pa za bar byed pa dang / de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi phas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces smras so/ /yul 'khor skyong khyod bang mdzod stug po can du phyin nas ring mo zhig

lon na ci'i phyir rang gi khyim du 'jug par mi 'dod/ zan dron rul pa zhag lon pa khyod kyi gre bar yang ji ltar 'gror btub/ khyim bdag khyod kyi khyim du 'ongs na rgya gag ma gtogs pa sbyin pa yang ma thob/ bskrad kyang ma bskrad pa dang myur ba

myur bar byung ngo / /bu yul 'khor skyong yin par kho bos mi shes mod/ gal te kho bos shes na de skad mi smra ba zhig /bu yul 'khor skyong bzod par gsol lo/ /khyim bdag bzod do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi phas

tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong la yan lag thams cad kyis 'khyud pa byas nas rang gi khyim du stan bshams pa nyid la 'dug tu bcug go/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi ma la 'di skad ces smras so/ /

bu yul 'khor skyong yun ring zhig lon nas khyim du 'ongs kyis/ kye re shig khyod bdag nyid kyis snod du tshos la sta gon gyis shig dang de la bu yul 'khor skyong longs spyod par 'gyur ro/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi mas

rang nyid kyis snod du btsos nas sta gon byas so/ /de nas mi zhig gis tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi mdun du gser gyi phung po chen po gal te mi gcig pha rol na 'greng na mi gcig tshu rol na 'dug pa mi mthong la/ mi

gcig tshu rol na 'dug na gcig pha rol na 'greng ba mi mthong ba spungs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi mas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bu yul 'khor skyong khyod kyi ma la bud med rnams kyi

bud med kyi nor dang / bud med kyi bag rdzongs dang / bud med kyi khud pa zhes bya ba gang yin pa yang 'di snyed cig yod do/ /gzhan yang khyod kyi pha'i ni mtshan mas thebs pa'i gser dang sa le sbram yang brgya phrag du ma dang / stong phrag du ma

dang / brgya stong phrag du ma yod na phal gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos/ bu yul 'khor skyong tshur khyod 'dug la 'dod pa dag la yang yongs su spyod cig /sbyin pa dag kyang thong shig /bsod nams dag kyang gyis shig /khyim bdag gi chung ma

khyod gal te kho bo'i tshig la dad pas mnyan par bya bar sems pa lta na/ bdag gis gdams shing rjes su bstan to/ /bu yul 'khor skyong gdams ngag stsol cig /bu yul 'khor skyong rjes su ston cig dang / khyod kyi tshig

la bdag dad pas mnyan par bgyi'o snyam du sems so/ /khyim bdag gi chung ma tshur khyod kyis sha na'i ras sgye sar par byos la/ gser dang sa le sbram gyis khong ste shing rta'i nang du chug la chu bo gang gA'i rgyun shugs drag cing

gting zab pa gang na yod pa der 'or cig /gzhi de las khyod kyi mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams skye bar gyur ta re/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong

gi ma 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis de lta bu'i bya bas kyang bu yul 'khor skyong bzlog par bya ba ma nus so snyam mo/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi mas mna' ma la bcol ba/ kye bag sar re shig ji lta bu'i mnye

ba rnams kyis mnyes pa dang / khrus rnams kyis bkrus pa dang / dri rnams kyis byugs pa dang / gos rnams bskon pa dang / rgyan rnams kyis brgyan pa dang / bdug pa rnams kyis bdugs pa dang / phye ma rnams kyis gtor bas/

bu yul 'khor skyong de sngon khyim par gyur pa na dga' ba dang yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i mnye ba rnams kyis mnyes pa dang / khrus rnams kyis khrus dang / dri rnams kyis byugs pa dang / gos rnams bskon pa dang / rgyan rnams

kyis brgyan pa dang / bdug pa rnams kyis bdugs pa dang / phye ma rnams kyis gtor ba gyis la bu yul 'khor skyong gi rkang pa gnyis la gtugs la 'di skad ces/ gang gi slad du rje'i sras bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan

sngar tshangs par spyod pa lha'i bu mo ji lta bu zhig ces kyang smros shig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi sngon gyi chung mas ji lta bu'i mnye ba rnams kyis mnyes pa dang / khrus rnams kyis bkrus pa dang / dri rnams kyis byugs

pa dang / gos rnams bskon pa dang / rgyan rnams kyis brgyan pa dang / bdug pa rnams kyis bdugs pa dang / phye ma rnams kyis gtor bas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong sngon khyim par gyur pa na dga' ba dang yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i

mnye ba rnams kyis mnyes pa dang / khrus rnams kyis khrus dang / dri rnams kyis byugs pa dang / gos rnams bskon pa dang / rgyan rnams kyis brgyan pa dang / bdug pa rnams kyis bdugs pa dang / phye ma rnams kyis gtor ba byas nas

tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te 'di skad ces smras so/ /rje'i sras gang gi slad du bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa lha'i bu mo de ji lta bu zhig lags/ sring mo kho bo bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar

tshangs par spyod pa ni lha'i bu mo'i ched du ma yin no/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis sngon gyi chung ma la sring mo zhes tshig tu smras pas brgyal nas sa la 'gyel to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis pha dang ma la smras

pa de yab yum gal te kha zas btang ba lags na ci mi stsal tam/ btang snyoms su bzhag ste ci mtho btsam lags sam/ bu yul 'khor skyong longs spyod cig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi pha dang mas tshe dang ldan

pa yul 'khor skyong la gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas stobs shing tshim par byed de/ rnam grangs du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas bstabs shing tshim

par byas so/ /tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis zos nas lag pa bkrus te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khod do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis de'i tshe tshigs su

bcad de smras pa/ ltos shig lus ni nor bu dang / /rna rgyan gyis ni bkra byas pa 'ang / /nad dang slu ba'i chos can te/ /brtan par gnas pa yod ma yin/ /skra yi lan bu brgyad lhas shing / /mig ni mig sman gyis bskus pa 'ang / /

byis pa rmongs par byed nus kyi/ /pha rol tshol ba ma yin no/ /dri rnams kyis ni lus bskus la/ /rkang pa btsag gis byugs pa yang / /byis pa rmongs par byed nus kyi/ /pha rol tshol ba ma yin no/ /mig sman gser gyis

bkra byas shing / /dul ba'i lus ni brgyan pa yang / /byis pa rmongs par byed nus kyi/ /pha rol tshol ba ma yin no/ /ri dgas 'chor bas rnyi btsugs nas/ /ri dgas gzung bar ma nus ltar/ /rngon pa 'o dod 'bod bcug la/ /zos nas gnas

su 'gro bar bya/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis pha dang ma la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par gzeng bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byas nas de nyid nas

steng gi nam mkha' la song ngo / /de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong bang mdzod stug po can gang na ba der song ste phyin nas ba ru ra'i shing zhig gi drung du nyin par gnas par bya ba'i phyir 'dug go/ /de'i tshe rgyal po kau rab bya tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong

gi snyan pa yang sgrogs shing gnas te/ nam zhig na bdag shes ldan yul 'khor skyong mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur/ nam zhig na gal te zhu ba lung bstan pa'i phyir skabs phye na bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu bar 'gyur snyam mo/ /

de nas rgyal po kau rab byas tshal srung ba'i mi la bsgo ba/ kwa'i nang rje khyod song la myur du bang mdzod stug po can gyi tshal phyag dar byos shig /sang nga der bskyed mos tshal gyi sar 'gro'o/ /lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes skyes pa des rgyal

po kau rab bya'i ltar mnyan nas bang mdzod stug po can gyi tshal thams cad phyag dar byed pa na/ mi des tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong ba ru ra'i shing zhig gi drung na nyin par gnas par bya ba'i phyir 'dug pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang de 'di snyam du

sems te/ rgyal po kau rab bya gang gi snyan pa yang dang yang du sgrogs shing gnas te/ nam zhig na bdag shes ldan yul 'khor skyong mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur/ nam zhig na gal te zhu ba lung bstan pa'i phyir skabs phye na bdag

phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu bar 'gyur snyam pa'i shes ldan yul 'khor skyong de ni 'di yin te/ bang mdzod stug po can gyi 'di lta bu zhig tu phyin gyis/ ma la bdag gis rgyal po kau rab bya la sbran par bya'o snyam nas/ de nas skyes pa des rgyal

po kau rab bya gang na ba der song ste phyin nas rgyal po kau rab bya la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha gang gi snyan pa yang dang yang du sgrogs shing bzhugs la nam zhig na bdag shes ldan yul 'khor skyong mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur/ nam zhig

na gal te zhu ba lung bstan pa'i phyir skabs phye na bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu bar 'gyur snyam pa'i shes ldan yul 'khor skyong de ni de lags te/ bang mdzod stug po can gyi 'di lta bu zhig tu mchis lags te/ lha da de'i dus la bab par

dgongs su gsol/ de nas rgyal po kau rab byas mi gzhan zhig la bsgo ba/ kwa'i nang rje tshur bzhon pa bzang po myur du sdogs shig /de la nga zhon nas deng kho na shes ldan yul 'khor skyong blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o/ /lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes mi

des rgyal po kau rab bya'i ltar mnyan nas bzhon pa bzang po myur du bsdogs te/ rgyal po kau rab bya gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang / rgyal po kau rab bya la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha bcibs pa bzang po bsdogs lags te/ lha da de'i dus la

bab par dgongs su gsol/ de nas rgyal po kau rab bya bzhon pa bzang po la zhon nas bang mdzod stug po can nas byung ste/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong la blta ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir song nas/ de ji tsam bzhon pa'i bar du bzhon

pas song ste/ bzhon pa las babs nas rkang pa kho nas kun dga' ra bar zhugs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis rgyal po kau rab bya rgyang ring po kho na nas 'ongs pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces smras so/ /rgyal po chen po

rgyal po chen po byon pa legs so tshur spyon/ rgyal po chen po khyod nyid kyi yul lags pas bzhed na bdag kyang stan la g.yar drongs shig /kye yul 'khor skyong bdag gi yul lags mod kyi/ 'on kyang yul 'khor skyong gis bdag stan la

g.yar drang bar 'tshal lo/ /rgyal po chen po gdan mchis kyis gal te bzhed na bzhugs shig /de nas rgyal po kau rab bya tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong dang lhan cig mngon du yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / mgu bar 'gyur ba'i

gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas rgyal po kau rab byas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces smras so/ /shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gal te rigs dman pa 'am/ longs spyod

rnams yongs su zad pa 'am/ gtugs par gyur na skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung ba yod na/ bdag cag rigs ni kau rab bya yin la/ longs spyod ni rgya che ba yin

gyis/ 'di ltar kho bos shes ldan yul 'khor skyong la longs spyod kyi skal ba dag las bgo bsha' byas/ shes ldan yul 'khor skyong tshur khyod 'dug la 'dod pa dag la yang yongs su spyod cig /sbyin pa dag thong shig /bsod nams dag

gyis shig /rgyal po chen po cha ma lags pa'i mgron du 'bod pas bdag mgron du 'bod kyi 'tsham pas ni ma lags so/ /khyod lta bus bdag 'dra ba'i skyes bu mkhas pa 'di lta bu'i mgron du 'bod pas mgron du yang ma 'bod cig /

bdag gis shes ldan yul 'khor skyong dang 'tsham pa'i mgron du 'bod pas mgron du 'bod pa ji lta bu zhig lags/ rgyal po chen po tshur spyon/ khyod kyis 'di skad ces kye yul 'khor skyong kho bo'i yul 'byor cing gnod pa med pa/ sdo ba

med cing 'tshe ba med la slong ba po'i bsod snyoms rnyed sla ba yin gyis/ shes ldan yul 'khor skyong bang mdzod stug po can 'dir gnos shig dang / bdag gis shes ldan yul 'khor skyong chos bzhin gyis bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba

bya'o zhes bgyi ba lags na/ rgyal po chen po sems mngon par dad pa gang la gang lags pa de tsam gyis bgyis lags te 'tshal lo/ /gzhan yang gal te zhus pa lung bstan pa'i phyir skabs phye na shes ldan yul 'khor skyong la bdag zhu

lags so/ /rgyal po chen po gsungs shig /thos nas khyod la rig par bgyi'o/ /kye yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni yongs su nyams pa lags te/ de dag gis yongs su nyams pa'i rigs kyi bu dag skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur

smrig bgos te dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rga bas yongs su nyams pa dang / nad kyis yongs su nyams pa dang / nye dus yongs su nyams pa dang / longs spyod kyis yongs su

nyams pa'o/ /kye yul 'khor skyong rga bas yongs su nyams pa gang zhe na/ 'di la rigs kyi bu rgas 'khogs gtugs par gyur nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ da ni bdag rgas 'khogs gtugs pas bdag gis re shig 'dod pa dag

bdog kyang longs spyad par sla ba ma yin na mi bdog na lta smos kyang ci dgos/ ma la bdag skra dang kha spu bregs la gos ngur smrig bgos te dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung ngo snyam nas/ de rga ba'i yongs su nyams pas

yongs su nyams pas skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung ste/ 'di ni rga ba'i yongs su nyams pa zhes bya'o/ /shes ldan yul 'khor skyong rga ba'i yongs su nyams

pas yongs su nyams pa ma yin na skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes ldan yul 'khor skyong ni gzhon nu thor bu lang tsho la bab

pa/ skra gnag pa/ na tshod dar la bab pa dang ldan pa yin te/ gang gi tshe rtsed mo dang / dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / cha ba dang / rgyan pa'i gnas la brtson pa dang ldan pas gnas par bya ba de'i tshe nye du rnams mchi mas

brnangs shing ngu bzhin dang bcas pas ma rangs bzhin skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung na/ shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gis

ci zhig shes mthong thos rtogs nas skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung / de la ni kho bos rangs pa ma yin te mi bzod do/ /kye shes ldan yul 'khor skyong nad kyis

yongs su nyams pa gang zhe na/ 'di la rigs kyi bu na ba sdug bsngal ba nad tshabs che bar gyur nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag ni na ba sdug bsngal ba nad tshabs che bas bdag gis re shig 'dod pa dag bdog kyang longs spyad par sla ba ma yin na mi

bdog na lta smos kyang ci dgos/ ma la bdag skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos nas zhes bya ba nas rab tu 'byung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de nad kyis yongs su nyams pas yongs su nyams pas skra dang kha spu bregs te gos

ngur smrig bgos nas zhes bya ba nas rab tu 'byung zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /'di ni nad kyis yongs su nyams pa zhes bya'o/ /shes ldan yul 'khor skyong ni nad kyis yongs su nyams pas yongs su nyams pa ma yin no/ /skra dang kha spu

bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas zhes bya ba nas rab tu byung zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gnod pa med cing nad med pa'i rang bzhin can dang / ran par 'jug

pa'i drod dang ldan pa ste/ ha cang bsil ba ma yin pa dang / ha cang tsha ba ma yin pa dang / khams snyoms pas gnod pa med pa dang ldan pas khyod kyis zos pa dang / 'thungs pa dang / 'chos pa dang / myangs pa rnams legs par bde bar 'ju

bar 'gyur na/ shes ldan yul 'khor skyong de la ci zhig shes mthong zhes bya ba nas rab tu 'byung zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de la ni kho bo rangs pa ma yin te mi bzod do/ /kye yul 'khor skyong nye dus yongs su nyams

pa gang zhe na/ 'di la rigs kyi bu'i nye du rnams rabs chad nye du rnams kha dag nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi nye du rnams rabs chad nye du rnams kha dag pas ma la bdag skra dang kha spu bregs nas zhes bya ba

nas rab tu 'byung bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de nye du'i yongs su nyams pas yongs su nyams pas skra dang kha spu bregs te zhes bya ba nas rab tu 'byung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /'di ni nye dus yongs

su nyams pa zhes bya'o/ /shes ldan yul 'khor skyong ni nye dus yongs su nyams pas yongs su nyams pa ma yin na/ skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos dur smrig bgos te dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu

byung / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yul 'khor skyong gi nye du ni kau rab bya'i rigs nas bzung ste brgyud pa bang mdzod stug po can 'di nyid na rgyas par yod na/ shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gis ci zhig shes mthong zhes bya ba nas rab tu

byung zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de la ni kho bos rangs pa ma yin te mi bzod do/ /kye yul 'khor skyong longs spyod kyis yongs su nyams pa gang zhe na/ 'di la rigs kyi bu'i longs spyod srabs pa dang / yongs su zad pa

dang / gtugs par gyur nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi longs spyod ni srabs pa dang / yongs su zad pa dang / gtugs par gyur gyis/ ma la bdag skra dang kha spu bregs nas zhes bya ba nas rab tu 'byung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar

du'o/ /de longs spyod yongs su nyams pas yongs su nyams pas skra dang kha spu bregs nas zhes bya ba nas rab tu 'byung ngo / /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /'di ni longs spyod kyis yongs su nyams pa zhes bya'o/ /shes ldan yul

'khor skyong ni longs spyod yongs su nyams pas yongs su nyams pa ma yin na/ zhes bya ba nas rab tu byung zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /shes ldan yul 'khor skyong ni bang mdzod stug po can 'di na rigs mchog dang rigs bzang

po yin pas 'di lta ste longs spyod chen po dang ldan pa yin na/ 'di la shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gis ci zhig shes mthong thos rtogs nas skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par

rab tu byung / de la ni kho bo rangs pa ma yin te mi bzod do/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi po 'di dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen cing gzigs pa des yid 'byung ba'i

lam du gsungs te/ yid 'byung ba de dag gis yid byung nas rigs kyi bu rnams skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rgyal po chen po 'jig rten 'di

thams cad ni rga bas nye bar khrid pa yin/ 'jig rten 'di ni rjes su 'gro ba med pas skyabs med pa yin/ 'jig rten 'di ni thams cad bor te 'gro bar 'gyur bas bdog pa med pa yin/ 'jig rten 'di ni ngoms mi shes te sred pas 'khol bas

chog mi shes pa yin par bdag gis shes mthong thos rtogs nas skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo / /bdag gis mdor bsdus te gsungs shing

rnam par ma phye ba 'di'i don rgyas par 'tshal bar mi 'gyur bas/ shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gis don de nyid ci nas bdag gi shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gis mdor bsdus te gsungs shing rnam par ma phye ba 'di'i don rgyas par

'tshal bar 'gyur bar rgyas par bshad du gsol/ shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gis 'di skad ces 'jig rten 'di thams cad ni rga bas nye bar khrid pa yin no/ /zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa de shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gis ci las

dgongs te gsungs/ de'i phyir rgyal po chen po khyod nyid la dris khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lan thob shig /rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/ gang gi tshe khyod lo nyi shu 'am lo nyi shu rtsa lnga lon par gyur pa na na tshod kyis

gzhon nu thor bu lang tsho la bab pa/ skra gnag pa/ nyam rtsal bdo ba dang ldan pa de dang da ltar gyi lus su 'di lta ste tshe 'am/ kha dog gam/ stobs sam/ shugs sam/ smra dngags sam/ srid du 'am/ sboms su mnyam zhing mtshungs par

mthong ngam/ kye yul 'khor skyong gang gi tshe bdag lo nyi shu 'am lo nyi shu rtsa lnga lon par gyur pa na na tshod kyis gzhon nu thor bu lang tsho la bab pa/ skra gnag pa/ nyam rtsal bdo ba dang ldan pa de dang da ltar gyi lus su 'di lta ste tshe 'am/ kha dog gam stobs

sam shugs sam srid du 'am/ sboms su 'am/ smra dngags su mnyam zhing mtshungs par ma mthong ste/ da ni bdag na tshod kyis lo brgyad bcu lon pas rgas 'khogs gtugs te bar 'ga' bdag 'dug pa dang langs pa yang gzhan

gyis bya dgos so/ /rgyal po chen po bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen cing gzigs pa des 'di las dgongs nas 'jig rten 'di thams cad ni rga bas nye bar khrid pa yin no/ /

zhes gsungs pa de bdag gis shes mthong thos rtogs nas skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med pa rab tu byung ste de la ni bdag rangs te bzod do/ shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gang la

rangs te bzod pa de la bdag kyang rangs te bzod do/ /gang yang shes ldan yul 'khor skyong 'di skad ces 'jig rten 'di ni rjes su 'gro ba med pas skyabs med pa yin no zhes gsungs pa bdag la ni bu dang chung ma dang / bran dang / las bgyid pa

dang / bzhad gad pa dang / skra mkhan dang / khrus mkhan dang / 'dul sbyong mkhan dang / glang po che la zhon pa dang / rta rkya dang / shing rta pa dang / bshan thogs dang / gzhu 'dzin pa dang / 'drol bu dang / go re long bgyid pa dang / bro gar len pa rnams dang /

rgyal po'i bu dpa' ba rtul phod pa/ rab tu gnon tshan po che chen po dang ldan pa gang dag bdag gi gshed ma phyir rgol pa mi mdza' ba dag mchis pa slar 'joms par bgyid pa mchis na/ 'on kyang shes ldan yul 'khor skyong 'di skad

ces 'jig rten 'di ni rjes su 'gro ba med pas skyabs med pa yin no/ /zhes gsungs pa de shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gis ci las dgongs te gsungs rgyal po chen po de'i phyir khyod nyid la dris khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du

lan thob shig rgyal po chen po da ltar khyod la lus kyis gnod pa 'ga' mchis sam/ kye yul 'khor skyong bdag la mchis te da ltar rlung gis rgyab tu gnod do/ /rgyal po chen po gang gi tshe rlung gis rgyab tu gnod par gyur pa de'i tshe bdag gi bu dang chung ma dang bran dang /

las byed pa dang / bzhad gad pa dang / skra mkhan dang / khrus mkhan dang / 'dul sbyong mkhan dang / glang po che la zhon pa dang / rta rkya dang / shing rta pa dang / bshan thogs dang / gzhu 'dzin dang 'drol bu dang go re long byed pa dang bro gar len pa dang rgyal po'i bu dpa' ba rtul phod pa/

rab tu gnon tshan po che chen po dang ldan pa gang dag yin pa tshur/ bdag la skyes shing byung ba'i sdug bsngal drag po rtsub pa tsha ba mi bzod pa yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba rnams choms shig ces bgyis na 'grub bam/ kye yul 'khor skyong ma lags so/ /gang gi tshe

rlung gis bdag gi rgyab tu gnod par gyur pa de'i tshe bdag gi bu dang / chung ma dang bran dang las bgyid pa dang / bzhad gad pa dang / skra mkhan dang / khrus mkhan dang / 'dul sbyong mkhan dang / glang po che'i gnyar zhon pa dang / rta rkya dang / shing rta dang bshan thogs dang / gzhu 'dzin

dang / 'drol bu dang / go re long bgyid pa dang / bro gar len pa dang / rgyal po'i bu dpa' ba rtul phod pa/ rab tu gnon tshan po che chen po dang ldan pa gang dag yin pa tshur/ bdag la byung zhing skyes pa'i sdug bsngal drag po rtsub pa tsha ba mi bzad pa yid du mi 'ong

ba'i tshor ba rnams choms shig ces bgyis kyang mi 'grub kyi/ de'i tshe bdag 'ba' zhig sdug bsngal drag po rtsub pa tsha ba mi bzod pa yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba rnams myong ngo / /rgyal po chen po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag

par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen cing gzigs pa des 'di las dgongs nas 'jig rten 'di ni rjes su 'gro ba med de skyabs med pa yin no zhes gsungs pa de bdag gis shes mthong thos rtogs nas skra dang kha spu bregs nas

gos ngur smrig bgos te dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/ de la ni bdag rangs te bzod do/ /shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gang la rangs te bzod pa de la bdag cag kyang rangs te bzod do/ /gang yang shes ldan

yul 'khor skyong 'di skad ces 'jig rten 'di ni thams cad bor nas 'gro bar 'gyur bas bdog pa med pa yin no zhes gsungs pa/ kye yul 'khor skyong bdag cag la bu dang / chung ma dang / bran dang / las bgyid pa dang / zhes bya ba nas rgyal po'i bu rnams

mchis te zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /gang dag bdag mchi na rjes bzhin 'brang la/ 'greng na 'greng ba dang / nyal na zhugs tshe bgyid pa dag mchis na/ 'on kyang shes ldan yul 'khor skyong 'di skad ces 'jig rten 'di ni thams cad bor te 'gro

bar 'gyur bas bdog pa med pa yin no/ /zhes gsung ba de shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gis ci las dgongs te gsungs/ rgyal po chen po de'i phyir khyod nyid la dris khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lan thob shig /rgyal po chen po ji snyam du

sems/ gang gi tshe skye bo mang po la mi sdug pa/ skye bo mang po mi 'dod pa/ skye bo mang po mi dga' ba/ skye bo mang po'i yid du mi 'ong ba 'jig rten thams cad kyi thun mong 'di lta ste/ 'chi ba zhes bya ba'i chos de 'ongs par gyur pa de'i tshe bdag gi bu

dang / chung ma dang / bran dang / las byed pa zhes bya ba nas rgyal po'i bu dag tshur zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /gang dag 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol du 'gro ba'i phyi bzhin shog shig ces bgyis na 'grub bam/ kye yul 'khor skyong ma lags

so/ /kye yul 'khor skyong gang gi tshe skye bo mang po la mi sdug pa/ skye bo mang po mi 'dod pa/ skye bo mang po mi dga' ba/ skye bo mang po'i yid du mi 'ong ba 'jig rten thams cad kyi thun mong 'di lta ste/ 'chi ba zhes bya ba'i chos de 'ongs

par gyur pa de'i tshe bdag gi bu dang / chung ma dang / bran dang / las bgyid pa rnams dang zhes bya ba nas/ rgyal po'i bu'i bar gang dag yin pa tshur zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /bdag 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol du mchi ba'i phyi

bzhin shog shig ces bgyis kyang mi 'grub ste/ bdag 'ba' zhig 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol du mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen po bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas mkhyen cing gzigs pa des 'di las dgongs nas 'jig rten 'di ni thams cad bor te 'gro bar 'gyur bas bdog pa med pa yin no zhes gsungs pa de bdag gis shes mthong thos rtogs nas/ skra dang kha

spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/ de la ni bdag rangs te bzod do/ /shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gang la rangs te bzod pa de la bdag kyang rangs te bzod do/ /shes

ldan yul 'khor skyong gang yang 'di skad ces 'jig rten 'di ni ngoms mi shes shing sred pas bkol bas chog mi shes pa yin no zhes gsungs pa/ kye yul 'khor skyong bdag sgra ngan rgyas pa 'di nyid la yongs su spyod cing btsun mo

mang po dang / mdzod dang / bang mdzod rgyas pa la yongs su longs spyod na/ 'on kyang shes ldan yul khor skyong 'di skad ces 'jig rten 'di ni ngoms mi shes shing sred pas bkol bas chog mi shes pa yin no zhes gsungs pa de

shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gis ci las dgongs te gsungs/ rgyal po chen po de'i phyir khyod nyid la dris khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lan thob shig /rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/ khyod 'di na sgra ngan rgyas pa la

yongs su spyod cing btsun mo mang po dang / mdzod dang / bang mdzod rgyas pa la yongs su spyod pa las shar phyogs nas mi yid gcugs pa/ yid ches pa/ brtan po/ 'jig rten la mi slu ba zhig 'ongs nas de 'di skad ces

lha bdag shar phyogs nas 'dir mchi ba na de na bdag gis ljongs 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa/ skye bo dang mi mang pos rab tu gang ba dag cig mthong ste/ lha ljongs de dag 'di lta bu'i dpung

dang 'di lta bu'i dbyig dang / 'di lta bu'i bzhon pas dra ma drangs te gzhom pa dang / choms nas rnal du dgod par rung ngo / /zhes smra na/ rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/ khyod yul der dra ma drang zhing drangs nas bcom ste/ rnal du 'god dam/ khyod ljongs de

dag 'dod dam/ kye yul 'khor skyong gal te bdag gis ljongs de dag 'di lta bu'i dbyig dang / 'di lta bu'i dpung dang / 'di lta bu'i bzhon pas dra ma drang ba dang / dra ma drangs nas choms pa dang bcom nas rnal du dgod du rung bar shes na/ ljongs

de dag tu dra ma drang zhing dra ma drangs nas bcom la/ bcom nas rnal du dgod do/ /bdag ljongs de dag kyang 'tshal lo// //'dul ba gzhi/ bam po sum bcu rtsa lnga pa/ rgyal po chen po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mkhyen cing gzigs pa des de las dgongs nas 'jig rten 'di ni ngoms mi shes shing sred pas bkol bas chog mi shes pa yin no/ /zhes gsungs pa de

bdag gis shes mthong thos rtogs nas skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/ de la ni bdag rangs te bzod do/ /shes ldan yul 'khor skyong khyod
