rnams sus kyang ma bsad cig /de rnams kyis dril sgrogs su bcug nas su yang chu na rgyu ba'i srog chags ma gsod cig /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi ngang pa'i

sde dpon bzhin rgyas gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin te/ de na ngas sems can de snyed la phan pa byas so/ /rgyal po chen po ngas sems can la phan pa byas pa des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo snyam na khyod kyis

de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang ngas sems can la phan pa byas pa de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang / rkyen tsam dang / tshogs tsam yin no/ /rgyal po chen po gzhan yang ngas bla na med pa yang

dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir sems can la phan pa byas te dge ba la btsud pa gang yin pa de nyon cig /rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba ston pa mig mdzes zhes bya ba phyi rol pa'i mu stegs rdzu 'phrul dang ldan

pa 'dod pa rnams las 'dod chags dang bral ba zhig byung ste/ ston pa mig mdzes kyi nyan thos brgya phrag du ma dang / stong phrag du ma dang / brgya stong phrag du ma byung ngo / /ston pa mig mdzes nyan thos rnams la chos ston pa ni shin tu zad par

'gyur ba ma yin/ shin tu dri ma med par 'gyur ba ma yin/ shin du tshangs par spyod pa la gnas par 'gyur ba ma yin te/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten dang skal ba mnyam pa'i bar yin no/ /ston pa mig mdzes kyi nyan thos thams cad kyi thams cad du bslab pa

yongs su rdzogs pa gang yin pa de dag ni tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi bsgoms nas 'dod pa rnams la 'dod pa'i 'dun pa spangs te/ de la lan mang du gnas shing tshangs pa'i 'jig rten dang skal ba mnyam par skyes so/ /thams cad kyi thams

cad du ma yin pa gang yin pa gang dag yin pa de las kha cig ni 'phrul dgar ro/ /kha cig ni dga' ldan du'o/ /kha cig ni sum bcu rtsa gsum pa dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris dang / rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dang / bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen

po lta bu dang / khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skyes so/ /de nas ston pa mig mdzes 'di snyam du sems te/ gal te bdag nyan thos rnams dang lhan cig 'gro mnyam pa dang / skye ba mnyam pa dang / tshe phyi ma mnyam pa

ni 'os pa ma yin gyis/ ma la bdag gis gong du bsam gtan gnyis pa byams pas bsgom par bya'o snyam nas/ des bsam gtan gnyis pa bsgoms pas 'od gsal gyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skyes par gyur to/ /rgyal po chen po de'i tshe de'i dus na ston

pa mig mdzes shes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na ston pa mig mdzes zhes bya ba phyi rol pa'i mu stegs rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa 'dod pa rnams las 'dod chags dang bral ba de yin par

gyur to/ /nga nyid kyi nyan thos brgya phrag du ma dang / stong phrag du ma dang / brgya stong phrag du ma byung bar gyur pa'i nyan thos rnams la nga nyid kyis shin tu zad par 'gyur ba ma yin/ shin tu dri ma med par 'gyur ba ma yin/ shin tu tshangs par spyod pa

la gnas par 'gyur ba ma yin gyi tshangs pa'i 'jig rten dang skal ba mnyam pa'i bar gyi chos bshad do/ /rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/ ngas sems can la phan pa byas pa des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo snyam na

khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang nga'i de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang / rkyen tsam dang / tshogs tsam yin no/ /rgyal po chen po gzhan yang ngas bla na

med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir sems can la phan pa byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cig /rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba ston pa lkug 'phye zhes bya ba phyi rol pa'i mu stegs rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/ 'dod

pa rnams las 'dod chags dang bral ba zhig byung bar gyur te/ de bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya slob par byed do/ /de nas dus gzhan zhig na ston pa lkug 'phye 'di snyam du sems te/ ci'i phyir bram ze'i khye'u 'di rnams kyis

mngon par shes pa lnga mngon sum du ma byas snyam mo/ /de yang 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di rnams g.yang gzhi dang / shing shun dang / dbyug gu dang / ril ba spyi blugs dang / glugs gzar gyi snod lhag pa 'chang zhing / tshod rngad dang / ut+pa

la'i rtsa ba sbyor ba la brtson par gnas pa las gyur to snyam mo/ /de nas ston pa lkug 'phye 'di snyam du sems te/ gal te bram ze'i khye'u rnams la nan thur zhig ma byas na dbral bar dka'o snyam mo/ /byang chub sems

dpa' rnams kyi gdul ba la mkhas pa ni bla na med pa yin pas/ de nas ston pa lkug 'phyes bram ze'i khye'u rnams la smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u dag zla ba gsum po 'di dag la kho bo nang du yang dag 'jog 'dod kyis/ kho bo la

'bras bu dang rtsa ba stobs pa'i bram ze'i khye'u gcig dang / gso sbyong bcwa lnga pa de nyid ma gtogs par bram ze'i khye'u su yang ma 'ong shig /bram ze'i khye'u de rnams kyis kyang khrims su bcas pa/ bdag cag las

dbyar gyi nang logs su rtsa ba dang 'bras bu stobs pa'i bram ze'i khye'u gcig dang / gso sbyong bcwa lnga pa de nyid ma gtogs par bram ze'i khye'u su yang mkhan po lta zhing 'gro bar mi bya'o/ /bdag cag las dbyar gyi nang logs su rtsa ba dang

'bras bu stobs pa'i bram ze'i khye'u gcig dang / gso sbyong bcwa lnga pa de nyid ma gtogs par gang zhig mkhan po lta zhing song bar gyur na de ni bdag cag gis nyes pa can du brtsi'o zhes byas nas/ ston pa lkug 'phye zla ba gsum po de

la nang du yang dag 'jog la zhugs pa dang / rtsa ba dang 'bras bu stobs pa'i bram ze'i khye'u gcig dang / gso sbyong bcwa lnga pa de nyid ma gtogs par bram ze'i khye'u su yang de'i drung du mi 'gro'o/ /ston pa lkug 'phyes rgyang ring po kho na

nas ri dgas shig mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces smras so/ /ri dgas 'ongs pa legs so tshur/ ri dgas khyod dang kho bo ni mtshungs te/ khyod kyang zas lto 'grangs tsam gyis chog cing kun du chog la/ kho bo yang lto

'grangs tsam gyis chog cing kun du chog na/ 'di na kha cig ni de lta ma yin te/ ha cang tshod rngad dang / ut+pa la'i rtsa ba sbyor ba la brtson par gnas so/ /de nas bram ze'i khye'u de rnams 'di snyam du sems te gdon mi za bar

mkhan po ni brtul zhugs rdzogs par gyur te/ 'di ltar mkhan po ri dgas dang lhan cig smra bar byed do snyam du bsams nas/ ston pa lkug 'phye gang na ba der dong ste lhags pa dang / ston pa'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo

bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /de nas ston pa lkug 'phye cang mi smra'o/ /de nas bram ze'i khye'u de rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ gdon mi za bar mkhan po ni brtul zhugs rdzogs par gyur te/ 'di ltar

mkhan po ri dgas dang lhan cig smra bar byed do snyam du bsams nas/ ston pa lkug 'phye ni gang gi phyir ri dgas dang lhan cig smra bar byed kyi/ mi rnams dang ni ma yin no/ /zhes smras nas stan las langs te dong ngo / de nas ri dgas

gyi brtul zhugs can zhig ston pa lkug 'phye gang na ba der song ba dang / ston pa lkug 'phyes rgyang ring po kho na nas ri dgas kyi brtul zhugs can mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces smras so/ /ri dgas kyi brtul zhugs

can khyod 'ongs pa legs so tshur khyod dang kho bo ni mtshungs te/ khyod kyang g.yang gzhi gcig thogs/ kho bo yang g.yang gcig thogs/ khyod kyang ril ba dang / dbyug gu dang / glugs gzar gyi snod re re thogs/ kho bo yang re re thogs/

khyod kyang bsod snyoms lto 'grangs tsam gyis chog cing kun du chog la/ kho bo yang bsod snyoms lto 'grangs tsam gyis chog cing kun du chog na/ 'di na kha cig ni de lta ma yin te/ g.yang gzhi dang / shing shun dang / dbyug gu dang /

ril ba dang / glugs gzar gyi snod lhag pa 'chang zhing / ha cang tshod rngad dang / khre rgod dang / ut+pa la'i rtsa ba sbyor ba la brtson par gnas so/ /de nas bram ze'i khye'u de rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ ji ltar mkhan po 'dod chen che ba la

ni rnam par smod la/ 'dod chen chung ba la bstod pas don gyis na mkhan pos bdag cag la nan thur byas kyis/ ma la bdag cag gi g.yang gzhi dang / shing shun dang / dbyug gu dang ril ba dang / glugs gzar gyi snod lhag pa chu bo rtag 'bab kyi nang du bor la

mkhan po gang na ba der 'dong ngo zhes de rnams kyis g.yang gzhi dang / shing shun dang / dbyug gu dang / ril ba dang / glugs gzar gyi snod lhag ma rnams chu bo rtag 'bab kyi nang du bor nas rgyud gtsang ba dang / spyod pa gzhung bzhin du byas nas ston

pa lkug 'phye gang na ba der dong ste lhags pa dang / ston pa lkug 'phye'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /ston pa lkug 'phyes bram ze'i khye'u de rnams kyi bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang

khams dang / rang bzhin shes nas/ ji ltar bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya po de dag gis mngon par shes pa lnga mngon sum du byas pa de lta bu'i chos bshad pa byas so/ /rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi ston pa lkug 'phye gang

yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/ /rgyal po chen po ngas sems can la phan pa byas pa des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo snyam na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang nga'i de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu

tsam dang / rkyen tsam dang / tshogs tsam yin no/ /rgyal po chen po gzhan yang ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas sems can la phan pa byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cig /

rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba'i mi rnams kyi tshe lo brgyad khri thub par gyur to/ /mi rnams kyi tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa na 'dzam bu'i gling 'di nyid 'byor par gyur cing zhes bya ba rgyas par ji skad chos ldan gyi mdo las 'byung ba lta bu'o/ /

ji tsam na mi tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa rnams la lus kyi gnod pa 'di lta bu byung ste/ 'di lta ste grang ba dang / tsha ba dang / bkres pa dang / skom pa dang / 'dod pa dang / za ba dang rga ba'o/ /mi rnams kyi tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa na rgyal po byed ldan

zhes bya ba byung ste/ rgyal po byed ldan gyi bskyed mos tshal gyi gnas na shing n+ya gro d+ha'i rgyal po shin tu rab gnas zhes bya ba zhig yod do/ /n+ya gro d+ha'i rgyal po shin tu rab gnas kyi drung na bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu rtsibs kyi mu khyud

ces bya ba bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya tsam la bram ze rnams kyi gsang tshig klog tu 'jug go/ /de nas bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu rtsibs kyi mu khyud gcig pu dben par song nas sems la sems kyi rtog pa 'di lta bu skyes te/ mi rnams ni

tshe thung la tshe phyi mar 'gro dgos te/ skyes pa la mi 'chi ba med pas dge ba bya zhing tshangs par spyod pa spyad dgos na/ 'on kyang da ltar mi 'di dag ni 'di lta ste don spyad pa dang / bsod nams spyad pa dang dge ba spyad pa la sems las

chung ngu sems las chung ngur gnas par byed kyis/ ma la bdag skra dang kha spu bregs la gos ngur smrig bgos te dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu rtsibs

kyi mu khyud kyis bram ze'i khye'u rnams la smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u dag shes par gyis shig /'di na kho bo gcig pu zhes bya ba nas rab tu 'byung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar rgyas par sbyar ro/ /bram ze'i khye'u dag bdag ni skra dang kha spu bregs te zhes

bya ba nas rab tu 'byung na shes ldan dag ci byed/ kye mkhan po bdag cag gis gang cung zad ci 'tshal ba de thams cad ni shes ldan mkhan po la brten nas lags pas gal te shes ldan mkhan po skra dang kha spu bregs shes bya ba nas

rab tu 'byung na bdag cag kyang shes ldan mkhan po rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu 'byung bar bgyi'o/ /bram ze'i khye'u dag de'i dus la dbab par shes par gyis shig /de nas bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu rtsibs

kyi mu khyud skra dang kha spu bregs nas zhes bya ba nas rab tu byung zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya po de rnams kyang skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu rtsibs kyi mu

khyud rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu byung ngo / /de nas bram ze shing sa la chen po lta bu rtsibs kyi mu khyud kyis mya ngan las 'da' bar mi 'gyur ba'i sgrib pa lnga spangs nas shes bya ba nas rgyas par byams pa dang ldan pa'i

sems shes bya ba dang / rgyas par snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms kyi bar du brjod par bya ste/ /btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems khon med pa/ 'gran zla med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ yangs pa rgya chen

por gyur pa/ tshad med pa shin tu bsgoms pas mos te khyab par byas nas rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /de nas bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu rtsibs kyi mu khyud kyi ming bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu rtsibs kyi mu khyud
bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu rtsibs kyi mu khyud ces bya ba'i ming gang yin pa nub par gyur cig /ston pa rtsibs kyi mu khyud ces bya bar grags so/ /de nas

ston pa rtsibs kyi mu khyud kyis bram ze'i khye'u rnams la smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u dag mi rnams ni tshe thung ba/ nyon mongs pa/ ring po mi thogs pa yin la/ de yang sdug bsngal dang ldan no/ /dper na

rtswa'i rtse mo la chags pa'i zil pa ni nyi ma shar ba'i tshe myur du lhung zhing ring por mi gnas so/ /bram ze'i khye'u dag de bzhin du mi rnams kyi tshe yang zil pa dang 'dra bar ring por mi thogs pa nyon mongs pa yin la de

sdug bsngal dang ldan no/ /dper na chu la ri mo mkhan gyis ri mo bris pa ni myur du 'jig cing ring por mi gnas so/ /bram ze'i khye'u dag de bzhin du mi rnams kyi tshe yang chu'i ri mo bzhin du ring por mi gnas pa nyon mongs

pa yin la de yang sdug bsngal dang ldan no/ /dper na chu la dbyug pas khram btab pa ni myur du 'jig cing ring por mi gnas so/ /de bzhin du tshe yang dbyug pas bris pa lta bu yin no/ /dper na khor yug chur bor ba ni myur

du 'byin zhing ring por mi gnas so/ /de bzhin du tshe yang khor yug lta bu yin no/ /dper na rdo rje chur bor ba ni myur du 'byin zhing ring por mi gnas so/ /de bzhin du tshe yang rdo rje chur bor ba lta bu yin no/ /dper na

dbyug pa gnam du 'phangs pa ni myur du ltung zhing ring por mi gnas so/ /de bzhin du tshe yang dbyug pa gnam du 'phangs pa lta bu yin no/ /dper na thags bcas pa ji tsam btags pa de tsam du btags par bya ba rting la thug

par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du srog kyang btag par bya ba rting la thug pa lta bu yin no/ /dper na bsad par khrid pa'i phyugs ni gom re bor zhing bsad pa la nye ba yin no/ /de bzhin du tshe yang bsad pa'i phyugs lta bu yin no/ /

dper na bsad par khrid pa'i mi ni gom re bor zhing bsad pa la nye ba yin no/ /de bzhin du tshe yang bsad pa'i mi lta bu yin no/ /dper na sha'i kham tshad cig zangs chu mang po'i nang du bcug ste 'og nas me sbar na myur
du gor bar 'gyur zhing ring por mi gnas so/ /de bzhin du tshe yang sha'i kham tshad lta bu yin no// //'dul ba gzhi/ bam po lnga bcu pa/ dper na ri las 'bab pa'i chu bo gting zab pa/

shugs drag pa/ thag ring por 'bab pa shing rtsi ded par byed pa ni nyin zhag de dag 'das shing skad cig dang / thang cig dang / yud tsam de dag 'das na chu'i gnas pa dang 'jig pa mi mngon no/ /de bzhin du mi rnams kyi tshe yang chu bo'i

rgyun lta bu ste/ ring por mi thogs pa/ nyom mongs pa yin la de yang sdug bsngal dang ldan no/ /bram ze'i khye'u dag bdag ni byams pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba nas/ rgyas par snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems

zhes bya ba nas gnas so zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /bram ze'i khye'u dag tshur khyed kyis kyang byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems kyi bar gyis gnas par gyis shig /rgyal

po chen po ston pa rtsibs kyi mu khyud de de tsam du tshe ring / de tsam du ring du gnas/ de tsam gyis tshe'i mthar thug pa yang re shig dge slong dag la mi rnams ni tshe thung ba/ ring por mi thogs pa/ nyon mongs pa yin la/ de yang sdug bsngal dang

ldan no zhes bya ba de lta bu'i chos ston to/ rgyal po chen po de ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na ston pa rtsibs kyi mu khyud ces bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang nga nyid de'i

tshe de'i dus na ston pa rtsibs kyi mu khyud ces bya bar gyur to/ /rgyal po chen po ngas sems can rnams la phan pa byas pa des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo snyam na khyod kyis de ltar mi lta ste/

'on kyang nga'i de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang / rkyen tsam dang / tshogs tsam yin no/ /ston pa mig mdzes ji lta ba bram ze'i bu 'joms byed dang / glang po skyong yang de dang 'dra'o/ /

rgyal po chen po gzhan yang ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba na nga byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la shes rab chen po dang spobs pa chen por gyur nas sems can la phan pa byas pa gang yin pa de

nyon cig /rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba rgyal po phyogs bdag ces bya ba zhig byung ste/ rgyal po phyogs bdag gi bu gzhon nu rdul phran zhes bya ba zhig byung ngo / /rgyal po phyogs bdag la bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu gnag

lhas skyes shes bya ba zhig yod de/ bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu gnag lhas skyes kyi bu bram ze'i khye'u me gso zhes bya ba mkhas pa/ gsal ba/ yid gzhungs pa/ gzhung dang 'thun par dpyod pa'i shes rab dang ldan

pa zhig yod de/ 'di ltar de'i pha bram ze gnag lhas skyes zhing las kyi mtha' gang yin pa de rnams bram ze'i khye'u me gso la 'dri zhing byed do/ /don du bya ba'i don nges par brtag pa gang yin pa de rnams kyang bram ze'i

khye'u me gso la dris nas byed kyi ma dris par ni ma yin no/ /gzhon nu rdul phran dang / rgyal po'i 'khor rgyal rigs drug gi grogs po dang / snying du sdug pa dang / ne'u zla yang yin no/ /gang gi tshe rgyal po phyogs

bdag rtse bar 'dod pa 'am/ dga' bar 'dod pa 'am/ dga' mgur spyod 'dod par gyur pa de'i tshe des dgos pa thams cad dang / las su bya ba thams cad bram ze gnag lhas skyes la slar btang nas steng gi khang bzangs

kyi gzhi la skyes pa med par song ste rol mo rnams kyis rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do/ /de nas dus gzhan zhig na bram ze gnag lhas skyes shi'o/ /de shi ba na rgyal po phyogs bdag shin

du sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ba'i tshor ba nyams su myong nas/ kyi hud bram ze gnag lhas skyes shi bas bdag che thang du dmas par gyur to/ /kyi hud bram ze gnag lhas skyes shi bas bdag shin du che thang du dmas par gyur

to zhes zer ro/ /de nas gzhon nu rdul phran rgyal po phyogs bdag gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / rgyal po phyogs bdag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha ci'i slad du bram ze gnag lhas skyes gum pas shin du sdug bsngal zhing

thugs la gcags par gyur te sdug bsngal zhing thugs la gcags pa'i tshor ba nyams su myong bar mdzad/ gzhon nu kho bo gang gi tshe rtse bar 'dod pa 'am/ dga' bar 'dod pa 'am/ dga' mgur spyod 'dod par gyur pa de'i tshe kho bo'i

dgos pa thams cad dang las su bya ba thams cad bram ze gnag lhas skyes la slar gtang nas steng gi khang bzangs kyi gzhi na skyes pa med par song nas rol mo rnams kyis rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do/ /

da ni kho bo 'di snyam du sems te/ kyi hud bram ze gnag lhas skyes shi bas bdag tshe thung du dmas par gyur to/ /kyi hud bram ze gnag lhas skyes shi bas bdag shin du tshe thung du dmas par gyur to snyam mo/ /lha bram ze gnag lhas skyes gum pas

shin du sdug bsngal zhing thugs mi dgyes par gyur te/ sdug bsngal zhing thugs mi dgyes pa'i tshor ba nyams su myong bar ma mdzad cig /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ lha bram ze gnag lhas skyes kyi bu bram ze'i khye'u me gso zhes bgyi ba mkhas pa/

gsal ba/ yid gzhungs pa/ gzhung dang mthun par dpyod pa'i shes rab dang ldan pa zhig mchis te/ 'di ltar de'i pha bram ze gnag lhas skyes kyis las kyi mtha' bgyis pa gang lags pa de dag kyang bram ze'i khye'u me gso la dris

nas bgyis kyi ma dris pas ni ma lags so/ /don du bgyi ba'i don nges par brtag pa gang lags pa de dag kyang bram ze'i khye'u me gso la dris nas bgyis kyi ma dris par ni ma lags so/ /lha de lta lags pas pha

gnag lhas skyes kyi las thabs su dbang bskur du gsol/ /de nas rgyal po phyogs bdag gis bram ze'i khye'u me gso pho nyas bkug nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /bram ze'i khye'u khyod ngas deng phyin chad nas pha gnag lhas

skyes kyi las thabs su bcug go/ /bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bram ze'i khye'u me gsos mnyan to/ /de nas bram ze'i khye'u me gso de pha bram ze gnag lhas skyes byed byed pa'i zhing blas kyi mtha' gang yin pa de rnams kyang byed

do/ /de'i pha bram ze gnag lhas skyes don du bya ba'i don nges par rtog rtog pa gang yin pa de dag kyang de nges par rtog go/ /de nas bram ze'i khye'u me gso'i ming bram ze'i khye'u me gso zhes bya ba gang yin pa de nub

par gyur cing bram ze gnag lhas skyes bram ze gnag lhas skyes shes bya bar grags so/ /de nas bram ze gnag lhas skyes kyis rgyal po'i 'khor rgyal rigs drug pho nyas bkug nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /shes ldan dag tshur khyed

gzhon nu rdul phran gang na ba der dong la phyin pa dang / gzhon nu rdul phran la rgyal ba dang / tshe spel ba dag byos la/ gzhon nu rdul phran la 'di skad ces ji ltar rdul phran khyod bde na de bzhin du bdag cag kyang bde zhing / ji ltar

rdul phran khyod sdug bsngal na de bzhin du bdag cag sdug bsngal bar 'gyur la/ rgyal po'i 'khor rgyal rigs drug po ni rdul phran khyod kyi grogs po dang / snying du sdug pa dang / ne'u zla yin gyis/ rdul phran khyod gal te yab

'das nas yab kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la bzhag na/ ci nas kyang bdag cag la longs spyod dag las longs spyod kyi bgo bsha' mdzod ces gyis shig /mkhan po bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes rgyal po'i 'khor rgyal rigs drug gis

bram ze gnag lhas skyes las mnyan nas gzhon nu rdul phran gang na ba der dong ste phyin pa dang / gzhon nu rdul phran la rgyal ba dang tshe spel ba dag byas nas gzhon nu rdul phran la 'di skad ces smras so/ /ji ltar rdul phran khyod bde na de

bzhin du bdag cag bde zhing / ji ltar rdul phran khyod sdug bsngal na de bzhin du bdag cag sdug bsngal bar 'gyur la/ rgyal po'i 'khor rgyal rigs drug ni rdul phran khyod kyi grogs po dang / snying du sdug pa dang / ne'u zla lags

kyis/ rdul phran khyod gal te yab 'das nas rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la bzhag na ci nas kyang bdag cag la longs spyod dag las longs spyod kyi bgo bsha' mdzod cig /de bzhin du bya'o zhes gzhon nu rdul phran gyis

mnyan to/ /de nas dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po phyogs bdag dus las 'das te shi bar gyur nas blon po'i tshogs rnams dang / sna chen po la gtogs pa rnams dang / rgyal khrims 'don pa rnams dang / gsang tshig

gis lhan cig 'tsho ba rnams kyis gzhon nu rdul phran pha'i rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la bzhag cing / de rgyal srid la dbang bskur ba'i phyir dbang bskur ro/ /de nas gzhon nu rdul phran gyi ming gzhon nu rdul phran zhes

bya ba gang yin pa de nub cing / rgyal po rdul phran zhes bya bar grags so/ /de nas rgyal po rdul phran gyis bram ze gnag lhas skyes pho nyas bkug nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /mkhan pos nga'i yab la ji ltar rjes su bstan
par bya bar soms shig /bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bram ze gnag lhas skyes kyis mnyan to/ /de nas bram ze gnag lhas skyes kyis rgyal po'i 'khor rgyal rigs drug pho nyas bkug ste 'di skad ces smras so//

shes ldan dag khyed cag rgyal po rdul phran gang na ba der dong la phyin pa dang / rgyal po rdul phran la rgyal ba dang tshe spel ba dag byos la 'di skad ces lha lha gzhon nur gyur pa na bdag cag spyan sngar mchis nas 'di skad

ces ji ltar rdul phran khyod bde na de bzhin du bdag cag bde zhing / ji ltar rdul phran khyod sdug bsngal na de bzhin du bdag cag sdug bsngal bar 'gyur la/ rgyal po'i 'khor rgyal rigs drug po ni rdul phran

khyod kyi grogs po dang / snying du sdug pa dang / ne'u zla lags kyis/ rdul phran khyod gal te yab 'das te yab kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la bzhag na ci nas kyang bdag cag la longs spyod dag las longs spyod kyi bgo

bsha' mdzod cig ces gsol pa dgongs sam zhes smros shig /gal te 'di skad ces ngas dran no zer na/ lha da ni de'i dus la bab lags so zhes smros shig /'on te de 'di skad ces sa chen po nang yangs la phyi shing rta'i dbyibs
ltar 'dug pa 'di cha bdun du 'god pa su zhig yod ces zer na/ lha gnag lhas skyes ma lags pa gzhan yang ma mchis so zhes smros shig /mkhan po bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes rgyal po'i 'khor rgyal rigs drug

gis bram ze gnag lhas skyes las mnyan nas/ rgyal po rdul phran gang na ba der dong ste phyin pa dang / rgyal po rdul phran la rgyal ba dang tshe spel ba dag byas nas rgyal po rdul phran la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha lha sngon gzhon nur

gyur pa na bdag cag spyan sngar mchis nas 'di skad ces ji ltar rdul phran khyod bde na de bzhin du bdag cag bde zhing / ji ltar rdul phran khyod sdug bsngal na de bzhin du bdag cag sdug bsngal bar 'gyur la/ bdag

cag rgyal po'i 'khor rgyal rigs drug po ni rdul phran khyod kyi grogs po dang / snying du sdug pa dang / ne'u zla lags kyis/ rdul phran khyod gal te yab 'das te yab kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la bzhag na ci nas

kyang bdag cag la longs spyod dag las longs spyod kyi bgo bsha' mdzod cig ces gsol pa dgongs lags sam/ shes ldan dag ngas dran no/ /lha da ni de'i dus la bab lags so/ /'o na sa chen po nang yangs la phyi shing rta'i dbyibs ltar

'dug pa 'di cha bdun du 'god pa su zhig yod/ lha gnag lhas skyes ma lags pa gzhan ma mchis so/ /de nas rgyal po rdul phran gyis bram ze gnag lhas skyes pho nyas bkug nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /mkhan po khyod kyis sa chen

po 'di nang yangs la phyi shing rta'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa 'di cha bdun du 'god nus sam/ lha legs par rngo thog go/ /de nas bram ze gnag lhas skyes kyis rgyal po rdul phran las mnyan nas dkyil dang dkyil na yul 'khor bu chung

dang 'khor bu chung yod pa gang yin pa de dag rgyal po rdul phran gyi ris su bcad pa dang / des rgyal po rdul phran yid rangs par gyur to/ /bram ze gnag lhas skyes kyis kho bo'i ris ji lta bu zhig tu bcad na/ da lha dper na mkhas pa

gsal ba bye brag shes pas byas pa lta bur gyur te zhes yid rangs pa yang go bar byas so/ /yul 'khor bu chung gzhan gang dag yin pa de dag rgyal po'i 'khor rgyal rigs drug gi ris su bcad pa dang / des rgyal po'i 'khor rgyal rigs

drug kyang yid rangs par gyur te/ bram ze gnag lhas skyes kyis ji lta bu zhig tu bgos na/ ji ltar mkhas pa gsal ba bye brag shes pas byas pa bzhin du kho bo cag gis yun ring po nas bsams bsams pa'i yul

de dag da kho bo cag gi ris su bcad ces yid rangs pa yang go bar byas so/ /de nas rgyal po'i zham ring rgyal rigs drug gis bram ze gnag lhas skyes la 'di skad ces smras so/ /mkhan po rgyal po rdul phran la ji ltar rjes su ston pa de

bzhin du deng slan chad bdag cag la yang khyod kyis rjes su bstan par dgongs su gsol/ de bzhin du bya'o zhes bram ze gnag lhas skyes kyis mnyan to/ /de nas bram ze gnag lhas skyes rgyal bo rdul phran dang / rgyal po'i 'khor

rgyal rigs drug dang / rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu bdun dang / bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu bdun dang / khyim bdag shing sa la chen po lta bu bdun dang / thabs rir bab pa'i chung ma bzhi bcu la rjes su ston to/ /bram ze'i

khye'u lnga brgya tsam la bram ze'i gsang tshig klog tu 'jug go/ /'dul sbyong mkhan dang / glang po che la zhon pa dang / rta la zhon pa dang / ral gri 'dzin stangs mkhan dang / gzhu 'dzin pa dang / zha 'bring byed pa dang / go re long byed

pa dang / bro ga len pa dang / rgyal po'i bu rtul phod pa dpa' ba rab gnon tshan po che dang ldan pa rnams dang / sems srung ba dang / skra mkhan dang / khrus byed pa du ma la yang rjes su ston par byed do/ /de nas bram ze gnag lhas

skyes kyi ming bram ze gnag lhas skyes shes bya ba'i ming gang yin pa de nub par gyur cing / bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes shes bya bar grags so/ /de nas bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes bram ze rnams kyis ni tshangs par

bkur ro/ /rgyal pos ni lhar bkur ro/ /grong mi dang yul mi rnams kyis ni rgyal por bkur ro/ /bram ze rnams kyis ni 'di snyam du shes te/ bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes kyis tshangs pa'i lam mthong ste/ tshangs pa'i lam

shes shing mthong nas mtha' dag rdzogs par byas te gnas so snyam mo/ /rgyal po dang / grong mi dang / yul mi rnams kyis kyang 'di snyam du shes te/ bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes kyis tshangs pa'i lam shes shing / tshangs pa'i lam

mthong ste/ tshangs pa'i lam shes shing mthong nas mtha' dag rdzogs par byas te gnas so snyam mo/ /de nas bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag da ltar bram ze rnams kyis ni tshangs par bkur/ rgyal pos

ni lhar bkur/ grong mi dang yul mi rnas kyis ni rgyal po bkur/ bram ze rnams ni 'di snyam du shes te/ bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes kyis tshangs pa'i lam mthong ste/ tshangs pa'i lam shes shing mthong nas mtha' dag rdzogs

par byas te gnas so snyam mo/ /rgyal po dang / grong mi dang / yul mi rnams kyis kyang 'di snyam du shes te/ bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes ni tshangs pa'i lam shes shing tshangs pa'i lam mthong ste/ tshangs pa'i lam shes shing mthong nas

mtha' dag rdzogs par byas te gnas so snyam mo/ /bdag gis ni tshangs pa'i lam yang mi shes/ bdag ni tshangs pa'i lam shes shing mthong nas mtha' dag rdzogs par byas te gnas pa yang ma yin na/ bdag gis bdag gi pha bram ze gnag

lhas skyes las bram ze gang zhig dbyar zla ba bzhi po dag la dben par snying rje'i bsam gtan gyis gnas na de'i drung du tshangs pa 'ong bar 'gyur ro zhes thos kyis/ ma la bdag gis dbyar zla ba bzhi dag la dben par snying rje'i bsam gtan gyis

gnas par bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes kyis rgyal po rdul phran la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha re shig rjes su ston pa gzhan zhig btsal du gsol/ bdag ni dbyar zla ba bzhi po dag la dben par snying

rje'i bsam gtan gyis gnas par 'tshal lo/ /mkhan po dag de'i dus la bab par mkhyen par mdzod cig /rgyal po'i 'khor rgyal rigs drug dang / rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu bdun dang / bram ze shing

sA la chen po lta bu bdun dang / khyim bdag shing sA la chen po lta bu bdun dang / thabs rir bab pa'i chung ma bzhi bcu la smras pa/ shes ldan dag re shig ma g.yeng bar bag yod par khyim na 'khod cig /bdag ni dbyar

gyi zla ba bzhi po dag la dben par snying rje'i bsam gtan gyis gnas par 'dod do/ /rje'i sras da de'i dus la bab lags so/ /bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya po dag la smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u dag re shig ji skad thos pa dang /

ji skad bstan pa dang / ji ltar kun chub par byas pa'i rig pa dag zung shig /lhogs shig /bdag ni dbyar zla ba bzhi po dag la dben par snying rje'i bsam gtan gyis gnas par 'dod do/ /mkhan po da de'i dus la bab

lags so/ /'dul sbyong mkhan dang / glang po che la zhon pa dang / rta la zhon pa dang / shing rta pa dang / ral gri 'dzin stangs mkhan dang / gzhu 'dzin pa dang / zhabs 'bring byed pa dang / go re long byed pa dang / bro ga len pa dang /

rgyal po'i bu rtul phod pa dpa' ba rab gnon tshan po che dang ldan pa rnams dang / sems srung ba dang / skra mkhan dang / khrus byed pa du ma la smras pa/ shes ldan dag re shig rjes su ston pa gzhan tshol cig /kho bo ni dbyar zla ba

bzhi po dag la dben par snying rje'i bsam gtan gyis gnas par 'dod do/ /mkhan po da de'i dus la bab lags so/ /de nas bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes kyis grong khyer gyi shar phyogs su khang bzangs shig

brtsigs nas/ dbyar zla ba bzhi po dag la dben par snying rje'i bsam gtan gyis gnas pa las de'i drung du tshangs pa ma 'ongs so/ /de nas bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes kyis dbyar gyi zla ba bzhir zhag gcig gis

ma lon pa dang 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi pha bram ze gnag lhas skyes las dbyar zla ba bzhi po dag la dben par snying rje'i bsam gtan gyis gnas na/ de'i drung du tshangs pa 'ong bar 'gyur ro zhes thos na bdag gi

drung du ni tshangs pa ma 'ongs so snyam mo/ /de nas tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag pos bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes kyi bsam pa sems kyis shes nas/ dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i lag pa bskum pa las brkyang ba

'am/ brkyang ba las bskum pa tsam gyis tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nas mi snang bar gyur cing / bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes kyi khang bzangs su 'ongs so/ /de'i tshe tshangs pa mi mjed kyi

bdag po'i kha dog gi mthus khang bzangs thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par gyur to/ /bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes kyis nam gyi cha smad la bab pa dang / khang bzangs thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par

gyur pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ 'di 'dra ba yi kha dog ni/ /bdag gis ma mthong ma thos na/ /gzugs bzang kha dog ldan pa yi/ /grogs po khyod ni su zhig yin/ /gang la

lhar bcas tshangs ris dang / /de bzhin ris ni gzhan dag gis/ /gzhon nur rab shes de lta bur/ /gnag lhas skyes kyis nga shes byos/ /tshangs pa khyod la 'dud bgyid cing / /bkur sti yang ni bgyid lags kyis/ /

bdag gi tshig rnams gsan mdzod la/ /myur du gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ /gnag lhas skyes pa khyod kyis ni/ /smras pa'i tshig de gzung bar byas/ /tshe 'di'i don ni gang yin dang / /phyi ma'i don ni gang yin pa/ /

yid la bsams pa de dag ni/ /bram ze nga la dris shig dang / /dris pa de dang de dag ni/ /nga yis khyod la gtan la dbab/ /de nas bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes 'di snyam du sems te/ re shig bdag gis mthong ba'i chos kyi

don gyis thob par bya ba gang yin pa de ni bdag gis thob kyis/ ma la bdag gis tshe phyi ma'i don las brtsams te dri bar bya'o snyam nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ blo la bsdogs pa'i yid gnyis the tshom dag /tshangs pa

kun bged gzhon nu la 'dri ba/ /gang du gnas shing gang la bslab byas na/ /tshangs pa'i 'jig rten mi 'chi 'thob par 'gyur/ /bram ze mi yi nang na nga'o snyam spangs shing / /gcig pur gyur pa snying rjer mos pa dang / /dri

nga med cing 'khrig las chags bral ba/ /'di la gnas shing 'di nyid la bslabs nas/ /mi yis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten 'chi med 'thob/ /de nas bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes 'di snyam du sems te/ tshangs pas bshad pa/ bram

ze mi yi nang na nga'o snyam spangs shing / /zhes bya ba 'di'i don yang bdag gis kun shes/ tshangs pas bshad pa/ gcig pur gyur pa snying rjer mos pa dang / zhes bya ba 'di'i don yang bdag gis kun shes na/ tshangs pas bshad pa/ dri nga med

cing 'khrig las chags bral ba/ /zhes bya ba 'di'i don bdag gis mi shes so snyam du bsams nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ tshangs pa mi'i nang dri nga gang zhig lags/ /'jig rten kun ni ngogs kyis 'bab chu ltar/ /gang gis bsgribs na

ngan song sgrib pa can/ /tshangs pa 'thob 'gyur lam ni mi shes pa'o/ /khro dang brdzun dang khon dang rnam 'tshe dang / /'jungs dang mngon pa'i nga rgyal mi bzod dang / /chags dang zhe sdang de bzhin gti mug dang / /phrag dog ser sna dag dang 'tshig

pa ste/ /de dag bram ze mi'i nang dri nga yin/ /'jig rten kun na ngogs kyis 'bab chu ltar/ /de yis bsgribs na ngan song sgrib pa can/ /tshangs pa 'thob 'gyur lam ni mi shes so/ /de nas bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes 'di snyam du

sems te/ ji skad du bdag gis tshangs pas smras pa'i don shes pa ltar na/ khyim pa khyim na gnas pas ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du tshangs par spyod pa sal gyis dag pa/ ma 'dres pa yongs su rdzogs pa yongs su dag pa rnam par

byung ba spyad pa 'di ni sla ba ma yin pas ma la bdag skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag

pos bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes kyi bsam pa sems kyis shes nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ tshangs par skye bar bya ba'i phyir/ /'di la 'bad pa brtan par gyis/ /chos 'di dag pa g.yung drung yin/ /zhes smras nas tshangs pa mi mjed kyi

bdag po de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas dbyar zla ba bzhi po dag 'das nas rgyal po rdul phran bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes gang na ba der dong ste phyin pa dang / bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes kyi rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas

te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang / rgyal po rdul phran la bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes kyis 'di skad ces smras so/ /sa bdag rgyal chen rdul phran khyod/ /bdag gi tshig ni gsan par mdzod/ /gnag

lhas skyes bdag mi spro yis/ /rgyal srid nyid kyis bskyang du gsol/ /de nas rgyal po rdul phran gyis tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ khyod kyi 'dod pa mi chog pa/ /gang yin de yang khyod la bskang / /khyod la 'tshe ba de bsad kyis/ /gnag

lhas skyes kyis bdag ma spang / /rgyal po bdag 'dod mi chog min/ /bdag la 'tshe ba'ang ma mchis te/ /mi ma yin pa'i tshig thos nas/ /khyim gyi gzhi la mi spro'o/ /gang las thos nas bram ze khyod/ /'dir ni bdag dang 'dod

spong ba/ /mi ma yin pa de ci 'dra/ /dri yis de ni bdag la smros/ /snying rje yi ni gnas pa yis/ /rab dben bsam gtan byed pa na/ /de nas tshangs pa mdun du 'ongs/ /tha dad phyogs ni snang bar byas/ /bdag gis de yi

tshig thos nas/ /khyim gyi gzhi la mi spro'o/ /bram ze gang du 'gro ba der/ /kho bo yang ni 'gro bya zhing / /khyod kyi nyan thos 'gyur bar bgyis/ /gnag lhas skyes khyod ston pa mdzod/ /gang la so so'i skye bo rnams/ /chags

pa'i 'dod pa de dag spongs/ /'dod pa rnams la mi lta zhing / /bden pa'i chos la gnas par mdzod/ /tshangs par skye bar bgyi slad du/ /nor bu dag pa bai dUr+ya/ /ji ltar ma bcos dri med lta'i/ /tshangs par

spyod pa spyad bar bgyi/ /mkhan po da de'i dus la bab par mkhyen par mdzod cig /de nas bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes kyis rgyal po'i 'khor rgyal rigs drug rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag bdag ni skra dang kha spu bregs te

gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung na shes ldan dag ci byed/ mkhan po lo bdun du gzhes shig dang / lo bdun 'das nas bdag cag bu dang / spun dang / gzhan dag rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug

la bkod nas mkhan po rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu 'byung ngo / /shes ldan dag lo bdun lta ha cang yang thogs ches so/ /gzhan yang 'dod pa rnams ni chags par 'gyur ba/ longs spyod rnams ni myos par 'gyur ba/ srog 'chad pa

ni shes par dka' ba yin pas lo bdun 'das na yang shes ldan dag rab tu 'byung ngam mi 'byung gtol med pas re shig kho bo rab tu 'byung ngo / /mkhan po lo drug gam/ lnga 'am/ bzhi 'am/ gsum 'am/ gnyis sam/ gcig gam/ zla ba

bdun nam/ drug gam/ lnga 'am/ bzhi 'am/ gsum 'am/ gnyis sam/ gcig gam/ zhag bdun zhig gzhes shig dang / zhag bdun 'das nas bdag cag bu dang / spun dang / gzhan dag rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la bkod nas mkhan

po rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu 'byung bar bgyi'o/ /shes ldan dag zhag bdun lta ring po yang mi thogs na/ 'on kyang 'dod pa rnams ni chags par 'gyur ba/ longs spyod rnams ni rgyags par 'gyur ba/ srog 'chad

pa shes par dka' ba yin pas zhag bdun 'das na yang shes ldan dag rab tu 'byung ngam mi 'byung gtol med pas re shig bdag rab tu 'byung ngo / /mkhan po da de'i dus mkhyen par mdzod cig /de nas bram ze chen po gnag lhas

skyes kyis rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu bdun dang / bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu bdun dang / khyim bdag shing sA la chen po lta bu bdun dang / thabs rir bab pa'i chung ma bzhi bcu la smras pa/ shes ldan dag bdag

ni skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung na shes ldan dag ci byed rje'i sras bdag cag btsun mo bgyi ba'i dus na ni btsun mo/ grogs bgyi ba'i dus na ni

grogs lags pas rje'i sras gal te skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung na/ rje'i sras rab tu byung ba'i rjes su bdag cag kyang rab tu 'byung bar

bgyi'o/ /shes ldan dag da de'i dus la bab par shes par gyis shig /de nas bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes kyis bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya tsam la smras pa/ shes ldan dag bdag ni skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig

bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung na shes ldan dag ci byed/ mkhan po bdag cag gang cung zad ci 'tshal ba de thams cad ni mkhan po las brten te lags kyis/ gal te mkhan po skra dang

kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung na/ mkhan po rab tu byung ba'i rjes su bdag cag kyang rab tu 'byung bar bgyi'o/ /shes ldan dag da de'i dus la bab par shes

par gyis shig /'dul sbyong mkhan dang / glang po che la zhon pa dang / rta la zhon pa dang / shing rta pa dang / ral gri'i 'dzin stangs mkhan dang / gzhu 'dzin pa dang / zha 'bring byed pa dang / go re long byed pa dang / bro ga len pa dang / rgyal po'i

bu dpa' ba rtul phod pa rab gnon tshan po che dang ldan pa rnams dang / sems srung ba dang / skra mkhan dang / khrus byed pa du ma la smras pa/ shes ldan dag bdag ni zhes bya ba nas/ skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te dad pa yang dag

pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung na zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ mkhan po rab tu 'byung ba'i rjes su bdag cag kyang rab tu 'byung bar bgyi'o/ /shes ldan dag de'i dus la dbab par shes par gyis shig /de nas bram ze chen po

gnag lhas skyes skra dang / kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo / /rgyal po rdul phran yang 'khor brgya phrag du ma dang / 'khor stong phrag du ma dang / 'khor brgya stong phrag du ma

dang skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te/ dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu byung ngo / /rgyal po'i 'khor rgyal rigs drug dang / rgyal rigs

shing sA la chen po lta bu bdun dang / bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu bdun dang / khyim bdag shing sA la chen po lta bu bdun dang / thabs rir bab pa'i chung ma bzhi bcu yang skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te/ dad pa yang dag

pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu byung ngo / /bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya tsam yang skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes

rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu byung ngo / /glang po che la zhon pa dang / rta la zhon pa dang / shing rta pa dang / ral gri 'dzin stangs pa dang / gzhu 'dzin pa dang / zha 'bring byed pa dang / go re long byed pa dang / bro ga len pa dang / rgyal po'i bu dpa' ba rtul phod

pa rab gnon tshan po che dang ldan pa rnams dang / sems srung ba dang / skra mkhan dang / khrus byed pa rnams kyang skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes rab tu byung ba'i rjes

su rab tu byung ngo / /bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes de ltar rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa lnga po sems nye bar nyon mongs par byed pa/ shes rab nyam chung bar byed pa/ gnod par byed pa'i phyogs dang 'thun

pa/ mya ngan las mi 'da' bar byed pa rnams spangs nas byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems kho na med pa/ 'gran zla med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ yangs pa/ rgya chen por gyur pa/ tshad med pa shin du bsgoms pas phyogs gcig tu

mos te/ khyab par byas nas rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /de bzhin du gnyis pa dang / de bzhin du gsum pa dang / de bzhin du bzhi pa dang / bla dang 'og dang / thad kar rnam pa thams cad du 'jig rten 'di thams cad byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems

khon med pa/ 'gran zla med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ yangs pa/ rgya chen por gyur pa/ tshad med pa shin tu bsgoms pas mos te khyab par byas nas rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /de bzhin du snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms dang ldan

pa'i sems khon med pa/ 'gran zla med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ yangs pa/ rgya chen por gyur pa/ tshad med pa shin tu bsgoms pas phyogs gcig tu mos te khyab par byas nas rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /de bzhin du gnyis pa dang / de

bzhin du gsum pa dang / de bzhin du bzhi pa dang / bla dang 'og dang / thad kar rnam pa thams cad du 'jig rten 'di thams cad btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems khon med pa/ 'gran zla med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ yangs pa rgya chen por gyur pa/ tshad

med pa shin tu bsgoms pas phyogs gcig tu mos te khyab par byas nas rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /de nas bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes kyi ming bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes/ bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes shes bya

ba'i ming gang yin pa de nub par gyur cing / ston pa gnag lhas skyes shes bya bar grags so/ /de nas ston pa gnag lhas skyes 'khor brgya phrag du ma dang / 'khor stong phrag du ma dang / 'khor brgya stong phrag du ma dang / grong rdal nas

grong rdal dang / grong khyer nas grong khyer du ljongs rgyu zhing dong ngo / /de'i tshe skyes pa 'am bud med dag las nyes pa 'ga' byung na ston pa gnag lhas skyes phyogs gang na 'dug pa'i phyogs de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas ston

pa gnag lhas skyes de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyag 'tshal lo/ /ston pa gnag lhas skyes de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyag 'tshal lo/ /ston pa gnag lhas skyes de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes ched du brjod pa/

lan gsum brjod do/ /mdun na 'don bdun byung ba gang yin pa ni/ ral gris 'tsho dang tshangs sbyin dang / /sna tshogs za dang de bzhin sa/ /rdul can yul 'khor skyong gnyis gnyis/ /de tshe skye bo de bdun byung / /ka

ling ka na mche ba'i khyim/ /rdo mangs na ni skem byed de/ /srung byed na ni ma he ldan/ /ang gar tsam pa ris su bcad/ /lus 'phags na ni mi thi la/ /stang zil can na ma rungs pa/ /bA rA Na sIr ka shi ste/ /gnag lhas skyes kyis

ris bcad de'o/ /rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi ston pa gnag lhas skyes gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/ /rgyal po chen po ngas sems can la phan pa byas pa des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang

chub thob bo snyam na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang nga'i de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang / rkyen tsam dang / tshogs tsam yin no/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par

rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu thog mar thugs gang du bskyed lags/ rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba rgyal po 'od ldan zhes bya ba byung ste/ de'i yul du glang po rin po che me tog kun mu ta'i mdog ltar dkar ba/ yan lag bdun shin tu

gnas pa/ gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa zhig byung ngo / /de nas rgyal po 'dod ldan gyis glang po 'dul mkhan mkhas pa pho nyas bkug nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /mkhas pa des pa khyod kyis glang po che dam

pa 'di myur du legs par dul bar byos la nga la phul cig /lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes glang po che 'dul mkhan mkhas pas rgyal po 'od ldan las mnyan nas glang po che dam pa de 'dul bar byed de/ de dul bar rig nas

rgyal po 'od ldan la phul te/ lha'i glang po che dam pa ni dul lags pas lha da de'i dus la bab par mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ de nas rgyal po 'od ldan glang po che dam pa de la zhon te glang po'i 'dul mkhan yang gong du zhon nas ri dgas 'chor du song ngo / /

ji tsam na glang po che des nags kyi bal glang mo'i dri tshor nas des dri de'i rjes bzhin du brgyugs so/ /de nas rgyal po glang po che rlung ltar mgyogs pas khyer ba dang / glang po che'i 'dul mkhan la smras pa/ kye glang po 'dul mkhan nam mkha' 'gul ba

'dra zhing phyogs kun myur du 'du bar 'gro ba 'dra/ /sa ni mtha' dag 'khor lo bzhin 'khor shing rnams mkha' la 'khor ba 'dra/ /glang po'i dbang po gangs ri 'gro ba lta bu 'di rgyug mthong nas ni/ /ri bo 'di rgyug snyam nas ri rnams gya

tsom myur du rgyug pa 'dra/ /kye glang po che 'dul mkhan glang po che'i dbang po thul cig thul cig /glang chen dbang po tshar gcad par/ /bzang po rab tu 'bad par gyis/ /glang chen gnye'u rengs khyer ba yis/ /kho bo cir 'gyur gtol

med khyer/ /glang po che 'dul bas smras pa/ lha drang srong dam pas smras pa'i gsang sngags bzlas bgyi zhing / /'di la lcags kyus tshar bcad 'bad pa yang bgyi na/ /'chi bar nges pa rnams kyi tshe yis sman bzhin du/ /glang po
'di ni bdag stobs zil gyis mnan nas mchi/ /mi yi dbang po lcags kyu 'am/ /zhags pa 'am yang na lcag gis kyang / /'dod chags gnye'u rengs khyer ba'i sems/ /tshar gcad nus pa ma lags so/ /'dod chags

sems kyi zug rngu ni/ /ji zhig ltar na skye 'gyur te/ /tshul 'ga' zhig gis rgyas 'gyur la/ /'ga' zhig gis kyang zhi bar 'gyur/ /gang gi tshe glang po'i 'dul mkhan des glang po che dam pa de gnas thams cad du bzlog par

ma nus pa de'i tshe/ rgyal po la smras pa/ lha glang po che 'di ni 'khrul gyis shing gi yal ga la 'jus mdzod cig /de nas rgyal po dang 'dul mkhan shing gi yal ga la 'jus te 'dug go/ /de nas di'u shi ba las thar te bde bar gyur nas rgyal pos

'dul mkhan la smras pa/ khyod kyis glang po che dam pa ma dul bar nga la phul lo/ /des smras pa/ lha 'di bdag gis shin tu dul bar bgyis te/ 'on kyang nags kyi bal glang mo'i dri tshor nas nyan du ma btub lags so/ /lha de lta lags mod kyi

dpyad dran nas ring po mi thogs par mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas glang po che de myos pa dang bral bar gyur nas zhag bdun lon pa dang dpyad rjes su dran nas rang nyid gnas su 'ongs te 'dug go/ /de nas glang po che 'dul

mkhan gyis rings pa rings par rgyal po la smras pa/ lha glang po che de ni mchis lags so/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ khyod kyis ni 'di ma thul to/ /lha thul lags so/ /ci mngon lha'i spyan sngar bab par bgyi'o zhes des lcags kyi thu

lum so mal du tshos par bsregs pa zhig dpyad kyi sar khyer te len du gzhug par brtsams so/ /de nas des bag tsha ba med pas blang bar brtsams pa dang glang po 'dul mkhan gyis smras pa/ lha len du ni btub na 'on kyang 'gum par

'gyur ro/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ kye mkhas pa de ltar shin tu dul ba 'dis bdag cag g.yengs pa 'di la rgyu ci zhig yod/ lha bdag gis sngar lus thul gyi sems ni ma lags so zhes ma gsol tam/ bdag ni lus 'dul ba
lags kyi/ sems 'dul ba ni ma lags so/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ sems 'dul ba 'ga' yod par khyod kyis mthong ngam/ thos sam/ de lhas bskul nas smras pa/ lha lus 'dul ba dang sems 'dul ba sangs rgyas bcom

ldan 'das rnams mchis so/ /'dod pa'i rgyus byung nyes gzhom phyir/ /mang po brtson par byed mod kyi/ /mi nus par ni shes nas kyang / /brtson 'grus nyams nas ldog par byed/ /de dang der ni de lta bu'i/ /'bad pa rnam pa

mang byas kyang / /'dod pa'i 'dod chags nags tshal gyi/ /rtsa nas phyin par mi 'gyur ro/ /'dod pa gzhom par 'dod pa ni/ /kha cig yul rnams spong bar byed/ /de gzhom 'dod pa gzhan dag ni/ /dga' bzhin dbang

po tshim par byed/ /lha dang lha min mi dang seng ge stag dang sbrul dag dang / /srin bu bye ba phye ma leb dang 'jig rten 'di dag kun/ /'dod pa'i zhags pa shin tu phra mo rnams kyis yid bcings nas/ /srid 'gro thibs po 'dir ni 'khor

lo bzhin du shin du 'khor/ /bdag ni sna tshogs thabs kyis 'di lta bu/ /gzugs bzang phun sum tshogs pa'i glang po 'dul/ /rgyal po gzugs can ma lags phra sems ni/ /drang srong chab klung 'tshal bas ma thul to/ /glang chen 'dul

ba gzugs med phra ba'i sems/ /drang srong chu klung za bas ma thul na/ /gang gi dbang du gzugs med sems 'gyur te/ /mi yi 'jig rten dag na yod dam kye/ /gang gi dbang du gzugs med sems 'gyur te/ /lhan gcig mi yi 'jig rten

na mchis te/ /rgyal po chen po sangs rgyas mthu bo che/ /nyon mongs spangs pa dpa' bo stobs ldan pa/ /de dang gang dag de 'drar rjes 'brang ba/ /de'i dbang 'dir ni gzugs med sems 'gyur ro/ /de nas rgyal po 'od ldan gyis

sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi brtson 'grus dang stobs thos nas sbyin pa dag byin/ bsod nams dag byas te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab pa/ sbyin pa rgya chen gyur pa 'di yis su/ /

'gro bar rang byung sangs rgyas gyur nas ni/ /sngon gyi rgyal dbang rnams kyis ma bsgral ba/ /skye bo'i tshogs dag bdag gis bsgral bar bya/ /bdag gis skye dgu legs bskyangs las byung ba 'am/ /btang ba las byung bsod

nams yod pa gang / /des ni sangs rgyas nyid thob 'jig rten dag /'dod pa'i rims nad las rab thar bar bya/ /rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rgyal po 'od ldan du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni de'i tshe

de'i dus na nga nyid de yin te/ ngas der thog mar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i

phyir yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang la thog mar bsod snyoms phul lags/ rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba yangs pa zhes bya ba'i grong khyer yod de/ yangs pa'i grong khyer du rdza mkhan yangs pa'i 'od ces bya

ba zhig byung ngo / /de'i tshe ston pa shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo zhes bya ba nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/ /de'i mchog zung dang bzang po zung ni shA ri'i bu dang maud gal

gyi bu zhes bya'o/ /rim gro byed pa ni dge slong kun dga' bo zhes bya'o/ /de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na yangs pa'i grong khyer

du byon pa dang / de rlung shas che ba'i snyun gyis thebs nas des tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo song la rdza mkhan yangs pa'i 'od las mar dang / til mar dang / bu ram chu khyer te shog shig /btsun pa bka'

bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas rdza mkhan yangs pa'i 'od gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / rdza mkhan yangs pa'i 'od la 'di skad ces smras so/ /yangs pa'i 'od shes par gyis shig

bcom ldan 'das rlung shas che ba'i snyun gyis thebs te/ de la mar dang / til mar dang / bu ram chu dgos so/ /de nas rdza mkhan yangs pa'i 'od kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo las mnyan nas mar dang / til mar dang /

bu ram chu khyer te bu dang lhan cig yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste phyin pa dang / mar dang / til mar gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi sku byugs nas chu 'jam pos sku khrus byas te/
bu ram chu'i btung ba gsol to/ /des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa bzod cing 'tsho bar gyur to/ /de nas rdza mkhan yangs pa'i 'od kyis de'i zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas smon lam gdab

par brtsams pa/ bdag kyang rab tu sbyin pa 'di yis shAkya'i rigs skyes pa/ /yon tan rigs dang rus dag mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas nyid gyur cing / /bdag gis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten bar gyi nyam thag 'chi ba yi/ /

pha rol zhi ba rgya chen 'jigs pa med pa sgrol bar shog /de'i bus kyang smon lam btab pa/ bdag kyang las 'dis na gzugs med pa'i chos rnams rtogs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi rim gro byed par gyur cig /

ces byas so/ /rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rdza mkhan yangs pa'i 'od gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin te/ der ngas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la thog mar bsod snyoms
phul lo/ /de'i tshe de'i dus kyi bu gang yin pa de ni kun dga' bo yin no// //'dul ba gzhi/ bam po lnga bcu rtsa gcig pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

byang chub don du gnyer ba'i slad du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig la bsnyen bkur bgyis lags/ rgyal po chen po re shig grangs med pa dang po la/ /sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa nas/ /'dren pa yul

'khor skyong gi bar/ /de'i bar bdun khri lnga stong gi/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni ngas mchod do/ /grangs med gcig ni 'das pa yi/ /rgyal ba ngas ni mchod byas te/ /sangs rgyas nyid ni 'dod pa'i phyir/ /nga la skyo ba'i sems

med do/ /rgyal po chen po grangs med pa gnyis pa la ni/ sangs rgyas mar me mdzad nas ni/ /dbang po'i rgyal mtshan thub pa'i bar/ /bdun khri drug stong dag gi ni/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni nga yis mchod/ /

grangs med gnyis po tshang bar ni/ /rgyal ba nga yis mchod byas te/ /skye ba de dang de dag tu/ /nga la skyo ba'i sems med do/ /grangs med pa gsum pa la yang / /sangs rgyas legs mdzad nas bzung ste/ /sangs rgyas 'od

srung bar dag tu/ /bdun khri bdun stong nga yis mchod/ /grangs med gsum po de la ni/ /rgyal ba ngas ni mchod byas te/ /byang chub phyir ni spyod pa na/ /de tshe nga la skyo sems med/ /nga ni byang chub sems dpa' na/ /sangs rgyas mchog ni

de dag mchod/ /'jig rten 'dren pa de kun gyis/ /nga ni sangs rgyas nyid du bstan/ /ngas ni sngon bsams gang yin pa/ /nga ni smon lam thams cad rdzogs/ /ngas ni sangs rgyas khur bor te/ /sems can rnams ni rjes

su bzung / /de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste rjes su yi rang nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo / /

de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos zhus pa/ 'jig rten gtso bo rnam 'dren pa/ /thub pa khyod kyi byang chub thugs/ /thog mar gang du bskyed pa dag /skal ldan chen po bdag la gsungs/ /

khyod sngon byang chub spyod pa na/ /sangs rgyas ji snyed dus gang du/ /ji lta bur ni bsnyen bkur mdzad/ /mi mchog de ni bdag la gsungs/ /kun dga' bo yi tshig gsan nas/ /rkang gnyis dam pa rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /

'gro la thugs rje mdzad nas su/ /thub pas byang chub spyod pa gsungs/ /sangs rgyas 'dod chags bral thos shing / /glang po dregs pa'i shas chen dang / /'jig rten sdug bsngal gyur mthong nas/ /ngas ni byang chub sems

bskyed do/ /mi dbang 'od ldan gyur pa na/ /ngas ni byang chub 'dod pa'i phyir/ /ngas ni brtan por dam bcas te/ /skyon med pa yi sbyin pa btang / /nga ni rdza mkhan gyur pa na/ /sangs rgyas shAkya thub mthong nas/ /byang chub phyir ni

thog mar ngas/ /mar dang til mar gyis mchod do/ /sngon gyi skye ba gzhan dag tu/ /tshong dpon bu mor gyur pa na/ /sangs rgyas kauN+Di n+ya mthong nas/ /ngas ni mar me'i sbyin pa byas/ /sangs rgyas gzhan gyis mi thul ba'i/ /nga sngon sde

snod gsum pa las/ /dge slong dge 'dun rtsod pa la/ /dge 'dun la ni bud med smras/ /tshig gi nyes byas byung bas na/ /mod la bud med nyid du gyur/ /slar yang sems dang byas pas ni/ /skyes pa nyid ni thob par gyur/ /sngon gyi skye ba gzhan dag tu/ /nga ni rgyal po'i sras

gyur tshe/ /gcen po rin chen gtsug tor la/ /mar me'i sbyin pas mchod byas shing / /ngas ni zla gsum drug bcu ru/ /bde mdzad kyi ni zham ring byas/ /ngas ni mya ngan 'das pa de'i/ /mchod rten la ni nor kun phul/ /nga ni tshong dpon gyur pa na/ /

sgra snyan dbyangs la zla gsum mchod/ /de yi mchod rten mthon po ni/ /dgu bcu rtsa gcig rtsig tu bcug /nga ni bram zer gyur pa na/ /sangs rgyas dpal 'byung mthong nas dga'/ /legs par thal sbyar de nas yang / /mi mchog la ni

mchod pa byas/ /nga sngon bram zer gyur pa na/ /bstan bcos du ma 'jigs med tshe/ /sangs rgyas phan par bzhed mdzad pa/ /nga yi stan la spyan drangs so/ /sngon ni dka' thub ldan pa yi/ /drang srong chos la gnas gyur tshe/ /sangs rgyas kauN+Di

n+ya mthong nas/ /ngas ni ri bo'i kha nas mchongs/ /drang srong gyur na'ang yid dga' bas/ /sangs rgyas blta na sdug mthong nas/ /rtsa ba dang ni 'bras bu'i phyir/ /bsti gnas bzhugs pa ngas spyan drangs/ /'jig rten 'dren pa spyan mdzes la/ /

drang srong gyur tshe bkur sti byas/ /shing shun yid du 'ong ba yis/ /ngas ni mi yi mchog bkab bo/ /nga ni rgyal por gyur pa na/ /yan lag bzhi pa'i dpung spangs nas/ /byang chub 'dod pa'i ched du ngas/ /yul 'khor skyong gi zham 'bring byas/ /

sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa nas/ /'dren pa yul 'khor skyong gi bar/ /bdun khri dang ni lnga stong gi/ /sangs rgyas rnams la nga yis mchod/ /grangs med gcig ni 'das pa yi/ /rgyal ba ngas ni mchod byas te/ /byang chub phyir ni spyod pa na/ /

de tshe nga la skyo sems med/ /grangs med pa dang po'o/ /bram ze khye'u gyur de yi tshe/ /'od dang grags par ldan pa yi/ /sangs rgyas mar me mdzad mthong nas/ /ut+pal sngon po bdun gyis mchod/ /nga ni rgyal por gyur pa na/ /dka' thub spyod ces bya

ba yi/ /sangs rgyas mtshan mnga' mthong nas ni/ /mi mchog la ni bla res mchod/ /rgyal por gyur tshe mun 'joms pa'i/ /skal chen la ni rin po che/ /sna tshogs bkra ba'i rol mo yi/ /mchod pa dag gis bzhengs gsol to/ /kun dga' mi dbang

nga gyur pas/ /seng ge seng ge'i rtsal mnga' la/ /rin chen yu ba can gdugs kyis/ /mi mchog la ni mchod pa byas/ /rgyal por gyur tshe grong khyer ni/ /stong phrag drug bcu rnams su yang / /mi yi nyi ma bde mdzad ni/ /spyan drangs

nas ni mchod pa byas/ /'jig rten 'dren pa mi dbang la/ /bsro gang las dang de bzhin du/ /a gar nag po'i dri dag gis/ /bram zer gyur tshe zham 'bring byas/ /grong khyer rgyal srid 'phel bar ni/ /bram ze'i sangs rgyas sum bcu po/ /

gtsug tor can zhes 'jig rten grags/ /rgyal por gyur tshe mchod pa byas/ /grong khyer 'bras 'phel dag tu ni/ /sangs rgyas nyi shu rtsa lnga la/ /nga ni tshong dpon gyur pa na/ /tshangs par spyad pas mchod pa byas/ /grong khyer dga' ba de nyid du/ /

nga ni tshong dpon gyur pa'i tshe/ /sangs rgyas gtsug tor 'jig rten grags/ /gtsug lag khang gis mchod pa byas/ /tshong dpon gyur tshe rgyal ba drug /mchod phyir glang chen rta gser dang / /bud med rnams dang nor bu yi/ /rgyan

gyis bskyed mos tshal byas so/ /rgyal por gyur tshe dad pa yis/ /grong khyer yid 'ong de nyid du/ /byang chub don du gnyer ba ngas/ /gtsug tor can la skra bregs so/ /kun dga' bram zer gyur pa na/ /thub chen ma 'gags de la ni/ /

byang chub don du gnyer ba ngas/ /'bras bu mchog gis mchod pa byas/ /tshong dpon du ni gyur pa na/ /'jig rten 'dren pa spyan mdzes la/ /nor bu rin chen gyis mchod cing / /gtsug lag khang ni nyams dgas mchod/ /ded dpon du ni

gyur pa na/ /byang chub shing gi drung na ni/ /sangs rgyas legs 'khrungs bzhugs mthong nas/ /thog mar bsod snyoms la spyan drangs/ /nga ni ded dpon gyur pa na/ /byang chub shing drung thub pa ni/ /'jig rten dga' mdzad blo bzang mthong / /

'khor ni stong dang rab tu byung / /nga ni ded dpon gyur pa na/ /sangs rgyas tsan dan 'od dpag med/ /chu 'jam dang ni til mar dang / /bu ram la ni spyan drangs so/ /kun dga' rgyal por gyur pa na/ /tshangs sbyin grags pa chen po pa/ /'dren pa la ni zhal zas dang / /

thams cad sbyin pas mchod pa byas/ /bram zer yang ni gyur pa na/ /thugs rje chen po 'od zer can/ /thub pa rkang gnyis mchog mthong nas/ /smra ba'i rgyal mtshan gyis mchod do/ /rgyal por gyur nas sangs rgyas ni/ /don dam gzigs pa grong

mchog tu/ /'jug pa de la ta la yi/ /lo ma'i bsil yab mchod pa byas/ /nga ni tshong dpon gyur pa na/ /'jig rten gsal mdzad sangs rgyas ni/ /shAkya thub la me tog gi/ /sil ma sna tshogs dri sbyar mchod/ /grong khyer mchog tu mthor

'phags pa'i/ /mi mchog 'jug par mthong nas ni/ /rol mo rnams kyi sgra dag dang / /me tog rnams kyis mchod pa byas/ /rgyal por gyur tshe dad pa yis/ /sangs rgyas dam pa zhes bya ba/ /srid pa'i mtsho las rgal ba la/ /

thog mar shing rta dag gis bstabs/ /nga ni rgyal por gyur pa na/ /gtso bo'i ched du lam bstan cing / /dpag tshad brgya ni gang bar yang / /me tog khang brtsegs mchod pa byas/ /sangs rgyas dgra zhi mdzad pa ni/ /grong khyer gshegs

shes ngas thos nas/ /lam ni rgyal mtshan yongs bkang ste/ /rgyal po'i 'byor pas bsu ba byas/ /nga ni mnyan par gyur pa na/ /shing rta'i yan lag chu 'gram du/ /byon pa ngas ni mthong nas ni/ /thub pa chu yi rgyun las bsgral/ /

ded dpon gyur tshe dad pa yis/ /shing rta skal ldan chen po ni/ /ngas ni gru zam btags nas kyang / /mtsho chen las ni bsgral ba byas/ /nga ni rgyal por gyur pa na/ /rkang gnyis dam pa sangs rgyas ni/ /tshangs la tsan dan sa mchog gi/ /

ka bar ldan pa'i khang pas mchod/ /rgyal por gyur tshe sangs rgyas ni/ /bcom ldan tshangs pa'i tshe mchod cing / /snam sbyar rgyal mtshan bsgreng nas ni/ /ngas ni yams kyi nad zhi byas/ /tsan dan ldan la char med tshe/ /rgyal po lta bu'i sku khrus

byas/ /de tshe lhas ni char phab pas/ /skye bo rnams ni skyabs su dong / /nga ni rgyal por gyur pa na/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan zla ba la/ /mchod nas ngas ni byams bsgoms pas/ /bdud kyis btang ba'i yams nad zhi/ /mi yi dbang por sngon gyur tshe/ /ngas ni byang chub 'dod

pa'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas dbang po 'dul ba la/ /cho 'phrul phyir ni gsol ba btab/ /rgyal po dag tu gyur pa na/ /rin chen ri bo 'od chen ldan/ /'khor ni brgya stong phrag mang po/ /mthong nas lo lngar mchod pa byas/ /bram zer gyur tshe dad pa yis/ /

sangs rgyas don kun sgrub pa ni/ /mtshan dang ldan pa mthong nas kyang / /ngas ni bstod pa lnga brgya byas/ /bram zer gyur tshe yid dga' bas/ /sangs rgyas dbang po rgyal mtshan mthong / /ngas ni thal mo legs sbyar te/ /dam pa stsol ba'i 'os zhes

gsol/ /sangs rgyas mar me mdzad pa nas/ /thub pa dbang po'i rgyal mtshan bar/ /bdun khri dang ni drug stong gi/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni nga yis mchod/ /grangs med gnyis pa tshang bar ni/ /rgyal ba nga yis mchod byas te/ /byang chub phyir ni

spyod pa na/ /de tshe nga la skyo sems med/ /grangs med pa gnyis pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bde mdzad dam pa la/ /rgyal por gyur tshe mchod byas te/ /mya ngan 'das nas mchod rten brtsigs/ /rgyal srid rab tu zhi bar byas/ /rgyal por gyur tshe dad pas

ni/ /sangs rgyas gang po re skong la/ /tshul dang 'dra bar mchod byas te/ /chos kyi rgyal po zhes bsgrags so/ /sangs rgyas thams cad zil gnon la/ /tshong dpon gyur tshe legs par ni/ /rim gro byas shing mi mchog la/ /de bzhin gser gyi

me tog gtor/ /nga ni tshong dpon gyur pa na/ /sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can/ /thub chen grong mchog gshegs de la/ /gser gyi dra bas mchod pa byas/ /nga ni tshong dpon gyur pa na/ /pad ma dam pa dpa' chen po/ /rgyal por
grags pa'i grong mchog tu/ /dngul gyi me tog sil mas gtor/ /nga ni bram zer gyur pa na/ /sangs rgyas grags mchog slob ma yi/ /dge 'dun gyis ni mdun bltas pa/ /mthong nas mi mchog gnas kyis mchod/ /

nga ni rgyal por gyur pa na/ /legs gsung byang chub shing drung du/ /bzhugs pa ngas mthong glang po rta/ /shing rta dpung bu chung gis bsrungs/ /sangs rgyas dri med thub chen la/ /tshong dpon gyur tshe bsro khang dang / /mchod rten las dang mar mes ni/ /de yi tshe na

rnam par mchod/ /sangs rgyas sad mdzad rdo leb steng / /snyoms par zhugs pa mthong nas ni/ /dad pas rol mo'i sgra kun dang / /rgyal po'i 'byor pas bzhengs gsol to/ /tshong dpon du ni gyur pa na/ /'jig rten dga' mdzad dgra thul ba/ /sangs rgyas

spyod pas gshegs pa na/ /lam ni sna tshogs brgyan pas mchod/ /tshong dpon gyur tshe yid dga' bas/ /gnas 'jog gshegs pa thos nas ni/ /bskyed mos tshal ni brgyan byas nas/ /ngas ni gtsug lag khang brtsigs so/ /sangs rgyas

bcom ldan skar 'od la/ /byang chub 'dod pas dad pas ngas/ /rgyal po'i mdzod ni thams cad nas/ /nor bu rin chen rnams kyis mchod/ /nga ni rgyal por gyur pa'i tshe/ /tog gis bdud rnams bcom nas ni/ /chos kyi rgyal srid

bsgrags pa na/ /ngas ni rgyal mtshan kho na btsugs/ /b+ha ra d+h+wa dza blo ldan pa/ /bram ze mya ngan 'das pa la/ /rgyal po ngas ni ril ba dang / /dbyug gu gtsug lag khang chen byas/ /nga ni ded dpon gyur pa na/ /sangs rgyas 'dren pa don

gzigs pa/ /gser dang nor bu mu tig dang / /dri yi snying po rnams kyis mchod/ /sangs rgyas don kun sgrub pa ni/ /sangs rgyas spyod pas gshegs pa na/ /rgyal por gyur tshe dpung dag gi/ /tshogs kun gyis ni mchod pa byas/ /

sangs rgyas don dam gzigs pa ni/ /grong khyer dam par gshegs pa na/ /rgyal por gyur tshe rol mo dang / /me tog kun gyis mchod pa byas/ /nga ni ded dpon gyur pa na/ /sangs rgyas skar rgyal rkang gnyis mchog /dri yi snying po de

bzhin du/ /rtsa ba'i dri rnams rab tu gtor/ /rin chen bkra ba'i phug na yang / /sangs rgyas skar rgyal la ni ngas/ /de tshe tshigs bcad gcig bstod pas/ /bskal pa dgu ni phyir bsnyil to/ /'bru 'tshong du ni gyur pa na/ /sangs

rgyas bcom ldan rnam gzigs la/ /de tshe byang chub spyod pa'i phyir/ /mud ga spar gang phul bas mchod/ /tshong dpon gyur tshe ngas mchod pa/ /sangs rgyas mchog ni gtsug tor can/ /thub pa nyan thos tshogs bcas pa/ /zhal zas kyis ni zla

gsum mchod/ /tshong dpon du ni gyur pa'i tshe/ /'jig rten 'dren pa thams cad skyob/ /skal chen nyan thos bcas pa la/ /zhal zas kyis ni gus par mchod/ /tshong dpon gyur tshe dad pa yis/ /sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig pa ni/ /bdog pa

kun la spyan drangs nas/ /tshangs par spyod phyir blo gros bskyed/ /tshong dpon du ni gyur pa na/ /yang dag sangs rgyas gser thub la/ /gtsug lag khang brtsigs dad pa yis/ /khyim med par ni rab tu byung / /bram ze'i khye'u bla ma'i tshe/ /

dga' skyong gi ni tshig thos nas/ /'od srung rkang gnyis mchog las ni/ /rab tu 'byung ba'i blo bskyed do/ /byams pa drang srong gyur pa na/ /rgyal por gyur nas rim gro byas/ /byas pa gzo ba rjes dran nas/ /des ni nga la slar mchod do/ /

gang yang sangs rgyas bde mdzad nas/ /sangs rgyas 'od srung bar du ni/ /ngas ni bdun khri bdun stong gi/ /rgyal ba rnams ni mchod pa byas/ /grangs med gsum po tshang bar ni/ /rgyal ba ngas ni mchod byas te/ /sngon ni byang chub spyod pa na/ /

nga la skyo ba'i sems med do/ /nga ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshe/ /sangs rgyas mchog ni de rnams mchod/ /nga ni de dag thams cad kyis/ /'jig rten mdun du lung bstan to/ /ngas ni sngon bsams gang yin pa/ /nga yi smon lam thams

cad rdzogs/ /ngas ni sangs rgyas khur bor te/ /sems can rnams ni rjes su bzung / /shi bi'i rgyal por nga gyur tshe/ /sbyin pa dag ni thams cad btang / /nga ni dus dpog gyur pa'i tshe/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin

pa rdzogs/ /rgya mtsho'i tshong par gyur pa na/ /tshul khrims pha rol phyin don du/ /srog chags rnams ni ma btang zhing / /ngas ni rang gi srog btang ngo / /nga sngon drang srong gyur pa na/ /bzod pa'i pha rol rdzogs bya'i phyir/ /yan lag

rnams ni gtubs pa yis/ /nga yi bzod pa yongs su rdzogs/ /mi ma yin mo'i skyes rabs dang / /de bzhin rgya mtsho bskams pa dang / /de bzhin bdag ni bden dga' ba'i/ /brtson 'grus pha rol phyin pa rdzogs/ /sman chen blon por gyur pa dang / /gnag lhas

skyes su nga gyur tshe/ /shes rab pha rol phyin rdzogs nas/ /de bzhin rnga bo che yang bsgrags/ /bram ze rab 'bar gyur pa na/ /ral par 'dab chags tshang bcas kyang / /bsam gtan las ni ma langs par/ /bsam gtan pha rol phyin brtson

byas/ /snying rje yongs su bsgoms byas shing / /pha rol phyin pa drug rdzogs pas/ /khur lci ba ni ngas bor te/ /dam bcas pa yang rdzogs par byas/ /nga dang sangs rgyas gang phrad nas/ /mchod pa byas pa'i mi mchog ni/ /de kun mya

ngan 'das par gshegs/ /nga ni byang chub la bzhag go/ /rgyal po 'od ldan dbang po nas/ /thub pa dbang po'i rgyal mtshan bar/ /sems can bye ba phrag stong ni/ /srid pa'i mtsho las bsgral ba byas/ /'jig rten gtso bo rnam 'dren pa/ /

rdzogs sangs rgyas te lha mir bcas/ /'jig rten 'di ni bsgral ba dang / /sgrol bar mdzad pa smos ci dgos/ /ngas ni 'jig rten don gyi phyir/ /mya ngan 'das na'ang chos kyi gru/ /brtan pa dag ni bca' byas te/ /brgya stong phrag ni bsgral bar bya/ /

mi gang sangs rgyas skyabs song zhing / /mya ngan 'das kyang sangs rgyas la/ /bya ba byed pa'i skyes bu de/ /'jig rten dag ni skyid de ba/ /gang dag de bzhin gshegs rgyal la/ /bya ba cung zad byed na'ang de/ /mtho ris sna tshogs bgrod nas ni/ /

bdud rtsi'i go 'phang 'thob par 'gyur/ /yang dag ji bzhin 'di thos nas/ /dge ba bungs ni bskyed de bya/ /nga ni mya ngan 'das 'og tu/ /srid pa'i rgya mtshor 'khyams sa re/ /sangs rgyas mang po'i skabs rdzogs so// // sangs rgyas

'od ldan dang / shAkya thub pa dang / kauN+Di n+ya dang / 'jig rten 'dren dang / gzhan gyis mi thub dang / rin chen gtsug tor dang / bde mdzad dang / sgra snyan dang / dpal 'byung dang / phan bzhed dang / kauN+Di n+ya dang / blta na sdug dang / spyan mdzes dang / yul 'khor skyong

dang / mar me mdzad dang / dka' thub mdzad dang / mun sel dang / bde mdzad dang / dbang chen dang / gtsug tor can dang / ma 'gags pa dang / spyan mdzes dang / legs 'khrungs dang / yid bzangs dang / tsan dan dang / tshangs spyin dang / 'od zer can dang / don dam gzigs dang / shAkya

thub pa dang / mthor 'phags dang / dam pa dang / gtso bo dang / dgra zhi mdzad dang / shing rta'i yan lag dang / skal ldan shing rta dang / tshangs pa dang / tshangs pa'i tshe dang / tsan dan dang / dbang po dang / dbang po dul dang / rin chen ri bo dang /

don thams cad sgrub pa dang / tha ma dbang po'i rgyal mtshan dang / bzod pa mdzad dang / rdzogs ldan dang / thams cad zil gnon dang / rin chen gtsug phud dang / pad ma dam pa dang / grags pa dam pa dang / gsung snyan dang / dri ma med dang /

sad mdzad dang / dgra thul dang / gnas 'jog dang / skar 'od dang / tog dang / drang srong dang / b+ha ra d+h+wa dza dang / don gzigs dang / don dam gzigs dang / don thams cad gzigs dang / rgyal dang / skar rgyal dang / rnam par gzigs dang /

gtsug tor can dang / thams cad skyob dang / log par dad sel dang / gser thub dang / 'od srung dang / shAkya thub pa dang / tha ma byams pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi mtshan rnams rdzogs s+ho// // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das

la bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas shes bya ba gong ma bzhin du ste/ de nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe gzhan mu stegs can

kun du rgyu rab tu mang po rtog khang du lhags shing 'dus par gyur nas skabs kyi gtam 'di lta bu dag gleng bar byed de/ shes ldan dag shes par gyis shig /sngon ni bdag cag la rgyal po dang / blon po dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag

dang / grong mi dang / yul mi dang / tshong pa dang / tshong dpon dang / ded dpon rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ rjed par byas pas gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / gnas mal dang / nad kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad rnams

kyang rnyed pa las/ da ni dge sbyong gau ta ma 'jig rten du byung ba la bkur sti byed/ bla mar byed/ rjed par byed/ mchod par byed ces bya ba nas sman dang yo byad rnams zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/ /des na da ltar bdag cag gi rnyed pa dang bkur

sti thams cad kyi thams cad du chad na/ de la da bdag cag gis ji ltar bya/ de nas kha cig gis smras pa/ tshangs par spyod pa la mi tshangs par spyod pa skyon yin pas de la skyon 'di gdags so/ /kha cig gis smras pa/ ji lta bu zhig bya/ de rnams

kyis smras pa/ bdag cag gi nang na kun du rgyu gzugs bzang mo mdzes pa blta na sdug pa gang yin pa de la sring mo dag tshur dge sbyong gau ta ma la skur ba thob cig ces spro bar bya'o/ /bdag cag gi nang na kun tu rgyu gzugs bzang mo mdzes pa

blta na sdug pa gang yin/ bram ze'i bu mo rtswa mi yin no/ /de la spro ba bskyed do zhes de rnams kyis de pho nyas bkug ste smras pa/ sring mo shes par gyis shig /sngon ni bdag cag gis bkur sti dang zhes bya ba nas nad kyi rkyen

sman gyi yo byad rnams shes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /da ni dge sbyong gau ta ma 'jig rten du byung bas 'jig rten de la bkur sti byed pas bdag cag gi rnyed pa dang bkur sti thams cad kyi thams cad du chad par gyur na/ khyod kyis yal

bar dor ram/ bram ze'i bu mo kun tu rgyu rtswa mis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag bdag gis de la ji ltar bgyi lags/ sring mo khyod kyis nye du rnams kyi ched du dge sbyong gau ta ma la kho mo dang lhan cig tu mi tshangs par spyad do zhes khyod

skur ba 'debs par spro 'am de lta na bdag cag gi rnyed pa dang bkur sti sngon gyi bzhin du 'gyur ro/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / bram ze'i bu mo kun du rgyu rtswa mis gzhan mu stegs can dang / kun du rgyu rab tu mang po la 'di skad ces smras

so/ /'phags pa dag dge sbyong gau ta ma la ni skur ba 'debs par bdag mi spro'o/ /sring mo khyod ji tsam du dge slong gau ta ma la skur ba 'debs par mi spro ba de tsam du bdag cag dang gtam 'dre bar mi bya/ phebs par smra bar mi bya/ blta bar mi bya/

rnam par blta bar mi bya zhing khyod gnas thams cad du 'dug tu mi gzhug ste/ 'gyod pa de nyid kyis dus byas nas sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa'i gnas de yod do/ /bud med ni shes rab chung ba yin pas de skrag

nas smras pa/ 'phags pa bdag gis ji lta bu zhig bgyi/ sring mo tshur khyod rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du rgyun du song la dus tha gi tsam lon nas dge sbyong gau ta ma la skur pa thob shig /de nyi ma re re zhing langs te rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ngo / /

ji tsam na lto la snod cig bcings nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ngo / /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i gung la chos 'chad cing bzhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze'i bu mo kun du rgyu rtswa mi rgyang ring po kho na

nas gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang 'di snyam du dgongs te/ nga nyid kyis las rnams byas shing bsags pa/ tshogs rnyed pa/ rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/ 'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/ gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba rnams

gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur snyam mo/ /de nas bram ze'i bu mo kun tu rgyu rtswa mi bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas gsol pa/ bdag ni 'di ru sbrum bgyis nas/ /chags par 'gyur zhing dga' 'gyur ba/ /

snyan cing 'jebs pa'i gsung dbyangs kyis/ /da lta chos ni gsung mdzad dam/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yang dag min pa smra ba dmyal bar 'gro/ /bram ze'i bu mo rtswa mis gsol pa/ gang gis byas nas ma byas

zhes smra 'am/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dman pa'i chos can mi ni de gnyi ga /pha rol dag tu 'dra bar 'gro bar 'gyur/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma bram ze'i bu mo rtswa mi

'di ni bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la yun ring mo nas tho 'tsham par byed do snyam du bsams nas rdzu 'phrul gyis snod de sa la lhung bar byas so/ /de nas bram ze'i bu mo rtswa mi skyengs nas rings pa rings par slar song ngo / /

de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la chos kyi dbang du bgyi ba'i bka' mchid kyang bka' stsal/ gang du thog mar bla na med pa yang dag

par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu thugs bskyed pa yang lung bstan/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig la bsnyen bkur bgyis pa yang bka' stsal lags pas ci nas bdag cag mtsho chen po ma dros par mchis la/

bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rang rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /chos nyid kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'tsho zhing

gzhes pa rnams kyi gdon mi za bar mdzad pa ni bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ ji srid sangs rgyas su lung bstan pa dang / sems can 'gas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu phyir mi ldog pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / sangs

rgyas kyis gdul bar bya ba thams cad btul ba dang / nyan thos kyi mchog zung gcig tu bstan pa dang / mtshams bcad pa dang / sku tshe'i lnga cha btang ba dang / mnyan yod du cho 'phrul chen po rnam par bstan pa dang / grong khyer gsal bar

lha las gshegs pa bstan pa dang yab dang yum gnyis bden pa dag la bkod pa dang / mtsho chen po ma dros par nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu sngon gyi las kyi rgyu ba bstan pa ma mdzad pa de srid du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das

rnams yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da'o/ /don 'di la ni bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig mtsho chen po ma dros par sngon gyi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan par bzhed nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag

mtsho chen po ma dros pa gang na bar 'dong / der rang rang gi sngon gyi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan par bya'o/ /btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa

lnga brgyar gcig gis ma tshang ba dang thabs gcig tu mnyan yod nas mi snang bar gyur te mtsho chen po ma dros par gshegs so/ /gnod sbyin gtum po mi bzad gnas pa yid 'ong zhing / /me tog sna tshogs shing gis rnam par mdzes byas pa/ /

de las rgya mtsho dug can dag tu 'gro ba yi/ /chu bo chen po bzhi po 'di dag phyogs bzhir 'bab/ /gang gA sin d+hu de bzhin pak+Shu dang / /si ta de la rdzu 'phrul stobs thob pa/ /ma gtogs mi rnams kyis ni mi bgrod pa/ /der ni thub pa dge 'dun bcas par

bzhugs/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad de/ chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad pa de'i tshe srog chags grog sbur yan chad kyis bcom

ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa shes par 'gyur bas/ de nas klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' bo gnyis kyis bsams pa/ ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad snyam na/ mtsho chen po ma dros par las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan par

bzhed par mthong ngo / /de nas de gnyis kyis mtsho chen po ma dros pa'i nang du pad ma 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam bzang po thams cad gser las byas pa/ sdong po ni rin po che/ ge sar ni rdo rje las byas pa/ pad ma stong phrag du mas yongs su

bskor ba zhig sprul pa dang / bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la pad ma'i snying po de la bzhugs so/ /dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyang pad ma gzhan rnams kyi snying po la 'khod do/ /de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu bya rgod

kyi phung po'i ri la snam sbyar 'grub bo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ maud gal gyi bu song la rab tu byung ba'i zla bo khrid de shog shig /btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa

maud gal gyi bu chen po mtsho chen po ma dros pa nas mi snang bar gyur cing bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i mdun du 'dug ste 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ston pa dgra bcom pa lnga brgyar gcig gis

ma tshang ba dang thabs gcig tu mtsho chen po ma dros pa na sngon gyi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan par bzhed nas khyod la gzhes kyis tshur shog 'dong / des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po re shig snam sbyar drubs la de nas

phyis 'gro'o/ /des smras pa/ grogs bya'o/ /de bzhin du gyis shig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos rdzu 'phrul gyis sor mo lnga char gyis drub par brtsams pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po

'o na lta drub zin du zad mod/ des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gal te khyod mi 'gro na mthus bkur bar bya'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus ske rags rgya cang phrol nas smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po khyod bcom ldan

'das kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu can rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa yin na/ re shig khyod kyis 'di khyer la de nas phyis kho bo khyer cig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos de drangs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bsams pa/

'di ni mthu che zhing rdzu 'phrul che ba yin pas gal te 'di khyer bar 'gyur ba'i gnas 'di yod do snyam nas des de bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri'i spyil btags so/ /tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos de drangs pa dang / bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri
