'gul bar gyur to/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bsams pa/ 'dis bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri yang khyer bar 'gyur gyis/ ma la bdag gis ri'i rgyal po ri rab la gdags so snyam nas/ des de ri'i rgyal po ri rab la btags pa las/ yang tshe

dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos de drangs pa dang / ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang / klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' bo dag kyang g.yos par gyur/ ma dros pa yang kun nas 'khrugs shing dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyang ldeg par gyur

nas pad ma'i snying po la 'dug bzhin du de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa ci'i slad du klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' bo gnyis g.yos lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong

dag dga' bo dang nye dga' bo gnyis g.yos pa ma yin te/ 'on kyang nyan thos chen po gnyis rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul bar byed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bsams pa/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab 'di yang khyer bar 'gyur

gyis/ ma la bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi pad ma'i sdong po la gdags so snyam nas/ /des bcom ldan 'das kyi pad ma'i sdong po la btags pas ma 'gul bar 'dug go/ /gang gi tshe de'i rdzu 'phrul la rdzu 'phrul gyis rdugs pa

de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu khyod kyis rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba byas zin gyis tshur shog 'dong / tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po song shig dang kho bo 'ong ngo zhes byas nas ji

srid tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po ma phyin pa de'i bar du tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sngar phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te pad ma'i snying po la 'dug pa dang / de'i 'og tu tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po

phyin pas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu mthong nas des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'ongs sam/ tshe dang ldan pa kho bo 'ongs so/ /dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/

btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po ni rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa lags na/ 'on kyang tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyis pham par bgyis pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan

'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag da lta 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi/ ji ltar 'dis 'das pa'i dus na yang bzos pham par byas pa de nyon cig /dge slong dag sngon byung ba yul dbus su ri mo mkhan gyi slob dpon

zhig byung ngo / /de dgos pa 'ga' zhig gi phyir yul dbus nas yul nas can zhes bya bar song ngo / /de de na 'khrul 'khor gyi sgyu rtsal gyi slob dpon zhig gi khyim du zhugs pa las/ des de ngal ba'i rim gro bar 'khrul

'khor las bu mo zhig byas nas btang ngo / /des de'i rkang pa gnyis bkrus nas 'dug go/ /de nas des song shig ces smras na/ de cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ /des bsams pa/ gdon ma zos par 'di bdag dang dga' mgur spyad pa'i

phyir btang ngo snyam nas/ des de'i lag pa nas bzung ste drangs pa las ji tsam na zhig nas shing brul gyi phung por gyur to/ /de skyengs nas bsams pa/ bdag gcig pu zhig tu skyengs par byas kyis/ ma la bdag gis ni 'di rgyal po

'khor dang bcas pa'i nang du skyengs par bya'o snyam nas/ des sgo'i ngos logs la rang gi gzugs brnyan 'gegs pa zhig bris te/ sgo phag tu yib nas 'dug go/ de ldang ba'i dus gang yin pa de las thal ba dang / de nas 'khrul 'khor gyi rgyu

rtsal gyi slob dpon gyis bsam pa/ ring zhig lon na ci'i phyir de sgor ma byung snyam du bsams nas der song ba las ji tsam na 'gegs te shi ba mthong ngo / /des bsams pa/ ci'i phyir 'dis bdag nyid srog dang bral bar byas snyam pa las des

'khrul 'khor zhig nas shing brul gyi phung por 'dug pa mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag nyid skyengs pas 'gegs so snyam mo/ /yul nas can gyi kun du spyod pa ni gang su'i khyim yang rung der mi glo bur ba shi na ji srid rgyal po la

mi mthol ba de srid du des de la rim gro mi byed do/ /de nas de rgyal po'i drung du song ste mthol ba/ lha yul dbus nas ri mo mkhan gyi slob dpon zhig mchis te/ de bdag gi sdum par gnas pa las/ de la bkur sti bgyi ba'i slad du

bdag gis 'khrul 'khor las bu mo zhig bgyis te btang ba dang / des de lag pa nas bzung ste drangs pas shing gi phung por mchis pa dang / de skyengs nas bdag nyid 'gegs na/ lha de la g.yar snga 'drim pa zhig gtang du gsol/

de nas bdag gis rim gro bgyi lags so/ /de nas rgyal pos zho shas 'tsho ba rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag deng la g.yar snga rims shig /de rnams dong nas de mthong ngo / /des bsams pa/ bdag gis ji ltar zung nga las
dbab par bya snyam mo/ /gzhan dag gis smras pa/ 'geg thag chad/ sta ri khyer te thag pa gcod par brtsams pa las ji tsam na rtsig pa yin par mthong nas/ de nas 'khrul 'khor

mkhan gyi slob dpon de skyengs par gyur to/ /de de ltar skyengs par gyur pa dang / ri mo mkhan gyi slob dpon de sgo lkog nas phyung ste smras pa/ kye nang rje khyod kyis ni kho bo gcig pu zhig tu skyengs par byas te/ khyod ni rgyal po

'khor dang bcas pa'i nang du skyengs par byas so/ /dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi ri mo mkhan gyi slob dpon gang yin pa de ni dge slong shA ri'i bu 'di nyid yin te/ de na yang 'dis 'di bzos pham par byas so/ /da ltar

yang 'dis 'di rdzu 'phrul gyis pham par byas so/ /gzhan yang ji ltar 'dis 'di bzos pham par byas pa de nyon cig /dge slong dag sngon byung ba ri 'or gzhan zhig na ri mo mkhan gyi slob dpon gnyis shig byung ba las rtsod par

gyur te/ gcig gis smras pa/ nga ni bzo legs par shes so/ /gcig shos kyis smras pa/ nga ni de bas kyang lhag par legs par shes so/ /de gnyis phan tshun 'gran par gyur nas rgyal po'i drung du dong ste de'i rkang pa

gnyis la gtugs te gcig gis smras pa/ lha bdag ni bzo legs par 'tshal to/ /gcig shos kyis kyang smras pa/ lha bdag ni de bas kyang lhag par legs par 'tshal to/ /rgyal pos de gnyis la sgo khang bstan nas khyed

gnyis gang mkhas ni ngas mi shes mod kyi/ 'on kyang gcig gis ni rtsig ngos gcig la bris la/ gcig shos kyis kyang gcig la bris shig dang / de lta na khyed cag gnyis gang bzo legs par shes pa ngas legs par shes

par 'gyur ro/ /de gnyis kyi bar yol bas bcad nas ri mo bri bar brtsams te/ de la gcig gis ni zla ba drug gis ri mo'i las zin to/ /gcig shos kyis ni zla ba drug tu rtsig ngos bstar to/ /ri mo'i las zin pa gang

yin pa de rgyal po'i drung du song ste son pa dang / smras pa/ lha bdag gi ri mo'i las bgyis lags na spyang brim du gsol/ de nas rgyal po blon po dang lhan cig sgor byung nas mthong ba dang / ri mo'i las mkhas so zhes shin du

mgu'o/ /gcig bshos kyis kyang rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/ da bdag gi ri mo'i las la gzigs su gsol/ des bar chad kyi yol ba bshus dang / gcig gi gzugs brnyan de la shar ba rgyal pos mthong nas ri mo'i

las la lhag par 'di mkhas so zhes shin du ya mtshan skyes so/ /de nas des slar yol bas bar bcad nas rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/ lha 'di ni ri mo'i las ma lags te/ 'on kyang rtsig ngos bstar ba lags so/ /

de nas rgyal po je ya mtshan skyes nas smras pa/ 'di ni bzo la lhag par mkhas pa yin no/ /dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ gang gis zla ba drug tu rtsig ngos bstar ba de ni dge slong shA ri'i bu 'di nyid yin no/ /gang gis zla ba drug tu

ri mo'i las byas pa de ni de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong maud gal gyi bu 'di nyid de yin te/ de na yang 'dis 'di bzos pham par byas so/ /da ltar yang 'dis 'di rdzu 'phrul gyis pham par byas so/ /gzhan yang ji ltar 'dis 'di pham par byas pa de nyon

cig /dge slong dag sngon byung ba bA rA Na sI'i grong khyer na drang srong dung dang / bris pa shes bya ba gnyis shig nye bar rten cing gnas so/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na lhas char phab pas rdzab tu gyur te/ dung gred de rdzab du rdeg 'chos

nas ril ba chag par gyur to/ /de nas des dmod pa bor ba/ rang bzhin ngan pa khyod kyis da phan chad lo bcu gnyis su char mi 'bebs par gyur cig ces byas so/ /rgyal po tshangs sbyin dang bA rA Na sI na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs

kyis thos nas/ de nas de rnams de'i drung du song ste gsol ba btab pa/ drang srong chen po de ltar ma mdzad cig /des smras pa/ bdag gis rang bzhin ngan pa bzod par mi nus te/ bdag gi dmod pas bcom pa des lo bcu gnyis su char mi

'bebs par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rgyal po tshangs sbyin dang / skye bo'i tshogs des bris pa la gsol ba btab nas des gsol ba byas te lhas char phab bo/ /dge slong dag ji snyam du sems de'i tshe de'i dus kyi drang srong dung gang yin pa de ni dge slong maud gal gyi bu 'di

nyid yin no/ /de'i tshe de'i dus kyi bris pa gang yin pa de ni dge slong shA ri'i bu yin te/ de na yang 'dis 'di rdzu 'phrul gyis pham par byas so/ /gzhan yang ji ltar 'dis 'di rdzu 'phrul gyis pham par byas pa de nyon cig /bris pas dgos pa 'ga' zhig gi

phyir dung gi rkang pa gnyis la gtugs pa las dung gi rkang pa gnyis kyis ral pa mnan pa dang bris pas smras pa/ nyi ma 'char ka'i dus kyi tshe khyod kyi spyi bo gas par gyur cig /dung gis smras pa/ de ltar na nyi ma 'char bar ma gyur cig ces byas

pa dang / 'jig rten du nam sros par gyur to/ /de nas rgyal po dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag gis dung la gsol ba btab pa/ drang srong chen po de lta bu ma mdzad cig /des smras pa/ nyi ma shar bar gyur na gdon mi za bar bdag gi mgo

'gas par 'gyur ro/ /bris pas de la smras pa/ gal te de lta na 'ji ba las byas pa'i mgo zhig byos shig /ji tsam na 'ji ba las dung gi mgo zhig byas pa las nyi ma shar ba dang gas par gyur to/ /dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ dung gang yin pa de ni dge

slong maud gal gyi bu 'di nyid de yin no/ /bris pa gang yin pa de ni dge slong shA ri'i bu 'di nyid de yin te/ de na yang 'dis pham par byas so/ /gzhan yang ji ltar pham par byas pa de nyon cig /yul dbus su ba so mkhan gyi slob dpon zhig byung nas

ba so 'bras tsam bre'u chung gang khyer nas yul nas can du song ste/ de ri mo mkhan gyi slob dpon zhig gi khyim du zhugs na de yang stong par 'dug nas de'i chung ma la smras pa/ grogs po'i chung ma 'bras bre'u chung gang po 'di tshos la byin cig ces

de bzhag ste song ngo / /des btso bar brtsams pa las shing zad par gyur kyang ma tshos so/ /de nas de'i khyim thab 'ongs nas smras pa/ bzang mo 'di ci zhig yin/ des rgyas par smras pa dang / des de brtags pa las ba so 'bras

tsam she dag tu mthong nas des de la co dri bar smras pa/ bzang mo 'di tshwa chu yin gyis/ chu bzang po gzhan zhig khyer te 'ongs dang / des 'bras 'di tshos par 'gyur ro/ /des ba so mkhan gyi slob dpon la chu bzang po zhig

khyer te shog shig ces smras so/ des de la smras nas/ des phyogs gzhan zhig tu rdzing bu zhig bris te/ der khyi ro bam pa zhig kyang bris so/ /de nas ba so mkhan gyi slob dpon de bum pa khyer nas rdzing bu yin no snyam nas phyogs

der phyin te/ khyi ro bam pa mthong ba dang / des sna bkab nas brtag par brtsams pa las ji tsam na de'i chu snod de chag nas ba so mkhan gyi slob dpon de skyengs par gyur to/ /dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ ba so mkhan gyi

slob dpon gang yin pa de ni dge slong maud gal gyi bu 'di nyid de yin no/ /ri mo mkhan gyi slob dpon gang yin pa de ni dge slong shA ri'i bu 'di nyid de yin no/ /'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pas brnyes pa'i bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang

snyoms par 'jug pa gang dag yin pa de dag gi ming yang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis mi shes so/ /rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis thob pa gang dag yin pa de dag gi ming yang dge slong shA ri'i bus mi shes so/ /dge slong shA ri'i bus thob pa

gang dag yin pa de dag gi ming yang dge slong maud gal gyi bus mi shes so/ /dge slong maud gal gyi bus thob pa gang yin pa de dag gi ming yang nyan thos gzhan rnams kyis mi shes te/ /dge slong maud gal gyi bu bas dge slong shA ri'i

bu rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che mod kyi/ des mang du gnas pa la dgongs nas ngas rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog tu bstan to/ /shA ri'i bu dang maud gal gyi bu'i le'u'o// // de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen

po rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/ smras pa/ de ni der song sngon nas spyad pa dang / /rjes mthun tshig dag shin tu sgrogs pa na/ /gang zhig byas pas 'bras bu che myong ba/ /chung ngu gcig pu de ni myur
dran nas/ /ji ltar seng ge ri yi phug gnas pa/ /'jigs pa med par spyod yul 'gro ba ltar/ /mtshungs pa med pa'i nyan thos 'od srung de/ /sngon gyi gnas nas spyad pa grogs byed pa/ /

zag med tha ba med pa rnam grol sems/ /nyon mongs med par gnas pa skyon med yid/ /de la chos mchog yod par yid ches nas/ /de yi chos la yid kyis smon byas te/ /rang sangs rgyas la bdag gis yon du ni/ /khre rgod bre'u

gang zhig rab phul bas/ /de 'dra ba dang kun du phrad gyur ces/ /smon pas sgra mi snyan du skyes pa ni/ /las de gcig pu nyid kyi 'bras bu yis/ /lus can bdag gir 'dzin med tshe ring ba/ /khyad par 'gro zhing spyod pa mi

dman pa/ /sgra mi snyan du lan stong skyes par gyur/ /las de gcig pu nyid kyi 'bras bu yis/ /lan stong sum bcu rtsa gsum par skyes te/ /me tog phreng rgyan byug pa sna tshogs dang / mthu chen lus mdzes pa

dang ldan par gyur/ /de nas 'phos bdag sgra mi snyan du skyes/ /slar yang lha dga' bar byed pa dang / /sems kyi smon lam dbang gis slar yang bdag /mi ni dge ba rnams kyi nang du skyes/ /las de gcig pu nyid

kyi 'bras bus bdag /bram ze sa la chen po'i rigs skyes te/ /nor mang skyes pa bud med rnams kyis bkur/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga don mi gnyer yang / /bdag gis ston pa lan 'ga'ang ma mthong zhing / /mtshungs

med nyan thos bdag gis ma mthong nas/ /bdag gi seng ras chem gyon 'jig rten na/ /dgra bcom rnams la phyags 'tshal rab tu byung / /bdag ni de ltar rab tu byung ba dang / /rgyal ba bu mangs mchod rten nang bzhugs

mthong / /thub zhabs phyag 'tshal bcom ldan bdag gi ston/ /bdag ni khyod kyi nyan thos gyur ces gsol/ /'od srung ji skad smras bzhin byas te 'dir/ /khyod ston nga yin nga yi nyan thos khyod/ /gal te sdug bsngal

kun las thar 'dod na/ /khyod kyis snyan par bshad pa'i chos snyan nyon/ /gang yang bdag la skyes mchog skyob pa ni/ /thugs rje chen po yis ni chos bshad pa/ /bsam gtan bzhi stobs dbang po byang chub kyi/ /yan lag lam

gyi yan lag rnam par thar/ /de dag bsgom pa bdag gis dga' mgur thob/ /zag pa zad cing lus kyi tha ma bzung / /lus kyi tha ma 'dzin pa rdul med pa/ /drang po 'di dag dang ni bdag gir phrad/ /de bzhin gshegs rgyal phun sum tshogs

pa gsung / /tshul khrims ldan pa gang 'dod 'grub par 'gyur/ /bdag gi yid la ci dang ci bsams pa/ /thams cad grub ste srid pa'i tha ma 'di/ /bdag gi skye ba zad cing 'ching ba dang / /sred pa kun nas langs pa nyid bcad de/ /
bdag ni chos rgyal thugs las skyes pa'i sras/ /nyon mongs tshogs rnams zad pas mya ngan 'da'/ /bdag ni thams cad gzigs pa yis/ /sbyangs la gnas pa mchog tu bstan/ /zag pa

med cing nyes pa bsal/ /go 'phang mi g.yo bdag gis 'thob/ /gnas brtan 'od srung de lta bur/ /ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/ /dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas/ /rang gi las ni lung bstan to/ /'od srung gi le'u ste dang po'o// //

'dul ba gzhi/ bam po lnga bcu rtsa gnyis pa/ de nas dge slong gnas brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus las ci zhig byas na las de'i rnam par smin pas shes

rab chen po dang spobs pa chen po dang ldan par gyur des smras pa/ bdag gis dgon par rang sangs rgyas/ /drang srong dge sbyong zhir gyur pa/ /skal dang ldan pa chos gos ni/ /de tshe rnying pa gyon pa mthong / /de la bdag gis
sems dad pas/ /bang brgyugs nas kyang chos gos ni/ /drubs shing kha sgyur de bzhin du/ /de la yang dang yang du gtugs/ /de nas bdag la thugs brtse'i phyir/ /de ni bar snang la 'phags nas/ /
rang gi gzi brjid kyis 'bar zhing / /de nas mkha' la gshegs par gyur/ /bdag gis thal mo sbyar byas nas/ /ji ltar bdag ni 'di 'dra bar/ /dbang rnon shes rab cher shog ces/ /de lta bur ni smon lam

btab/ /bdag ni phyug po'i rigs su 'am/ /ma rabs dag tu mi skye bar/ /bar ma'i rigs su skye 'gyur zhing / /rtag tu rab 'byung mang bar shog /dge ba'i rtsa ba des na bdag /bdag ni tshe rabs lnga brgyar yang / /mi yi rnyed pa

thob nas ni/ /khyim med par ni rab tu byung / /bdag gi skye ba tha ma ni/ /mi yi srid thob 'di yin te/ /rdzogs sangs bla na med pa yi/ /ded dpon 'di ni mnyes par byas/ /shAkya seng ge'i bstan pa la/ /bdag gis rab

byung thob nas ni/ /mya ngan 'das pa bsil gyur pa'i/ /dgra bcom pa yang bdag gis thob/ /btsun pa bdag gis zla phyed kyis/ /'gro ba'i pha rol phyin pa thob/ /dge slong dge 'dun gung bzhugs nas/ /ston pas

bdag ni mngon sum du/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rjes skor ba/ /shes rab can gyis gtso bor bstan/ /shes rab chen po shA ri'i bu/ /dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas/ /ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/ /rang gi las ni lung bstan to/ /
shA ri'i bu'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu

chen po tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus ni rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/ da ni khyod kyis kyang rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig /de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos dge slong gnas brtan
gnas brtan rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bdag sngon drang srong gyur pa'i tshe/ /nags mtha'i dgon par gnas pa na/ /der ni skyes pa zhig 'ongs nas/ /bdag la rab byung gsol ba 'debs/ /bdag gis

brgyugs nas de yi skra/ /bregs nas kyang ni chos gos dag /kha dog bsgyur nas de la byin/ /de yid dga' gyur de yi tshe/ /phyogs gcig tu ni nyer song nas/ /skyil mo krung bcas 'dug nas des/ /rang byang chub ni reg

gyur te/ /de nas mkha' la song bar gyur/ /bdag gis dad bskyed nyer song nas/ /de nas thal mo legs sbyar te/ /de na rdzu 'phrul mchog gsol zhing / /smon lam gdab pa byas pa ni/ /drang srong che 'di ci 'dra ba'i/ /bdag gi rdzu 'phrul de

'drar shog /dge ba'i rtsa ba de yis na/ /gang dang gang du skyes par ni/ /bsod nams byas pas mdzes pa yi/ /lha dang mi ni rnams su gyur/ /bdag gi srid pa tha ma ni/ /mi yi srid thob 'di yin te/ /rdzogs sangs bla na med pa yi/ /

ded dpon 'di ni mnyes par byas/ /shAkya seng ge'i bstan pa la/ /bdag gis rab byung thob nas ni/ /mya ngan 'das pa bsil gyur pa'i/ /dgra bcom pa ni bdag gis thob/ /thams cad gzigs pas rdzu 'phrul can/ /rnams kyi

mchog tu bdag bstan to/ /dge ba chung ngu byas pa ni/ /bde ba mang po nyams su myong / /mi dge ba yi las gang yin/ /bdag gis lung bstan mnyan par gyis/ /grong mchog rgyal po'i khab tu ni/ /bdag ni tshong dpon khye'u

gyur nas/ /khyim gyi phyi rol rtse rtse nas/ /zan gyi phyir yang zhugs pa las/ /de na pha ma gnyis ka ni/ /dben par 'dug pa bdag gis mthong / /de gnyis mthong bas bdag brdegs shing / /skyengs pas kyang ni spyo ba byas/ /

pha dang ma ni gnyis ka la/ /yid kyis nyes pa byas pa ni/ /gang tshe chen por gyur pa na/ /'dam bu bcom pa bzhin bsad snyam/ /bdag gi yid kyis nyes byas kyi/ /lus kyis byas pa ma yin na 'ang / /bdag ni dmyal ba thig nag tu/ /

sdug bsngal mi bzad nyams su myong / /de yi las kyi lhag ma yis/ /bdag gi srid pa tha ma 'dir/ /mu stegs gzhan gyi dge sbyong gis/ /'dam bu bcom bzhin bdag gtog 'gyur/ /bdag ni sdug bsngal de nyid kyis/ /

shi bar 'gyur te de nas ni/ /las rnams kyi ni lhag ma yang / /tha ma zad par 'gyur ba yin/ /de bas pha dang ma dag la/ /sems ni rab tu dad par bya/ /sems dad pa yi rgyu yis ni/ /sems can 'gro ba bzang por 'gro/ /de ltar gnas
brtan pang nas skyes/ /dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas/ /ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/ /rang gi las ni lung bstan to/ /pang nas skyes kyi le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas dge slong gnas

brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa mdzes ldan la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa mdzes ldan tshe dang ldan pa pang nas skyes kyis rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/ da ni tshe dang ldan pa mdzes ldan gyis kyang rang gi

las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa mdzes ldan gyis dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi mdun du rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan pa/ dge 'dun kun dgar bdag son na/ /khyams de'i phyag dar mthong nas ni/ /bdag gis phyags ma

blangs nas su/ /de tshe dga' bas phyag dar byas/ /de nas bdag gis sems dad pas/ /khyams de gtsang mar mthong nas ni/ /ji ltar khyams de gtsang ba ltar/ /nyon mongs med par gyur cig smras/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba de yis

ni/ /gang dang gang du skyes par yang / /bdag gi gzugs ni bzang ba dang / /blta na sdug cing mdzes par gyur/ /de yi las kyi lhag mas ni/ /bdag gi lus ni tha ma la/ /bdag gi pha dang ma gnyis kyis/ /bdag ming mdzes

ldan kho nar btags/ /mdzes ldan bdag ni btsas gyur te/ /gang tshe gnyen tshogs mdun phyin pa/ /de tshe gnyen ni thams cad kyis/ /mgu zhing yid dga' bkur sti byas/ /rdzogs sangs bla na med pa yi/ /ded dpon
'di ni mnyes par byas/ /mya ngan 'das pa bsil gyur pa'i/ /dgra bcom pa yang bdag gis thob/ /bdag gi nyon mongs med gyur ces/ /smon lam btab pa gang yin pa/ /bya ba byas te nyon mongs med/ /dgra bcom

zag pa med pa yin/ /'dzam bu'i gling ni thams cad kyang / /ka shi'i gos kyis phyags pa bas// gang gis 'dod chags bral ba yi/ /drang srong 'chags gcig phyags pa'o/ /'dzam bu'i gling na drang srong gi 'chag sa

thams cad phyags pa bas/ /gang gis phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi/ /re lde tsam dag phyags pa'o/ /'dzam bu'i gling na dge 'dun gyi/ /kun dga' ra ba kun phyags pas/ /gang gis rgyal ba'i mchod rten ni/ /khru gang tsam zhig phyags pa'o/ /

bdag nyid kyis ni gang rtogs pa'i/ /khyad par de dag shes byas nas/ /bder gshegs mchod rten phyags nas ni/ /sems kyang rab tu dang bar gyis/ /de ltas rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi/ /yon tan mang po shes pa yis/ /mchod rten rnams la bkur

sti byos/ /'bras bu chen po dag tu 'gyur/ /btsun pa bdag gis dge ba ni/ /gang byas dran pa 'di lags te/ /de yi 'bras bu sdug pa dang / /'dod pa yid 'ong nyams su myong / /de bas rgyal ba'i mchod rten la/ /mchod pa dag ni bzang po gyis/ /

btsun pa 'di ni bsod nams zhing / /dam pa bla na med pa yin/ /rdzogs sangs de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos la/ /sems ni rab tu dang byas pa'i/ /yon ni chung ngur 'gyur ma yin/ /de ltar gnas brtan mdzes ldan

gyis/ /dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas/ /ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/ /rang gi las ni lung bstan to/ /mdzes ldan gyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa sna

ma'i me tog la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sna ma'i me tog tshe dang ldan pa mdzes ldan gyis rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/ da ni tshe dang ldan pas kyang rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig /sna ma'i me tog rna rgyan
byas/ /mgo la me tog phreng bcings nas/ /ne'u zla rnams kyis yongs bskor te/ /bskyed mos tshal gyi gnas su byung / /de na thub pa chen po pa/ /rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la/ /skye bo'i tshogs
chen thams cad nas/ /legs par mchod pa bdag gis mthong / /de nas ne'u zla rnams khrid nas/ /rang rang gi ni phreng ba kun/ /sems ni dad par byas nas su/ /mchod rten de la gdags pa byas/ /de na bdag

gis de dag dang / /skye bo mang po gzhan mthong nas/ /sna ma rna ba las bkrol te/ /de tshe mchod rten gdags pa byas/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba des na bdag /gang dang gang du skyes par yang / /bsod nams byas pa mdzes

pa yi/ /lha dang mi ni rnams su gyur/ /rdzogs sangs bla na med pa yi/ /ded dpon 'di ni mnyes par byas/ /mya ngan 'das pa bsil gyur pa'i/ /dgra bcom pa yang bdag gis thob/ /me tog gcig ni btang bas na/ /

lo ni bye ba brgya phrag tu/ /bdag gis lha yi yongs spyad nas/ /de yi lhag mas mya ngan 'das/ /btsun pa gal te sangs rgyas kyi/ /yon tan phal cher 'tshal gyur na/ /sems ni shin tu dad pa yis/ /phyir zhing bsnyen

bkur bgyis pa zhig /de ltas rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi/ /yon tan mang po shes pa yis/ /mchod rten rnams la bkur sti byos/ /'bras bu chen po dag tu 'gyur/ /rdzogs sangs de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ /sangs rgyas

rnams kyi nyan thos la/ /sems ni rab tu dang byas pa'i/ /yon ni chung bar 'gyur ma yin/ /btsun pa bdag gis dge ba ni/ /gang byas dran pa 'di lags te/ /de yi 'bras bu sdug pa dang / /'dod pa yid 'ong nyams su myong / /

las kyi rnam par smin pa des/ /de srid skye ba zad pa dang / /nyon mongs bcom nas bsil gyur pa'i/ /bdag ni dgra bcom mya ngan 'das/ /bdag ni yang srid nyal ba dang / /'khor ba gang du'ang nyal ma yin/ /bdag gi skye ba tha ma ni/ /

'di yin len pa med par 'gyur/ /de nyid kyi ni rgyu yis bdag /sna ma'i me tog ming 'di btags/ /sdug bsngal kun las bdag grol zhing / /srid pa'i mtsho las rgal bar gyur/ /de ltar gnas brtan sna ma ni/ /dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas/ /ma dros

pa yi mtsho chen du/ /rang gi las ni lung bstan to/ /sna ma'i me tog gi le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa bye ba nyi shu pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /

tshe dang ldan pa bye ba nyi shu pa tshe dang ldan pa sna ma'i me tog gis rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pas kyang da ni rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig /tshe dang ldan pa bye ba nyi shu pas ci zhig byas na las des bcom ldan 'das kyis brtson 'grus

rtsom pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan/ des smras pa/ rnam par gzigs kyi gsung rab la/ /rgyal po'i pho brang bshes ldan du/ /bdag gis phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi/ /gnas khang gcig cig brtsigs nas ni/ /bdag gis gnas

khang de yi gzhir/ /ras phran rnams kyis sa gzhi g.yogs/ /sems dga' ba dang yid bde bas/ /de tshe smon lam btab pa ni/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas ni mnyes byas te/ /bsnyen par rdzogs pa thob nas ni/ /mya ngan 'das pa mchog

zhi ba/ /rga med go 'phang reg par shog /bdag gi bsod nams des ni bdag /bsod nams byas pas mdzes pa yi/ /bskal pa dgu bcur lha dang ni/ mi rnams su ni 'khor bar gyur/ /de nas las kyi lhag mas ni/ /bdag gi lus

ni tha ma la/ /tsam par tshong dpon mchog gi yang / /bu gcig par ni bdag skyes so/ /bdag ni btsas ma thag tu yang / /pha yis thos nas 'dun gyur pa/ /gzhon nu la ni bdag gis nor/ /bye ba nyi shu sbyin par bya/ /bdag gi rkang

mthil gnyi ga'i spu/ /shin tu phra zhing mnyen pa dang / /reg na bde zhing 'jam pa yi/ /shing bal 'dab lta'i sor bzhi skyes/ /'das pa'i bskal pa dgu bcu dang / /bskal pa gcig 'di lhag par ni/ /sa gzhi gding bas ma g.yogs

par/ /rkang pa 'jog ni ma myong ngo / /rdzogs sangs bla na med pa yi/ /ded dpon 'di ni mnyes par byas/ /mya ngan 'das pa bsil gyur pa'i/ /dgra bcom pa yang bdag gis thob/ /thams cad gzigs pas brtson 'grus can/ /

rnams kyi mchog tu bdag bstan to/ /zag med nyes pa spangs pa yi/ /go 'phang mi g.yo bdag gis thob/ /gnas brtan bye ba nyi shu pa/ /dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas/ /de ltar ma dros mtsho chen du/ /rang gi las ni lung bstan to/ /

bye ba nyi shu pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa ngag dbang la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa ngag dbang tshe dang ldan pa bye ba nyi shu pas rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung

bstan zin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pas kyang nga rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig /des smras pa/ 'das pa'i bskal pa dgu bcur ni/ /bsod nams byas pas mdzes pa yi/ /lha rnams dang ni mir skyes te/ /bdag gis ngan 'gro mi shes so/ /

bdag gis dge ba mi shes te/ /phan tshun zla bltas 'ba' shig gis/ /rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten ni/ /mthong nas de tshe bsnyen bkur byas/ /'gron bu drug bcu rnams kyis ni/ /dri dang phreng ba byug nyos te/ /mchod rten la ni

gdags byas pas/ /bdag ni log par ltung ma gyur/ /dge ba chung ngu byas pa ni/ /bde ba mang po nyams su myong / /mya ngan 'das pa bsil gyur pa'i/ /dgra bcom pa yang bdag gis thob/ /gal te rdzogs sangs shes gyur la/ /

mchod rten de la bdag gis su/ /bkur sti byas par gyur na ni/ /legs pa mang byed 'gyur ba zhig /de ltas rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi/ /yon tan mang po shes pa yis/ /mchod rten bkur sti byos shig dang / /

'bras bu chen po dag tu 'gyur/ /thams cad gzigs pas mang thos dang / /sna tshogs gtam dang dge ba yi/ /spobs ldan tshigs bcad byed pa ni/ /rnams kyi mchog tu bdag bstan to/ /de ltar gnas brtan ngag dbang

ni/ /dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas/ /ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/ /rang gi las ni lung bstan to/ /ngag dbang gi le'u ste bdun pa'o// // de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa

b+ha ra dwA dza bsod snyoms len la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa b+ha ra dwA dza bsod snyoms len tshe dang ldan pa ngag dbang gis rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pas kyang nga rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig /

de nas tshe dang ldan pa b+ha ra dwA dza bsod snyoms len gyis smras pa/ bdag ni tshong dpon bur gyur nas/ /pha yi khyim na dbang byed tshe/ /bdag gi pha ni yid bsrungs shing / /ma la log pa mi mthun byas/ /pha dang sring mo spun dang ni/ /bran dang las byed

rnams la yang / /zas dang skom gyis tshim byas kyang / /ma la spyo ba byas nas su/ /bdag ni ser snas zil non pas/ /ma la zas ni ma byin par/ /khros pas tshig tu smras pa ni/ /zas su rdo ba zo zhig byas/ /las kyi rnam par smin pa

des/ /rab tu tsha dang thig nag gi/ dmyal bar lan mang lhung nas ni/ /sdug bsngal mi nyung thob par gyur/ /dmyal ba de nas shi 'phos nas/ /mi yi srid pa thob pa na/ /las kyi rnam par smin pa des/ /bdag ni rdo ba za bar gyur/ /

skye ba de dang de dag tu/ /bdag gis rdo ba mang zos shing / /de bzhin bkres skom sdug bsngal gyis/ /bdag ni 'chi ba'i dus byas so/ /bdag gi skye ba tha ma ni/ /mi srid thob pa 'di yin te/ /rdzogs sangs bla na med pa yi/ /
ded dpon 'di ni mnyes par byas/ /shAkya seng ge'i bstan pa la/ /bdag gis rab byung thob nas ni/ /mya ngan 'das pa bsil gyur pa'i/ /dgra bcom pa yang bdag gis thob/ /thams cad gzigs pas seng ge yi/ /

sgra sgrogs pa yi mchog tu bstan/ /bdag gis nyon mongs thams cad spangs/ /nyon mongs bral bas zag pa med/ /da dung du yang btsun pa dag /de ltar rdzu 'phrul thob gyur kyang / /phug na bdag gi zas mchis pa/ /rdo ba nyid du

gyur lags so/ /btsun pa bdag gis sdig pa ni/ /gang bgyis dran pa 'di lags te/ /las rnams chud mi za bas na/ /de yi 'bras bu nyams su myong / /b+ha ra dwA dza bsod snyoms len/ /dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas/ /
de ltar ma dros mtsho chen du/ /rang gi las ni lung bstan to/ /b+ha ra dwA dza bsod snyoms len gyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o// //

de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs tshe dang ldan pa b+ha ra dwA dza bsod snyoms len gyis rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/ tshe dang

ldan pa legs 'ongs kyis kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyis de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/ rgyal po'i pho brang bshes ldan du/ /tshong dpon bu phor gyur nas ni/ /bdag ni nor dang

'bru mang zhing / /skye bo'i tshogs kyis bkur ba dang / /rgyal po dang ni grong mi dang / /gsang tshig brjod pa rnams kyis bkur/ /blta na sdug cing mdzes pa dang / /dar la bab pa gzugs kyis rgyags/ de nas bdag ni shing rtar zhugs/ /skye bo'i tshogs

kyis mdun byas nas/ 'dod pa kun dang ldan gyur cing / /bskyed mos tshal der dge sbyong ni/ /dbang po legs par bsdams pa dang / /dbang po zhi bas rgyu byed pa/ /chos gos rnying pa can zhig mthong / /dge sbyong de mthong bdag gis ni/ /yid mi bde ba

skyes gyur te/ /de skyon med kyang mi sdug nas/ /smad cing spyo ba byas pa ni/ /kha dog ngan cing 'jigs par snang / /mdze can lus ni lus rma can/ /sha bri ngan cing rtsa 'thon pa/ /rab tu byung 'di su yi yin/ /ngag gi nyes pa spyad pa dang / /las kyi rnam

par smin pa des/ /de nas 'chi 'pho'i dus byas nas/ /dmyal ba rnams su skyes par gyur/ dmyal ba nas ni shi 'phos bdag /kha dog ngan cing sdug bsngal ldan/ /mdze can lus ni lus rma can/ /sha bri ngan cing rtsa 'thon gyur/ /lag

na gyo mo thogs shing rgyu/ /sha na'i ras kyi smad g.yogs gyon/ /phyag dar phung po'i steng na nyal/ /gnas med mgon med skyob pa med/ /zas kyi ched du sprang ba dang / /gang dang gang du song na yang / /dbyug pa can gyis phyir bzlog cing / /

de dag bdag la smod par byed/ /de ltar tshe rabs lnga brgyar ni/ /gang dang gang du skyes pa der/ /bkres dang skom pa'i sdug bsngal gyis/ /bdag ni 'chi ba'i dus byas so/ /sems can kun gyis bdag gi ming / /nyes 'ongs pa zhes

smad pa byas/ /kun gyi yid du mi 'ong bas/ /de tshe smad pa byed par 'gyur/ /bdag gis rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni/ /dge slong dge 'dun mdun gyis byas/ /skye bo'i tshogs ni chen po la/ /dam pa'i gnas ni ston pa mthong / /skye bo'i tshogs

de mthong nas ni/ /ji tsam 'dod pa'i zas dang skom/ /rnyed par gyur na stes snyam nas/ /myur du brgyugs te phyin pa dang / /skye bo'i tshogs ni chos kyi phyir/ /'dug pa de ni mthong nas kyang / /zas sbyin pa ni med do zhes/ /bdag ni re chad slar

log go/ /de nas thub pa thugs rje can/ /mgon pos bdag la bka' stsal pa/ /'ongs pa legs tshur khyod bde 'am/ /stan 'di la ni khyod 'dug shig /bdag ni dga' ba thob gyur nas/ /thal mo legs sbyar de'i 'og tu/ /ston pa'i zhabs

la phyag byas nas/ /phyogs gcig tu ni bdag 'dug go/ /de nas ston pa thugs rje can/ /gau tam rjes su thugs brtse bas/ /rim pa bzhin gyi gtam gsungs pas/ /bdag ni bden pa mthong bar bgyis/ /bden pa mthong nas thub chen la/ /

de nas bdag gis rab 'byung gsol/ /gau tam thugs rje chen pos bdag /rjes su brtse bas rab tu phyung / /'jig rten gyi ni 'dren pa yis/ /bdag ming legs 'ong zhes btags shing / /me yi khams la snyoms 'jug
pa/ /rnams kyi mchog tu bdag bstan to/ /de ltar gnas brtan legs 'ongs kyis/ /dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas/ /ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/ /rang gi las ni lung bstan to/ /legs 'ongs kyi
le'u ste dgu pa'o// // de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa dga' yod la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa dga' yod tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyis rang gi

las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' yod kyis kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' yod kyis de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/ grong mchog rgyal po'i

khab tu ni/ /tshong dpon phyug por gyur pa na/ /de ni mu ge byung gyur nas/ /drang srong rnams ni gso skal dgos/ /de na bdag gi gso skal du/ /skal dang ldan pa'i rang sangs rgyas/ /zag pa med pa'i bsil gyur pa'i/ /
drang srong mdzes pa gcig cig byon/ /sems ni ser sna'i skyon can gyis/ /bdag gis sdig pa bsams pa ni/ /da lta'i dus su dge sbyong 'di/ /lo bdun du ni su zhig gso/ /khyi yi gcin ni bskol ba yis/ /

de nas 'bras kyi chan btsos te/ /de na drang srong za ru bcug /de tshe de ni 'chi dus byas/ /sdig pa'i las ni de byas pas/ /bsdus gzhom dang ni ngu 'bod dang / /de bzhin tsha ba rab tsha ba'i/ /dmyal ba rnams su yun

ring btsos/ /dmyal ba nas ni shi 'phos bdag /mi yi srid pa thob na yang / /nad bu can la gzhan dbang dang / /sdug bsngal gyis ni bdag dus byas/ /de ltar tshe rabs lnga brgyar ni/ /gang dang gang du skyes pa na/ /

mi sdug nad dang mi bzad pas/ /rtag tu bdag ni dus byas so/ /bdag gi skye ba'i tha ma ni/ /mi yi srid thob 'di yin te/ /rdzogs sangs bla na med pa yi/ /ded dpon 'di ni mnyes par byas/ /shAkya seng ge'i

bstan pa la/ /bdag gis rab byung thob nas ni/ /mya ngan 'das pa bsil gyur pa/ /dgra bcom pa yang bdag gis thob/ /btsun pa da ltar na yang bdag /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing zag med kyang / /nad bu can la 'gre ldog

pa/ /de lta bus ni bdag 'tsho'o/ /de ltar gnas brtan dga' yod kyis/ /dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas/ /ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/ /rang gi las ni lung bstan to/ /ma 'gags pa'i grogs po dga' yod kyi le'u ste bcu pa'o// //

sdom ni/ 'od srung shA ri'i bu dang ni/ /maud gal bu dang mdzes ldan dang / /sna ma gro bzhin ngag dbang dang / /bsod snyoms legs 'ongs dga' yod do/ /de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa grags

pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa grags pa tshe dang ldan pa dga' yod kyis rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa grags pas kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa grags pas

de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/ bdag sngon dgon pa'i drang srong gyur/ /grong du bsod snyoms phyir song na/ /rnam par sngos shing bam pa yis/ /bud med kyi ni ro zhig mthong / /bdag gis tshul bzhin brtag byas te/ /

dkyil mo dkrung bcas 'dug nas ni/ /rtse gcig shin tu mnyam bzhag pas/ /der ni mi sdug bsgom pa byas/ /bdag 'dug pa las de yi lto/ /rdol nas 'jigs pa'i sgra byung ba/ /thos par gyur nas bdag kyang ni/ /ting nge 'dzin las langs

par gyur/ /de yi lto na yod pa yi/ /ngan skyugs dang ni khrag dang ni/ /rul pa'i dri dang mi gtsang ba/ /kun nas rab tu 'dzag pa mthong / /rgyu ma gnye ma mkhal ma dang / /snying dang de bzhin glo ba la/ /srin bu brgya phrag za byed nas/ /slar

yang sems ni mnyam par bzhag /de ci 'dra bar 'di de 'dra/ /'di ci 'dra bar de de 'drar/ /phyi yi ro ni mthong gyur nas/ /rang gi lus la gtod par byed/ /de nas ting 'dzin las langs nas/ /bsti gnas su ni slar log ste/ /

de tshe bsod snyoms ma spyad de/ /zas kyang bza' ba ma byas so/ /gang tshe bdag kyang grong khyer du/ /zas kyi ched du zhugs pa na/ /yid 'phrog pa yi gzugs mthong nas/ /de la mi gtsang bsgom byas pa/ /de yi ro ni ci 'dra bar/ /
gzugs gtogs de kun de 'dra ste/ /khong pa mi gtsang bas gang ba/ /thams cad smad pa yin no zhes/ /de ltar yang dang yang bsgoms pas/ /bdag gis 'dod chags bral ba thob/ /tshangs pa'i gnas pa tshad med

pa/ /bzhi po legs par bsgoms byas pas/ /de nas 'chi ba'i dus byas te/ /tshangs pa yi ni 'jig rten skyes/ /tshangs pa'i 'jig rten shi 'phos bdag /bA rA Na sI'i grong du skyes/ /tshong dpon mchog gi bu gcig par/ /

dpal ldan bdag nyid der skyes te/ /kun la sdug cing yid 'ong ba/ /mthar phyin gnas ni thob par gyur/ /bdag ni nyin mo yongs rgyu zhing / /mtshan mo dag ni nyal bar byed/ /myur bar de nas langs pa na/ /de na bud

med mang po dag /rdza rnga dang ni rnga chen dang / /khar rnga pi bang sngas bcug nas/ /sgren mor bla rdol byed pa dang / /lag brkyang nas ni gnyid log mthong / /de nas bdag gi sngon gyi rgyu/ /mthu chen po ni skyes par gyur/ /bdag la de nas bud med

la/ /dur khrod mi gtsang 'du shes byung / /de nas skyo bar gyur nas ni/ /bdag gis sngangs pa'i tshig smras pa/ /grogs po bdag ni gtses gyur te/ /kun nas 'tshe bas reg par gyur/ /de nas mal nas langs nas ni/ /khang bzangs

nas ni shod du babs/ /lhas ni rjes su snying brtse bas/ /bdag gi sgo ni rnam par phye/ /grong khyer nas ni mngon byung nas/ /'bab chu'i ngogs su nye bar song / /bdag gis pha rol 'gram na ni/ /dge sbyong dbang po bsdams pa mthong / /

bdag gis dge sbyong de mthong nas/ /sgra gsang stod de smras pa ni/ /dge sbyong bdag ni gtses gyur te/ /grogs po bdag la 'tshe bas reg /de nas ston pas bdag la yang / /de tshe bdud rtsi'i tshig gsungs pa/ /gzhon nu ma 'jigs khyod

tshur shog /'dir ni khyod la 'tshe ba med/ /bdag gis nor bu'i lham phud de/ /'bab chu yi ni ngogs rgal nas/ /sangs rgyas gang zag bla med pa/ /thugs rje can gyi spyan sngar song / /de nas bdag skom thugs chud nas/ /gang

zag zla med ston pa des/ /snyan pa'i chos ni bka' stsal pa/ /de ni so sor bdag gis rtogs/ /de nas bdag gis bden mthong nas/ /thub chen rab 'byung gsol ba btab/ /gau tam thugs rje chen po yis/ /thugs brtse ba

yis rab tu phyung / /mtshan gcig lon nas de nas ni/ /nyi ma 'char ka tsam na ni/ /bdag gi zag pa kun zad cing / /bdag ni bsil gyur mya ngan 'das/ /de ltar gnas brtan grags pa ni/ /dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas/ /ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/ /

rang gi las ni lung bstan to/ /gnas brtan grags pa'i le'u ste/ bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa dpal skyed la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa dpal

skyed tshe dang ldan pa grags pas rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa dpal skyed kyis kyang rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa dpal skyed kyis de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/

bA rA Na sI'i grong khyer du/ /ston pa 'od srung mya ngan 'das/ /rgyal po kri kis rin chen las/ /byas pa'i mchod rten chen po brtsigs/ /rgyal po kri ki grags ldan bu/ /bdag ni thu bor gyur pa na/ /bdag gis thog mar gdugs kyis ni/ /

rgyal ba'i mchod rten la gdags byas/ /dge ba'i las ni de byas pas/ /gang dang gang du skyes pa na/ /bsod nams byas pas mdzes pa yi/ /lha dang mi ni rnams su gyur/ /skye ba de dang de dag tu/ /phyug cing longs spyod che ba dang / /

nor dang 'brur ni ldan pa yi/ /bdag ni yon bdag chen por gyur/ /bdag gis tshe rabs lnga brgyar ni/ /sbyin pa mi nyung btang byas te/ /slong ba pa dang dge sbyong dang / /bram ze so sor tshim par byas/ /shin du dang ba'i sems kyis ni/ /'dod

chags bral zhing zag med pa/ /tha ba med pa'i rang sangs rgyas/ /lnga brgya po dag tshim par byas/ /dge ba'i las ni de byas pas/ /srid pa tha ma 'di la ni/ /shAkya phyug po'i rigs su skyes/ /btsas ma thag tu tshig smras pa/ /

khyim 'di na ni nor 'bru dag /ji ga cung zad cig yod dam/ /'di ltar sbyin pa ngas btang ste/ /dbul po rnams ni tshim par bya/ /dbul po rnams la zas byin dang / /gtong bas ngoms par 'gyur ba med/ /ji ga nor lta yod dam

khyed/ /bdag la myur du legs par smros/ /de dag bdag gi tshig thos nas/ /yid skyo bar ni gyur nas su/ /ma ma gtogs par phyogs dang ni/ /phyogs su rnam par rgyug par byed/ /ma ni bu la byams pa yis/ /de tshe bdag

la 'di skad smras/ /lha 'am mi 'am gnod sbyin nam/ /khyod su bdag la myur du smros/ /ma gcig khyod kyi bu bdag ni/ /mi lags srin po ma lags te/ /sbyin bdag tshe rabs dran pas na/ /rtag tu sbyin pa gtong ba spro/ /bdag gi

tshigs de mas thos nas/ /yid ni dga' bar gyur nas kyang / /dbugs 'byin byed cing smras pa ni/ /bu gcig ci dga' sbyin pa thong / /yo byad mang po rnams kyis kyang / /bdag la mas ni gso ba byas/ /kun la sdug cing yid 'ong ba/ /

bdag ni blta bas ngoms mi myong / /bdag ni btsas ma thag tu yang / /khyim de nor dang 'bru rnams dang / /gser dang bran dang las byed pa/ /rnams kyang rtag tu 'phel bar gyur/ /dpal skyed khye'u zhig btsas gyur la/ /

btsas ma thag tu smras pas na/ /bdag gi ming ni gnyen rnams kyis/ /dpal skyed ces ni bya bar btags/ /de nas bdag gis sbyin btang zhing / /dbul po rnams ni tshim byas te/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mnyes

byas nas/ /khyim med par ni rab tu byung / /bdag ni rnyed med 'jigs pa 'am/ /bu lon nyen pas rab byung min/ /de tshe dad pas rab byung nas/ /mngon shes drug po bdag gis thob/ /bdag ni rgyal po blon po dang / /de bzhin

grong mi rnams kyis mchod/ /zas dang btung ba gos dang ni/ /gnas mal yang ni rnyed par gyur/ /de ltar gnas brtan dpal skyed kyis/ /dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas/ /ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/ /rang gi las ni lung bstan to/ /

dpal skyed kyi le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rab tu mang po rnams kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa bak+ku la la 'di skad ces smras so/ tshe dang ldan pa bak+ku la tshe dang ldan pa dpal skyed

kyis rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa bak+ku las kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa bak+ku las de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/ rgyal po'i

pho brang bshes ldan du/ /bdag sngon spos 'tshong gyur pa las/ /rnam par gzigs kyi gsung rab kyi/ /dge slong dge 'dun spyan drangs nas/ /khyed cag ji snyed bzhed pa yi/ /snyun sman bdag gis dbul bgyis te/ /
shun pa rtsa ba 'bras bu'i sman/ /dge 'dun bdag gis tshim par bgyis/ /dge 'dun dbyar ni spyan drangs nas/ /bdag la dge slong gcig cig gis/ /a ru ra gcig ma gtogs par/ /de na 'ga' yang slong ba med/ /

bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig tu/ /bdag ni log par lhung ma gyur/ /sman sbyin pa'i rnam smin ni/ /mthu chen 'di ni blta bar gyis/ /dge ba chung ngu byas pas ni/ /bde ba mang po nyams su myong / /a ru ra ni gcig byin pas/ /

yun ring mtho ris rnams su dga'/ /de nas las kyi lhag mas ni/ /bdag gis mi yi srid thob nas/ /yul 'khor bsod snyoms len pa dag /slob pa na yang ma myong ngo / /nub gsum kho na rig pa ni/ /gsum po bdag

gis mngon sum byas/ /ngan ngon gyis ni 'tsho byas shing / /phyag dar khrod kyi chos gos 'chang / /khyim pa 'am rab tu byung ba dang / /bdag ni 'dres par mi gnas te/ /bdag gi tshe ni lo brgya dang / /drug bcu lhag cig lon na

yang / /da tsam bar du 'ang bdag gis ni/ /na ba mngon par mi dran te/ /btsun pa bdag gis dge ba ni/ /chung ngu bgyis pa 'di dran te/ /de yi 'bras bu yid 'ong 'dod/ /bde ba 'byung ba nyams su myong / /de ltar gnas brtan
bak+ku las/ /dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas/ /ma dros pa'i mtsho chen du/ /rang gi las ni lung bstan to/ /bak+ku la'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// // de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis/

tshe dang ldan pa gnas brtan gnas brtan zhes bya ba la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa gnas brtan gnas brtan tshe dang ldan pa bak+ku las rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa gnas brtan gnas brtan gyis kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu

ba lung ston cig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa gnas brtan gnas brtan zhes bya bas de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/ sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan rnams su/ /bdag ni lham mkhan gyur pa na/ /mu ge byung

nas de nas bdag /ko ba'i ras ma rnams 'tshed do/ /bza' bar bya ba kho na'i phyir/ /ko ba'i ras ma 'tshed pa las/ /dge sbyong gzhan zhig zas kyi phyir/ /bsod snyoms la ni byon pa dang / /de la bdag gis sems dad pas/ /

ko ras kyi ni thug pa byin/ /dge sbyong des ni longs spyad nas/ /de nas nam mkhar 'phags par gyur/ /bdag ni rab tu dga' gyur nas/ /thal mo legs par sbyar byas te/ /de nas gang dang gang du ni/ /song ba kun du 'breng

byas so/ /dga' ba rgya chen thob nas kyang / /de tshe smon lam btab pa ni/ /gnas brtan 'di lta bu dang bdag /lhan cig 'dug par gyur par shog /dge slong 'di yi las kyis ni/ /dri med chos ni gang reg pa/ /bdag gis chos

de rig gyur ces/ /de tshe smon lam btab par gyur/ /kha dog ldan pa ma yin zhing / /dri ni smad par gyur pa dang / /ro dang ldan pa ma yin pa'i/ /sbyin pa bdag gis de tshe btang / /dge ba chung ngu byas pas kyang / /bde ba mang po myong bar

gyur/ /bsod nams byas pas mdzes pa yi/ /lha dang mi ni rnams su gyur/ /bdag gi skye ba tha ma ni/ mi'i srid thob pa 'di yin te/ rdzogs sangs bla na med pa yi/ /ded dpon 'di ni mnyes par byas/ /bdag gis smon lam gang

btab pa'i/ /byang chub dam pa 'di reg ste/ /bdag gis da ltar bsil gyur pa'i/ /mya ngan 'das pa legs par thob/ /de nas gnas brtan chen po ni/ /gnas brtan zhes bya mthu chen gyis/ /ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/ /rang gi las ni lung bstan to/ /

gnas brtan gnas brtan zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// // de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa lting rgyas 'od srung la sogs pa gnas brtan gsum la 'di skad ces smras so/ /

tshe dang ldan pa dag gnas brtan gnas brtan zhes bya bas rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa dag gis kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig /de nas de rnams kyis kyang lung bstan par brtsams pa/ bdag cag gsum

ni spun gyur nas/ /lhan cig tshong dpon gyur pa na/ /'od srung mchod rten ral ba dang / /shag shig 'dug pa mthong gyur nas/ /tshongs pa thams cad bsdus nas ni/ /des ni slar yang sar pa brtsigs/ /spun rnams dag ni lhan cig tu/ /

gdugs gsum zhig ni gdugs pa byas/ /dge ba'i las ni de byas pas/ /mtho ris gnas su yun ring dga'/ /mi rnams su ni slar 'ongs nas/ /phyug po'i rigs chen dag tu skyes/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma mthong nas/ /mu stegs

gzhan las rab tu byung / /nai rany+dza na'i chu ngogs su/ /cho 'phrul mdzad pa mthong nas ni/ /de nas de la rab 'byung phyir/ /bdag cag gis kyang gsol ba btab/ /de nas thugs rje can gyi ni/ /thugs brtses bdag cag rab tu phyung / /

bdag cag ga yA mgor son nas/ /gau ta ma'i bstan pa thos/ /de nas brtson 'grus brtsams pas ni/ /mya ngan 'das pa dam pa thob/ /da ltar ston pa bkur byas shing / /de tshe mchod rten mngon btud pas/ /bdag cag kun ni rab byung nas/ /

bsil bar gyur te mya ngan 'das/ /lting rgyas dang ni chu klung dang / /ga yA 'od srung gnas brtan gsum/ /ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/ /rang gi las ni lung bstan to/ /lting rgyas dang / chu klung dang / ga yA 'od srung rnams kyi le'u ste
bcwa lnga pa'o// // de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa grags pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa grags pa tshe dang ldan pa lting rgyas dang /

chu klung dang / /ga yA 'od srung rnams kyis rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa grags pas kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa grags pas kyang de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba

lung ston par byed de/ bdag sngon dri 'tshong gyur pa na/ /dri rnams 'tshong la mkhas gyur pas/ /der ni de tshe nyo ba'i phyir/ /bud med gzhon nu ma dag 'ongs/ /der ni bdag gis gzugs ldan ma'i/ /bud med 'ongs pa

mthong nas ni/ /'dren brkyang gis ni tshig smras shing / /chags pa'i sems kyis reg par byas/ /'du zhing lhan cig 'khod pa 'am/ /mi tshangs spyod pa spro med kyang / /ma brtags gzhan gyi bud med la/ /lag pas

reg par byas pas na/ /las kyi rnam par smin pa des/ /sems can dmyal ba rnams su skyes/ /slar yang mir ni 'ongs pa na/ /lag pa g.yas pa bskams par gyur/ /de ltar tshe rabs lnga brgyar ni/ /gang dang gang du skyes

pa na/ /rtag tu bdag gi lag pa ni/ /g.yas pa zha zhing rnam par bskams/ /bdag gis sangs rgyas mnyes byas nas/ /khyim med par ni rab tu byung / /mya ngan 'das pa'i bder gyur pa'i/ /dgra bcom pa yang bdag gis thob/ /

btsun pa bdag gis mi dge ba/ /gang bgyis dran pa 'di lags te/ /las rnams chud mi za bas na/ /de yi 'bras bu nyams su myong / /da dung du yang btsun pa dag /bdag ni rdzu 'phrul ldan gyur na 'ang / /lag pa g.yas 'di ji

lta bar/ /g.yon pa de lta ma lags so/ /skyes pa 'am bud med gang yang rung / /byi bo byed pa gang yin pa/ /sems can dmyal bar skyes nas ni/ /de ni sdug bsngal tshor ba myong / /mkhas pa blo dang ldan pa'i mis/ /rab 'bar

me ni ji lta bar/ /gzhan gyi bud med rnam spang zhing / /rang gi chung mas chog par gyis/ /gzhan gyi bud med mthong nas ni/ /skyes pa gang zhig de la chags/ /dmyal ba'i tshor bas nyen pa yi/ /sdug bsngal mang po myong bar 'gyur/ /

bdag gis de ltar sdig byas pas/ /sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan du na/ /yun ring dmyal bar de yi ni/ /'bras bu mi nyung nyams su myong / /bdag gi skye ba tha ma 'dir/ /bla na med pa'i gnas thob nas/ /sdug bsngal kun las bdag grol

zhing / /bsil bar gyur cing mya ngan 'das/ /de lta bas na bde 'dod cing / /sdug bsngal nyid ni mi 'dod pas/ /gzhan gyi bud med 'gro mi bya/ /de ltar sdug bsngal mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas gnas brtan grags pas ni/ /dge slong dge 'dun mdun

'dug nas/ /ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/ /rang gi las ni lung bstan no/ /gnas brtan grags pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// // de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa me skyes la 'di skad ces

smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa me skyes tshe dang ldan pa grags pas rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa me skyes kyis kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa me skyes kyis de'i tshe rang gi las

kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/ rgyal po'i pho brang bshes ldan du/ /rnam par gzigs kyi tshangs spyod tshe/ /nyon mongs med ces bya ba yi/ /tshong dpon nor mang zhig tu gyur/ /thub chen rnam par gzigs pa yi/ /'khor ni stong phrag

brgya dag dang / /drug bcu rtsa gnyis yod par gyur/ /de tshe rgyal po bshes ldan dang / /bdag gis mi yi khyu mchog ni/ /zla ba gsum du spyan drangs nas/ /phyir zhing bshos thang bskyed pa yis/ /tshogs dang bcas te

tshim par byas/ /bdag gis sangs rgyas zla gsum du/ /bshos gsol de nas bshes ldan gyis/ /de tshe rjes gcod ston mo ni/ /bza' bca' dang ni na bza' dang / /gnas mal dag dang ldan pa gsol/ /de nas bskyed mos tshal

bstan pa/ /rgyal po des ni phul bar gyur/ /de bzhin dge slong re re la/ /gos kyis kun nas g.yogs pa'i stan/ /brgya stong dag dang de'i tshe/ /gser gyi dra bas g.yogs pa yi/ /glang po shin tu legs brgyan pa/ /mi nyung

ba dag sbyin par btang / /dge slong re re'i spyi bor ni/ /de tshe gdugs kyang 'dzin par byed/ /de nas bud med legs brgyan lus/ /tsan dan a ga rus bskus pa/ /de dag dge slong re re la 'ang / /bsnyen bkur dag ni byed du bcug /

rgyal po des ni de lta bu'i/ /rjes gcod pa la bkur sti byas/ /drang srong gtso bo rnam par 'dren/ /rgyal pos tshim par byas pa dang / /stan de phun sum tshogs mthong nas/ /de nas bdag gis bsams pa ni/ /bdag la bza' dang bca'

yod kyang / /'di 'dra ba yi stan med de/ /phun sum tshogs pa 'di 'dra dang / /glang po bdag la ga la bdog /lha yi dbang po dbang sgyur ba/ /brgya byin bdag gi drung du 'ongs/ /de nas brgya byin bdag la smras/ /khyod kyi grogs po ngas bya zhes/ /

des ni lha yi bskyed mo tshal/ /mdzes shing yid du 'ong ba sprul/ /lha'i gdan ni bshams nas ni/ /lha yi g.yogs pa rnams kyis g.yogs/ /de nas bdag gis bcom ldan 'das/ /rnams gzigs 'jig rten gyis bkur ba/ /

mi mchog de ni nyan thos bcas/ /gdugs tshod la ni spyan drangs nas/ /sa srung la sogs glang po rnams/ /lha yi rgyan gyis legs brgyan pa/ /dge slong re re spyi bor ni/ /de tshe gdugs dag 'dzin par byed/ /de nas rnam par 'dren
pa ni/ /lha'i zhal zas rnams kyis bstabs/ /thub pa nyan thos thabs gcig la/ /bdag gis lha yi gos kyis g.yogs/ /dge ba'i las ni de byas pas/ /bde ba mang po nyams su myong / /bsod nams byas

pas lha dang ni/ /mi yi nang du mdzes gyur pas/ /bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig tu/ /ngan 'gro bdag gis mi shes so/ /rnam par gzigs pa dpal ldan po/ /drang srong chen pos bsnyen bkur bas/ /bdag gi skye ba tha ma

'di/ /rgyal po'i khab tu bdag skyes so/ /gzugs can snying po'i grong khyer du/ /nor chen phyug po'i khyim du ni/ /rgyal po gzugs can snying pos ni/ /de tshe bdag rjed bkur sti byas/ /blon po rnams dang grong mi la/ /kun nas

sdug cing yid du 'ong / /lha yi 'dod pas rtag tu ni/ /srid pa 'dir ni bdag tshim byas/ /mir gyur na yang lha rnams kyi/ /'dod pa yid 'ong nyams su myong / /de nas ded dpon bla na med/ /sangs rgyas rnam par 'dren pa po/ /thub pa chen po thugs

brtse bas/ /rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs par gyur/ /sangs rgyas shes rab chen po ni/ /rgyal po'i khab byon bdag gis thos/ /bcom ldan thub de gang na bar/ /dga' ba'i yid kyis song ba dang / /'jig rten gsal ba 'od mdzad pa/ /sgron ma 'dzin pa

mthong nas ni/ /de tshe babs te rkang pas ni/ /thub pa'i spyan sngar song nas kyang / /thub pa che la bdag mgu bas/ /zhabs gnyis la ni mgos phyag byas/ /skyes mchog la ni phyag byas nas/ /phyogs gcig tu ni 'dug nas su/ /'gro bas

bsnyen bkur byas pa yi/ /dpa' chen bdud kyi 'ching ba bcad/ /ded dpon mi yi nyi ma ni/ /ring po ma thogs mnyes par byas/ /'jig rten ston pa bla med pa/ /des ni bdag la thugs brtse bas/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bshad de/ /

de tshe bdag gis so sor rtogs/ /de nas bdag gis thugs rje can/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas la 'di skad gsol/ /dpa' bo bdag ni rab 'byung zhing / /bsnyen par rdzogs par thob par 'tshal/ /de nas shes rab dam pa can/ /sangs

rgyas gang zag zla med pas/ /dge slong tshur shog ces gsungs pas/ /bdag ni bsnyen par rdzogs par gyur/ /des na bdag ni bag yod cing / /brtson 'grus bsam gtan brtan po yis/ /bdud rtsi mya ngan 'das zhi ba'i/ /gnas kyi

dam pa reg par gyur/ /rdzogs sangs bla na med pa yi/ /ded dpon 'di ni mnyes par byas/ /mya ngan 'das pa bsil gyur pa/ /dgra bcom pa yang bdag gis thob/ /srid par 'khor bar skye ba dang / /'chi ba rnams las bdag

grol cing / /mya ngan smre sngags 'don pa las/ /thams cad du ni bdag grol to/ /de ltar gnas brtan me skyes kyis/ /dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas/ /ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/ /rang gi las ni lung bstan to/ /me skyes
kyi le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// // de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong tshe dang ldan

pa me skyes kyis rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par

byed de/ ka shi'i yul 'khor dar byed pa/ /rgyal po kri ki zhes bya byung / /rgyal po kri ki bu tha chungs/ /de yi tshe na bdag gyur to/ /'od srung dpal dang ldan pa yi/ /mchod rten chen po brtsigs pa dang / /pha yi yid ni bsrung ba'i phyir/ /

de la gdugs bu chung zhig phul/ /dga' ba'i yid kyis mchod rten la/ /gdugs ni gdags pa byas pa des/ /rab byung rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / /lhan cig 'grogs gyur smon lam btab/ /dge ba'i las ni de byas pas/ /

gang dang gang du skyes par ni/ /bsod nams byas pas mdzes pa yi/ /lha dang mi ni rnams su gyur/ /bdag gi skye ba tha ma 'di/ /bang mdzod stug por bdag skyes te/ /der yang tshong dpon khyim du skyes/ /rigs kyi bu gcig

par gyur te/ /mi dbang kau rab bya dang ni/ /de bzhin kun sdug yid du 'ong / /de bzhin yul mi rnams dang ni/ /bdag ni gnyen tshogs yid du 'ong / /mdzes shing blta na sdug pa dang / /gzugs bzang shin tu dbyibs legs shing / /

mi yi 'byor pa rnams kyis ni/ /'dod pa thams cad phun sum tshogs/ /ston pa dga' zhing yid 'ong ba/ /bang mdzod stug por gshegs pa ni/ /bdag gis mthong nas sems dad pas/ /rab tu 'byung bar gsol ba btab/ /

ston pa gang zag zla med de/ /bsam pa kun la mkhas gyur pas/ /bdag gi bsam pa des mkhyen nas/ /rab tu byung ba las bzlog pa/ /pha ma dag gis ma gnang ba'i/ /gang zag dge yang sangs rgyas rnams/ /rab tu

'byin par mi mdzad kyis/ /song la bdag nyid thar bar gyis/ /de nas khyim du bdag song nas/ /pha ma gnyis la smras pa ni/ /yab gcig gnang bar mdzod cing bdag /khyim ma mchis par rab 'byung ngo / /pha mas bdag las thos nas ni/ /

de tshe yid mi bder gyur nas/ /bu gcig khyod ni bdag cag gnyis/ /shi bar gyur na 'ang mi gnang ngo / /de thos nas ni bdag gis su/ /gal te mi gnang 'di nyid du/ /zas mi 'tshal bar bdag 'gum zhes/ /sa la yang ni nyal ba byas/ /

de tshe dkar po'i chos dag gis/ /bskul nas rab 'byung don gnyer zhing / /thar par 'dod pas zhag drug tu/ /zan ma zos par 'dug pa dang / /de nas bdag dang mdza' ba yi/ /ne'u zlas pha ma la smras pa/ /'di ni gnang bar gyur na legs/ /khyed

la shi bas ci zhig bya/ /gal te 'di ni rab 'byung bar/ /dga' na phyis kyang khyed cag gis/ /gson po nyid du bltas so cog /shi bar gyur na ci zhig rung / /gal te rab tu byung ba la/ /'di ni dga' bar ma gyur na/ /khyed kyir zad mod pha ma las/ /

gzhan na bu gnas ga la yod/ /bdag gi snyan smra ne'u zla la/ /pha ma gnyis kyis smras pa ni/ /gal te rab 'byung lta byed na/ /de lta na lta gzhan du min/ /de nas ne'u zla bdag gi drung / /nye bar 'ongs nas smras pa ni/ /mkhas pa khyod ni pha ma

yis/ /rab tu 'byung bar gnang ba ni/ /khyod la pha ma gnyis na re/ /gal te rab tu byung nas khyod/ /phyis kyang lta bar byed na ni/ /bu gcig song la rab tu byung / /legs shes bdag gis mnyan byas te/ /de nas nyam ni brtas byas nas/ /ston pa'i

spyan sngar song nas ni/ /'di skad ces ni tshig gsol to/ /btsun pa bdag ni gnang lags na/ /thub chen khyod kyi bstan pa la/ /bde gshegs rab 'byung gsol 'debs na/ /rgyal ba bdag ni rab tu phyung / /de nas bdag ni rab byung nas/ /

ston pa'i bstan la 'di ltar gnas/ /bdag gi kun sbyor thams cad zad/ /zag pa rnams ni bcom par gyur/ /bdag gis gdugs gcig btang bas ni/ /bde ba mang po myong bar gyur/ /bsod nams byas pas mdzes pa yi/ /lha dang mi yi rnams su gyur/ /

thams cad gzigs pas dgon pa ba/ /rnams kyi mchog tu bdag bstan to/ /mya ngan 'das pa bsil gyur pa'i/ /dgra bcom pa yang bdag gis thob/ /de ltar thugs rje che rgyal la/ /yid ni rab tu dad byas te/ /mchod rten la ni bkur sti byas/ /'jigs pa che

las rnam thar gyis/ /gnas brtan phyag dar khrod pa ni/ /yul 'khor skyong zhes grags pa yis/ /ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/ rang gi las ni lung bstan to/ /yul 'khor skyong gi le'u ste bcwa brgyad pa'o// //'dul ba gzhi/ bam po

lnga bcu rtsa gsum pa/ de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa sa ga la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sa ga tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa sa gas kyang da rang gi las

kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa sa gas de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/ rgyal po'i khab kyi tshong dpon gyi/ /gtso bo nor chen bdag gyur to/ /dbyar gyi dus su drang srong ni/ /lnga brgya dag ni nye bar byon/ /der ni tshong dpon lnga brgya yang / /

thams cad 'dus par gyur nas ni/ /kun gyis drang srong re re zhig /khyim khyim du ni bgo bar bya/ /rang gi don du kha zas ni/ /ji lta bu dag g.yo byed pa/ /dka' thub can de re re la 'ang / /rtag tu de 'dra kho na sbyin/ /de'i nang drang srong rgan po gang / /de ni bdag

gi skal bar 'ongs/ /tshong dpon mchog la de bzhin du/ /thub pa mchog ste 'tsham bar gyur/ /bdag la lnga brgya pa yi zas/ /snod gang nas ni 'dren byed pa/ /de 'dra ba yi kha zas nyid/ /bdag gis dge slong de la byin/ /de nas de la bdag la ni/ /ser sna shin

du mi bzad skyes/ /'di lta bu'i kha zas ni/ /bdag gis chung ma byin ma myong / /sring mo ma yin de bzhin du/ /bu dang bu mo dag dang ni/ /phu mo nu la 'ang ma byin na/ /dge slong 'di la zla gsum du/ /sbyin pa lta zhig smos ci dgos/ /bdag ni lnga brgya po dag gis/ /

gong tshogs chen por 'dir gyur gyis/ /ma la bdag gis dge sbyong 'di/ /bsad pa la ni brtson byas te/ /'di ni shi ba'i dus byas na/ /bdag la 'god pa mi 'byung zhes/ /de nas bdag gi sdig sems kyis/ /rta yi gcin ni bskol byas nas/ /nyes med

pa ni bsad bya bar/ /kha zas rnams dang lhan cig byin/ /der ni zos ma thag tu yang / /mi bzad pa yi nad langs te/ /rgyu ma gnye ma mkhal ma dag /ro smad nas ni zags par gyur/ /thub pa chos kyi yon tan dga'/ /shes bzhin de nas dus

las 'das/ /lha dang gnod sbyin gcig la gcig /sgra ni shin tu sgrogs byed pa/ /kye ma'o tshong dpon 'di re sdig /'di yis thub pa rang sangs rgyas/ /bsil bar gyur cing zag med pa/ /dbang ldan 'di ni bkrongs par

gyur/ /nye du kun kyang 'khrugs nas ni/ /de nas bdag la smod byed pa/ /gang phyir thub pa 'di bsad pas/ /khyod kyis bsod nams min mang bskyed/ /nye du rnams kyi tshig thos nas/ /bdag kyang yid mi bde bar gyur/ /

drang srong de dag bsags nas ni/ /de nas bdag gis nyes pa bshags/ /bzod pa gsol nas de nas yang / /nyes pa thams cad so sor bshags/ /lnga brgya la ni zhal zas kyis/ /gus dang bcas pas tshim par byas/ /

bdag gis sdig pa de bshags nas/ /bzod gsol drang srong de dag ni/ /zas dang btung bas tshim byas nas/ /de tshe smon lam btab pa ni/ /gnas brtan 'di 'dra dag dang ni/ /bdag ni lhan cig 'grogs par shog /ji
ltar 'di kun grol gyur pa/ /de bzhin 'ching las grol bar shog /bkren pa rnams kyi khyim du bdag /lan 'ga'ang skye bar ma gyur cig /bdag gi sems ni lan 'ga' yang / /ser sna skye bar ma
gyur cig /bdag gis rang sangs rgyas bsad pa'i/ /shin tu mi bzad las byas pas/ /de nas 'chi 'pho dus byas nas/ /dmyal ba rnams su skyes nas ni/ /yun ring lo ni stong dag tu/ /sdug
bsngal tshor ba nyams su myong / /slar yang mir ni 'ongs pa na/ /phyug cing nor chen gyur pa dang / /'jig rten rnams kyis mchod bkur na yang / /bdag ni myur du 'chi 'gyur zhing / /
rtag tu bdag ni nang grol dag /'dzag pas 'chi ba'i dus byas so/ /khyim pa'i rtags rnams spangs nas ni/ /khyim med par ni rab tu byung / /bstan la brtson 'grus byas pas na/ /'dod chags thams cad yang

dag bton/ /gang tshe len pa med pa yi/ /mya ngan 'das par bdag gyur na'ang / /rgyu ma gnye ma mkhal ma nang / /de dag kyang ni 'dzag par gyur/ /bdag gis sdig las byas pa dang / /dge ba'i las byas gang yin

pa/ /dge dang sdig pa de dag gi/ 'bras bu de dag nyams su myong / /mnyan yod dbus na skyes pa yi/ /dge slong mthu chen sa gas ni/ /ma dros pa'i mtsho chen du/ /rang gi las ni lung bstan to/ /sa ga'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// //

de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung byin pa can la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung byin pa can dge slong sa gas rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/ da tshe dang ldan pa 'od

srung byin pa can gyis kyang rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung byin pa can gyis de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/ mu ge dag ni byung ba na/ /grong khyer pa ni mtha' dag gis/ /lo bdun tshang

bar dge slong gi/ /dge 'dun dag ni spyan drangs so/ /de na bdag gi skal bar ni/ /rang sangs rgyas ni skal ldan pa/ /bsil bar gyur cing zag med pa'i/ /thub pa mdzes pa gcig cig 'ongs/ /bdag gis dam bcas byas pa ni/ /

las mi byed na bu dang ni/ /nang mi yang rung su la yang / /bdag gis zas ni mi sbyin no/ /de ltar rnam par bsams nas ni/ /bdag gis sdig pa'i blo bsams pa/ /dge slong las mi byed pa 'di/ /bdag gis ci ste zas

sbyin zhes/ /de nas drang srong bdag 'grogs nas/ /zhing las mtha' rnams blta ba'i phyir/ /mtha' dag tu ni bskor nas su/ /de yi 'og tu zas zar bcug /las kyi rnam par smin pa des/ /bsdus gzhom dang ni tsha ba yi/ /

dmyal ba rnams su skyes nas ni/ /sdug bsngal kho na'i tshor ba thob/ /dmyal ba rnams nas shi 'phos bdag /gang dang gang du skyes par ni/ /de tshe brtson pa mang byas na 'ang / /sdug bsngal kho nas zas rnyed do/ /bdag gi skye ba tha ma ni/ /

mi'i srid thob pa 'di yin te/ /rdzogs sangs bla na med pa yi/ /ded dpon 'di ni mnyes par byas/ /yang dag dad pas rab byung nas/ /bdag gis zag pa rnams bcom ste/ /bdag gis mngon shes drug reg nas/ /dgra bcom nyid kyang thob par

gyur/ /da dung du yang btsun pa bdag /'di ltar rdzu 'phrul ldan lags na 'ang / /da lta lan mang song nas ni/ /sdug bsngal gyis ni zas sgrub po/ /lam ni ring por song nas kyang / /bdag ni zas dag bsgrub pa na/ /gang tshe bdag ni dub gyur nas/ /

de'i 'og tu zas 'grub bo/ /rus ni 'od srung las kyi ming / /byin pa can ni mthu chen pos/ /ma dros pa yi mtsho chan du/ /rang gi las ni lung bstan to/ /'od srung byin pa can gyi le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// // sdom ni/ grags ldan dang ni dpal

skyed dang / /bak+ku la gsum grags pa dang / /me skyes dang ni yul 'khor skyong / /sa ga 'od srung byin pa can/ /de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa lam phran bstan la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa

lam phran bstan tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung byin pa can gyis rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pas kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa lam phran bstan gyis de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu

ba lung ston par byed de/ sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan rnams su/ /bdag ni phag rdzir gyur pa na/ /phag rnams kha ni bcings nas su/ /'bab chu las ni sgrol bar byed/ /'bab chu las ni bsgral ba'i phyir/ /bdag gis chu dbus

phyin pa dang / /bskyod par gyur pas dbugs subs nas/ /phag rnams thams cad shi bar gyur/ /skyob pa med cing mgon med pas/ /bdag kyang 'bab chus khyer ba las/ /drang srong rjes su brtse ba dag /'ongs nas bdag ni byung bar
gyur/ /de dag gis bdag de las bsgral/ /de nas bdag gis rab tu byung / /bdag gis gdams ngag med par ni/ /'du shes med la snyoms par zhugs/ /de nas 'chi ba'i dus byas nas/ /lha rnams su

ni bdag skyes so/ lha yi 'jig rten shi 'phos nas/ /bdag gis mi yi srid pa thob/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mnyes byas nas/ /khyim med par ni rab tu byung / /rmongs shing g.yer bo ma yin pas/ /bshad pa bdag
gis ma rtogs so/ /btsun pa bdag gis zla gsum du/ /tshigs bcad gcig la zhugs nas ni/ /tshig bzhi pa yi rkang pa gcig /rtogs pas 'dod chags kun bton to/ /btsun pa de ltar bdag gis ni/ /
las gang bgyis pa dran lags te/ /bskal pa mi nyung yun ring du/ /'khor ba 'dir ni bdag gis brgyugs/ /'jig rten mgon gyi spyan sngar ni/ /lam phran bstan gyis dkar gnag las/ /ma dros pa yi

mtsho chen du/ /lung ni bstan pa byas pa yin/ /lam phran bstan kyi le'u ste nyi shu gcig pa'o// // de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa sprul khol la 'di skad ces smras so/ /

tshe dang ldan pa sprul khol tshe dang ldan pa lam phran bstan gyi rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/ /tshe dang ldan pas kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa sprul khol gyis de'i tshe rang gi

las kyi rgyu ba lung ston pa byed de/ sangs rgyas 'od srung mya ngan 'das/ /tha mar byung ba'i dge slong ni/ /sde snod gsum ldan mang du thos/ /chos kyi ser sna can du gyur/ /dge slong gzhan dag shes gyur na/ /

bdag dang mtshungs par 'gyur 'ong zhes/ /bdag gis dge slong rnams la chos/ /ma ston cing ni ma bshad de/ /bdag gi drung du dge slong gang / /nye bar 'ongs nas 'dri byed na'ang / /thams cad gdams ngag ma byin par/ /thams cad

du ni spyos shing bgyi/ /dge slong rnams ni nyer 'ongs nas/ /de tshe bdag la bkur sti byed/ /chos ni rab tu mi ston pa/ /khyod kyi da ni bza' min zer/ /de nas 'chi ba'i dus bab tshe/ /bdag gi chos ni gzhan dag la/ /ma bstan de ni legs min zhes/ /

bdag ni yid la 'gyod par gyur/ /tshe yi lhag ma nyung ngu zhig /zhag bdun lus nas bdag gis ni/ /rab tu byung ba rnams bsogs te/ /de nas nyes pa bshags pa byas/ /bdag gis nyes pa bshags byas shing / /ser sna de na rnam

bsal nas/ /de tshe bdag gis nub bdun du/ /don bzang ba yi chos bshad do/ /bdag gis blo la ci lcogs pas/ /legs par bshad pa'i chos thos nas/ /phan tshun 'doms shing gcig la gcig /smra bar yang ni byed du bcug /

de tshe bdag gis nub bdun du/ /chos ni cung zad gcig bshad pas/ /'dod pa thams cad 'byor pa yi/ /lha yi 'jig rten dag tu dga'/ /lha yi 'jig rten shi 'phos te/ /bdag gis mi yi srid thob nas/ /grong khyer ser

skya'i gzhi dag tu/ /shAkya'i rgyal po'i rigs su skyes/ /nor chen longs spyod chen po dang / gzugs bzang blta na sdug pa dang / /thams cad la sdug yid 'ong zhing / /phun sum tshogs pa'i mthar phyin to/ /khyim re nas ni skyes

pa re/ /khyim med par ni rab 'byung las/ /'dod pa'i longs spyod 'byor pas na/ /bdag ni rab 'byung ma btub bo/ /rdzogs sangs gang zag zla med pa/ /bdag nyid la ni thugs brtse'i phyir/ /yang dang yang du rang 'byung ba/ /yang dag len

pa skul ma mdzad/ /de nas ded dpon zla med pa/ /sangs rgyas la ni bdag gis gsol/ /re shig bdag gi lo bdun du/ /sbyin pa mi nyung btang bar bgyi/ /bdag gis sbyin pa dag btang nas/ /lo bdun lon par gyur pa dang / /

shes rab mchog can khyod las ni/ /de nas bdag ni rab tu 'byung / /lo bdun dag ni thogs ches la/ /tshe ni cung zad tsam yin pas/ /sang nyid 'chi yang su shes kyis/ /de ring nyid du brtul te gyis/ /bdag gis gus pas sangs

rgyas kyi/ /gsung ni slar bzlog ma byas par/ /btsun pa bdag ni dgung bdun na/ /thugs brtses rab tu dbyung ba mdzod/ /bdag gis zhag bdun sbyin btang ste/ /phongs pa rnams ni tshim byas nas/ /bdag gi phyir ni nye du dag /grong khyer du ni mel tse btsugs/ /snang ba chen

po rnams kyis ni/ /grong khyer mchog ni gsal bar byas/ /skye bo dag gis ma tshor bar/ /rab 'byung phyir ni mngon du byung / /bdag ni dang bas rab byung nas/ /rgyal ba'i bstan la brtson byas te/ /lo ni nyi shu lnga lon

yang / /sems mnyam pa yang ma thob bo/ /de nas bdag gi sdig pa'i sems/ /'dod la zhen pa skyes pa ni/ /bdud rtsi rtogs par ma gyur gyis/ /dman par slar ni bdag ldog snyam/ /de nas ngo tsha khrel yod pa/ /don chen dag ni

skyes gyur pa/ /bdag la nye du'i tshogs smod cing / /skyon du yang ni 'grang 'gyur ba/ /de ni bdag dang 'tsham min zhing / /de ni bzang po ma yin gyis/ /bdag lta gson na'ang ci ru rung / /mtshon gyis gdab par bya'o snyam/ /

mtshon rnon bdag gis blangs nas su/ /skyil mo dkrung ni bcas nas kyang / /mtshon ni ske la gtad pa las/ /de nas sems ni rnam par grol/ /bdag sems tha ba las grol nas/ /yang dang yang du brjod pa ni/ /e ma'o

sangs rgyas chos dge 'dun/ /e ma'o chos nyid e re bzang / /sngon ni bdag gi 'du shes gang / /so so'i skye bo shi bla snyam/ /bdag gis srog la ma bltas pas/ /zhi ba dam pa thos par gyur/ sngon ni 'khums

par gyur pa yis/ /dam chos ser sna byas pa gang / /btsun pa de yi 'bras bu ni/ /sdug bsngal ba yis rnam par grol/ /bdag gis 'chi ba'i dus na chos/ /dam pa rab bstan gang yin pa'i/ /las kyi rnam par smin pa des/ /

phun sum tshogs pa'i pha rol phyin/ /shAkya'i bu pho dbang po brtul/ /sprul khol mthu chen ldan pas ni/ /ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/ /rang gi las ni lung bstan to/ /sprul khol gyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// //

de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa tshe dang ldan pa sprul khol gyis rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas kyang da rang gi las

kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/ sngon ni phrag khur khyer ba yi/ /rtswa thun dbul por gyur pa na/ /bdag gis dge sbyong grags ldan pa/ /nyon mongs bcom la bsod snyoms

phul/ /shAkya'i rigs la bdag skyes na'ang / /bdag ni ma 'gags yin par shes/ /rol mo glu la mkhas gyur pas/ /pheg sgra phyad pas bslang ba na/ /rdzogs sangs ga las bsnyengs med pa/ /ston pa bdag gis mthong bar gyur/ /mthong nas

bdag ni sems dad pas/ /khyim med par yang rab tu byung / /bdag gis de yi gsung thos nas/ /bstan la dga' bas gnas gyur te/ /rtag tu pha rol gnon brtan zhing / /gzabs pa'i bdag nyid brtson 'grus brtsams/ /sangs rgyas bstan

pa mthar phyung nas/ /rig pa gsum ni rjes su thob/ /bdag sngon gang na 'dug pa yi/ /sngon gyi gnas ni shes gyur te/ /sum bcu rtsa gsum lha rnams su/ /bdag gis lan bdun skye ba blangs/ /slar yang mi yi nang du ni/ mi yi dbang po lan

bdun byas/ /de tshe 'dzam tshal dbang phyug gi/ /rgyal rigs spyi bor dbang bskur to/ /'dir ni bdun dang der bdun te/ /bdag gis lan ni bcu bzhir 'khor/ /bdag sngon gang na 'dug pa yi/ /gnas ni sngon du shes gyur te/ /las kyi 'bras bu de

lta bu/ /bdag gis de tshe nyams su myong / /gang dang gang du skyes pa na/ /dga' ba dag gis rgyu bar byed/ /sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang / /'ong ba dang ni 'gro ba dang / /'di lta bu dang gzhan gyur shes/ /'phags pa'i yan lag lnga ldan dga'/ /

yan lag lnga pa'i ting 'dzin la/ /zhi ba phyogs gcig goms byas shing / /shin du sbyangs thob lam gyis ni/ /lha yi spyan ni rnam par sbyangs/ /ston pa 'jig rten bla med kyis/ /bdag gi kun rtog mkhyen nas kyang / /yid las byung ba'i sku yis ni/ /

bdag drung rdzu 'phrul gyis byon nas/ /ston pa spros med la dgyes pas/ /spros pa dang ni bral ba bshad/ /bdag gis de yi gsung thos nas/ /bstan la dga' bas gnas gyur te/ /rtag par pha rol gnon brtan zhing / /gzabs pa'i bdag nyid brtson 'grus brtsams/ /

sangs rgyas bstan la mthar phyung nas/ /rig pa gsum ni rjes su thob/ /'chi ba 'ang mngon par mi dga' zhing / /'tsho ba 'ang mngon par mi dga' ste/ /shes bzhin dran dang ldan pa yis/ /dus la so sor rtog par byed/ /yangs pa'i 'od ma'i grong

khyer gyi/ /'od ma'i tshang tshing de'i drung du/ /bdag gi srog ni zad nas kyang / /zag med mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur/ /bdag gis bsod snyoms byin pas ni/ /'bras bu thob pa 'di yin te/ /rdzogs sangs gang zag zla med pa'i/ /ston pa bdag gis mnyes

par byas/ /mya ngan 'das pa bsil gyur pa'i/ /dgra bcom pa yang bdag gis thob/ /thams cad gzigs pas bsod nams can/ /rnams kyi mchog tu bdag bstan to/ /de ltar gnas brtan ma 'gags pas/ /dge slong dge 'dun mdun

'dug nas/ /ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/ /rang gi las ni lung bstan to/ /ma 'gags pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o// // de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa ri dgas 'dzin gyi bu nag po la

'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa nag po tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/ /tshe dang ldan pas kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa ri dgas 'dzin gyi bu nag pos de'i tshe

rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/ bu ram sbyor ba'i khang pa na/ /bu ram shing rnams 'tshir ba las/ /rang sangs rgyas ni skal ldan pa/ /nad pa gsor rung zhig 'ongs nas/ /bdag gis thub pa nub bdun du/ /bu ram til mar bsnyen bkur
byas/ /skal ldan zhag bdun 'das pa dang / /de nas de ni mkha' la 'phags/ /de nas bran de nyer 'ongs nas/ /bdag la smras par gyur pa ni/ /yon gnas rab tu byung gyur pa/ /de lta bu ni song bar gyur/ /

drang srong mkha' la song ngo zhes/ /bdag gis de las tshig thos nas/ /sems mgu ba dang yid bde bas/ /de yi tshe na dad pa byas/ /sems rab dang ba de dang ni/ /bu ram sbyin par btang ba des/ /bsod nams byas pas

mdzes pa yi/ /lha dang mi ni rnams su gyur/ /bdag gi skye ba tha ma ni/ /mi'i srid thob pa 'di yin te/ /rdzogs sangs bla na med pa yi/ /ded dpon 'di ni mnyes par byas/ /shAkya seng ge'i bstan pa la/ /bdag gis rab 'byung thob nas ni/ /

mya ngan 'das pa bsil gyur pa'i/ /dgra bcom pa yang bdag gis thob/ /da dung du yang btsun pa dag /bdag gi chos gos bsod snyoms dang / /yo byad dang ni gnas mal gyi/ /rnyed pa mang po skye bar gyur/ /bdag ni chos gos 'drub pa na/ /

bu ram btung ba glud pa'i phyir/ /bdag la bu ram snod bzhi zhig /dgos so snyam du bsams pa dang / /rgyal po gzugs can snying po la/ /de nas lha yis smras pa ni/ /ri dgas 'dzin bu nag po la/ /bu ram btung ba byin cig dang / /

mi yi dbang po khyod kyis ni/ /bu ram btung ba don chen 'gyur/ /'tsho byad a mra'i tshal du ni/ /ri dgas bu la bu ram skyol/ /rgyal po'i mchog ni mthu chen po/ /gzugs can snying pos bdag la ni/ /snod chen bu ram gyis bkang ba/ /bzhi po

dag ni bskur bar gyur/ /de nas des ni bu ram dag /ro dang ldan pa khyer 'ongs nas/ /stong ni nyis brgya lnga bcu yi/ /dge slong dge 'dun tshim par byas/ /ri dgas 'dzin bu dgra bcom pa/ /mngon shes drug ldan mthu chen po/ /

ma dros pa yi mtsho chan du/ /rang gi las ni lung bstan to/ /ri dgas 'dzin gyi bu nag po'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o// // de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan

zin la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin tshe dang ldan pa ri dgas 'dzin gyi bu nag pos rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin gyis kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig /de nas

tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin gyis de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/ bdag sngon lus 'phags mi thi la'i/ /bdag po rgyal por gyur pa na/ /dgos pa zhig gi phyir 'dug nas/ /skye bo rjes su bstan pa na/ /de nas

drang srong dka' thub che/ /gzi brjid mchog 'jigs 'ongs gyur te/ /de ni nye bar 'ongs nas kyang / /bdag la 'di skad tshig smras so/ /sa bdag bdag ni rkun ma ste/ /bdag gis ma byin chab 'tshal gyis/ /rkun po'i

chad pa ji lta bar/ /khyod kyis de bzhin bcad du gsol/ /drang srong chos kyi yon tan dga'/ /de la bdag gis der smras pa/ /khyod la chu ni gnang bar byas/ /khyod ni song la ci bder spyod/ /rgyal po bdag gi 'gyod pa ni/ /de ltas

bsil ba'i rngo mi thog /bdag la chad pas gcod mdzod dang / /'gyod pa dag dang 'bral bar 'gyur/ /bdag gis de ni bskyed mos tshal/ /gzhir ni zhag drug spang ba byas/ /de ni zhag drug lon nas phyir/ /rang gi bsti gnas gnas su song / /

zhe sdang med pa'i sems kyis ni/ /sdig pa bdag gis byas pas kyang / /rab tu tsha dang thig nag tu/ /lo ni drug bcu rnams su btsos/ /de nas las kyi lhag mas ni/ /bdag gi lus ni tha ma la/ /ma yi mngal du

lo drug ni/ /tshang bar yang ni 'dug par gyur/ /bdag ni zhe sdang med bzhin du/ /lus dang ngag gi las byas pa/ /las rnams chud mi za bas na/ /de yi 'bras bu nyams su myong / /de ltar gnas brtan sgra gcan zin/ /
dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas/ /ma dros pa'i mtsho chen du/ /rang gi las ni lung bstan to/ /sgra gcan zin gyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o// // de nas dge slong gnas brtan

gnas brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin gyis rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos kyang da rang gi

las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos kyang de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/ rnam par gzigs kyi gsung rab la/ /bdag gis lan cig khrus byas te/ /dge slong dge 'dun khrus

byas nas/ /de tshe smon lam btab pa ni/ /gnas brtan 'di lta bu dag dang / /bdag ni lhan cig 'grogs par shog /dag cing dri ma med pa dang / /nyon mongs med cing zag bral shog /kha dog bzang po dag dang ni/ /gzugs

bzang gyur ces smon lam btab/ /de nas 'chi 'pho'i dus byas nas/ /lha rnams su ni skyes par gyur/ /bdag ni gser gyi mdog 'dra ba'i/ /mi dang lha ni rnams su gyur/ /gang dang gang du skyes par ni/ /longs spyod

chen pos shin tu gnas/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten ni/ /shin tu dkar po bdag gis brtsigs/ /de nas byug pas thams cad ni/ /ser por gyur pa de ltar byugs/ /de nas mtshan rnams 'dod pa'i phyir/ /gser

gyi mdog tu 'gyur ba dang / /gzugs bzang dbyibs ni legs 'gyur bar/ /smon lam du ni gdab pa byas/ /dge ba'i las ni de byas pas/ /grong khyer bA rA Na sIr ni/ /ka shi'i rgyal po kri ki yi/ /bu pho 'bring por bdag skyes so/ /

'od srung mchod rten mthong nas ni/ /de nas dad pa'i sems bskyed de/ /mchod rten de la bdag gis ni/ /gdugs 'bring zhig ni gdags pa byas/ /khrus de dang ni bsro khang dang / /yung gi byug pas byug pa dang / /gdugs
ni gdags pa byas pa yis/ /bde ba mang po nyams su myong / /de nas las kyi lhag mas ni/ /bdag gi yang srid tha ma 'dir/ /shAkya'i rgyal po'i rigs skyes nas/ /sangs rgyas skyob pa'i mched du gyur/ /
bdag gi lus ni 'di la yang / /skyes bu chen po'i mtshan yod pa/ /sum bcu lhag pa ma yin pa'i/ /sum bcu dman pa ma yin pa'o/ /shAkya seng ge'i bstan pa la/ /bdag gis rab 'byung thob nas ni/ /mya ngan
'das pa bsil gyur pa'i/ /dgra bcom pa yang bdag gis thob/ /thams cad gzigs pas mdzes pa yi/ /rnams kyi mchog tu bdag bstan to/ /nyes bsal zag pa zad nas ni/ /go 'phang dam pa thob par 'gyur/ /
de ltar gnas brtan dga' bos ni/ /dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas/ /ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/ /rang gi las ni lung bstan to/ /dga' bo'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o// de nas dge slong gnas
