brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor gyis kyang da rang gi

las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor gyis de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/ 'di ni bdag sngon tshong pa ni/ /nya pa zhes ni bya bar gyur/ /tshong pa'i lam du zhugs pa na/ /dbang du gyur

cing zag med pa/ /nyon mongs med pa'i rang sangs rgyas/ /drang srong zhig ni 'gron par 'ongs/ /de yi bar du bdag gis ni/ /rtag par zas la 'gron du bos/ /gang du 'brang ni 'debs 'gyur ba/ /der ni gding ba dag kyang bshams/ /rkang pa'i

chu dang til mar dang / /de yi mar me dag kyang bshams/ /ji srid lam yod de srid du/ /bdag gis de la bkur sti byas/ /tshong pa rnams kyis rim bzhin du/ /rgya mtsho'i 'gram du phyin pa dang / /dge slong gru drung nyer 'ongs nas/ /bdag gis de la

smras pa ni/ /btsun pa rgya mtsho 'di la ni/ /nor gyi slad du bzhud dam ci/ /btsun pa bdag cag phongs pas na/ /'dod pa dag gi phyir yang ni/ /rgya mtsho chen po'i chu tshogs la/ /nyen can du ni 'jug par byed/ /bdag la dge slong des

smras pa/ /bdag ni mya ngan 'das pa yin/ /khyed cag gnyen kun lhan cig tu/ /nor cher bsod nams che bder gyur/ /de tshe de la bdag gis ni/ /rab dgas chos gos bzang po phul/ /mgo bos phyag ni byas nas yang / /de la bskor ba

dag byas so/ /de nas bdag la thugs brtse'i phyir/ /des ni chos gos blangs nas ni/ /de dag thams cad lta bzhin du/ /de yi 'og tu mkha' la 'phags/ /cho 'phrul byed pa de mthong nas/ /de tshe bdag ni skyo gyur nas/ /bdag gis thal mo sbyar

byas te/ /de nas smon lam btab pa ni/ /gnas brtan 'di lta bu dag dang / /bdag ni lhan cig 'grogs par shog /'di yis chos ni gang dag thob/ /de dag bdag gis thob par shog /rdzogs sangs rgyas ni mnyes byed cing / /rab tu 'byung ba thob pa dang / /

dge 'dun la yang rdzu 'phrul gyis/ /rnam 'phrul bkur sti byed par shog /dge ba'i rtsa ba de yis ni/ /lha yi 'jig rten rab tu dga'/ /mi yi 'thob pa thob nas kyang / /bde ba mang po nyams su myong / /skye ba de dang de dag tu/ /bdag ni nor chen phyug pa dang / /

bsod nams byas pas mdzes pa yi/ /lha dang mi ni rnams su gyur/ /bskal pa tha ma 'di la ni/ /srid pa tha ma 'di la yang / /ku shi zhes bya'i gyad rnams kyi/ /gyad kyi bur ni bdag skyes te/ /blta na sdug cing mdzes pa dang / /gzugs bzang

spyod pa mdzes pa dang / /thams cad la sdug yid 'ong zhing / /phun sum tshogs pa mthar phyin no/ /sangs rgyas shAkya seng ge ni/ /bla na med pa mnyes par byas/ /mthong nas bdag sems dad byas te/ /khyim med par ni rab tu byung / /ma ga d+ha yi

ri brgyud nas/ /'od ma'i tshal du gnas byas na/ /dge slong dge 'dun tho 'tsham pa'i/ /nyan thos dag cig der lhags te/ /gnas mal dag ni bskos na yang / /dge slong rnams la spyo byed de/ /rnam par 'tshe zhing smod pa dang / /yang dang

yang du gshe bar byed/ /tshangs mtshungs spyod pa rnams mthong nas/ /bdag ni snying rje bar gyur te/ /bdag ni zag pa zad gyur kyang / /nyid kyis dge slong bsnyen bkur bya/ /bdag gis brtson 'grus brtsams nas ni/ /bstan pa 'di la

brtson byas pas/ /dgra bcom bdag gis thob nas ni/ /mngon shes drug la dbang byas so/ /ston pa'i spyan sngar song nas ni/ /thub la mgo bos phyag byas te/ /thal mo spyi bor sbyar nas su/ /skyes bu dam pa la gsol pa/ /
'dod chags gti mug gis ma lags/ /byams sems gus dang bcas pa yis/ /thub pa bdag ni dge slong gi/ /rim gro bgyid par gnang bar mdzod/ /pha rol sems la mkhas pa yi/ /ston pas bdag gsol

mkhyen nas ni/ /nyid kyis dge slong dge 'dun mdun/ /gnyug ma'i rim gro byed du bcug /byams pa'i lus kyi las dang ni/ /de bzhin ngag dang yid kyis kyang / /bdag gis rtag tu sems smad nas/ /dge slong dge 'dun rim

gro byas/ /spyod pa la ni zhugs pa dang / /lam nas 'ongs pa'i dge slong dag /bdag gis mthong nas dga' ba dang / /so sor yid ni bde gyur nas/ /til mar rab 'bar lta bu yi/ /bdag gi sor lnga'i sgron ma yi/ /rdzu 'phrul rnam par

bstan byas nas/ /gnas mal dag ni 'cha' bar byed/ /dge slong gang dag bdag gi ni/ /cho 'phrul 'di ni lta 'dod na/ /nam ni sros par gyur pa dang / /mun khung bdag drung lhags nas ni/ /de rnams la ni ci rigs par/ /byams sems

gus dang bcas pa yis/ /gnas mal dag ni 'cha' byed cing / /skye bo mang po skyo ba skyed/ /bdag gis bsams pa gang yin dang / /bdag gis smon lam gang btab pa/ /bdag gi bzang po de grub cing / /go 'phang mi g.yo bdag
gis thob/ /de lta bur ni gyad bu nor/ /zag pa med cing dbang gyur pas/ /ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/ /rang gi las ni lung bstan to/ /gyad bu nor gyi le'u ste nyi shu bdun pa'o// //

de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa nye sde la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa nye sde tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor gyis rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/ /tshe dang ldan pa nyes sdes kyang da rang gi las

kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa nye sdes de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/ /'das pa dag gi dus na bdag /rngon pa dag tu gyur pa na/ /nags chen nyams dga' byul ba dang / /ri dgas rnam pa sna tshogs

mthong / /dug gis bskus pa'i mda' rnams dang / /gzhu yi tshogs dag blangs nas ni/ /ri dgas mang po'i ri yi rdzong / /de yang der ni bdag gis brgyus/ /bdag gis ri dgas rnams mthong na/ /gdug pa'i sems ni nyer

bzhag nas/ /dug gis bskus pa'i mda' rnams kyis/ /ri dgas mang po rab tu bsnun/ /bdag gi lag na gzhu dang ni/ /dug gis bskus pa'i mda' srel bzhin/ /rang sangs rgyas shig ljon shing gi/ /drung na bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur/ /

bdag gis dge sbyong de mthong nas/ /de tshe yid ni mi bder gyur/ /de nas thub pa gnod med pa'i/ /lus la mdas ni bsnun par gyur/ /de yi 'og tu dge slong de/ /mda' yi zug rngu'i sdug bsngal ldan/ /shing de nyid kyi drung du ni/ /

len pa med par mya ngan 'das/ /rtsub pa'i las de byas pas na/ /sems can dmyal bar skyes nas ni/ /de la lo ni stong phrag tu/ /bdag gis sdug bsngal tshor ba myong / /de nas dmyal las shi 'phos nas/ /dud 'gro'i skye gnas

song nas ni/ /ri yi rdzong ni de nyid du/ /bdag ni ri dgas rnams su skyes/ /rtag tu 'jigs shing bag tsha zhing / /bkres shing skom pas nyen pas na/ /rid cing shin tu sdug bsngal bas/ /bdag ni de dang der rgyu'o/ /rdzong der rngon pa
gdug pa ni/ /shin tu mi bzad pa rnams kyis/ /dug gis bskus pa'i mda' rnon gyis/ /bdag gi lus la bsnun par gyur/ /bdag 'gyel de dag gis mthong nas/ /bdag ni gson zhing 'gul bzhin du/ /mtshon

gyis yan lag rnams kyi sha /bcad nas de rnams khyer zhing 'dong / /bdag ni sa phyogs de nyid du/ /sha yi ched du bsad byas te/ /de ltar tshe rabs lnga brgyar ni/ /sdug bsngal mang po bsgrubs pa yin/ /ri bo

de nyid ngos na ni/ /dka' thub ldan la mthu che zhing / /rdzu 'phrul che gzi mi bzad pa'i/ /drang srong rab tu mang po mthong / /bdag gis drang srong de mthong nas/ /de nas byams pa'i sems bsgoms te/ /blo bzang
byams dang ldan pa la/ /yang dang yang du blta byas so/ /dka' thub ldan pa de rnams la/ /bdag gis gus bcas mos dad byas/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba de yis ni/ /bdag gis mi yi srid pa thob/ /

zas don gnyer ba'i slong ba ni/ /rang sangs rgyas shig mthong nas ni/ /gus pa yis ni rtag par de/ /bdag gis zas la spyan drangs so/ /btsun pa de tshim byas nas su/ /de tshe smon lam btab pa ni/ /drang srong 'di

lta bu dag dang / /bdag ni lhan cig 'grogs par shog /rdzogs sangs rgyas ni mnyes byed cing / /bdag gis rab 'byung thob nas ni/ /'jigs shing skrag pa med pa yi/ /zag pa med la gnas par shog /dge ba'i las de byas

pas na/ /lha yi 'jig rten rab tu dga'/ /mi nyid rnyed pa thob nas kyang / /phyug cing nor ni mang bar gyur/ /rdzogs sangs gang zag zla med pa/ /ston pa bdag gis mnyes par byas/ /bdag gis shAkya thub mthong nas/ /khyim

med par ni rab tu byung / /dad pas rab tu byung nas kyang / /bstan la dga' bas gnas byas pas/ /bdag gis dgra bcom thob nas ni/ /mngon shes drug la dbang byas so/ /da dung du yang btsun pa dag /bdag ni thams cad dbang gyur na 'ang / /

phug gi nang du zhugs nas su/ /'chi ba nye bar gyur pa na/ /sbrul gdug shin du mi bzad pa/ /bdag gi lus la 'bab par gyur/ /btsun pa bdag gis nyes spyad pa/ /gang bgyis dran pa 'di lags te/ /las ni chud mi za bas na/ /de yi

'bras bu nyams su myong / /de ltar gnas brtan nye sde yis/ /dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas/ /ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/ /rang gi las ni lung bstan to/ /nye sde'i le'u ste nyi shu brgyad pa'o// // de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas

brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa bzang ldan la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa bzang ldan tshe dang ldan pa nye sdes rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa bzang ldan gyis kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig /de nas tshe

dang ldan pa shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/ dgon pa shin du 'jigs chen gyi/ /mu ge dag ni byung ba na/ /rang gi zas ni don gnyer ba/ /slong ba po ni lnga brgya yi/ /de rnams kun gyi dpon gyur cing / /de dag

kun gyis gtsor bkur te/ /de rnams kun gyis bslangs pa yi/ /zas ni bdag la 'bul bar byed/ /de dag bzang ngam ngan pa'ang rung / /thob pa bdag la 'ged par byed/ /bdag gi tshig gis gnas pas na/ /de dag bdag la brnyas mi byed/ /mi zhig

snum khur zhig khyer nas/ /tshong 'dus nang nas 'gro ba las/ /bdag gis de las mthus phrogs te/ /khyer nas de nas song ba dang / /de nas bdag gis brgyugs pa dang / /phyi bzhin du ni snyegs ma byung / /smyags bcad bros par gyur pa na/ /de dag

gis ni gzung ma nus/ /'bab chu'i pha rol rgal nas ni/ /bdag ni phyogs gcig 'dug nas su/ /'ga' zhig 'ong bar 'gyur snyam nas/ /mtha' dag tu ni lta bar byed/ /snum la g.yos legs byas zin pa'i/ /snum khur bdag gis zos na ni/ /des na

bdag ni lto 'grangs pas/ /nyin zhag gcig ni thub 'gyur snyam/ /de nas skal ldan rang sangs rgyas/ /yang srid skye ba zad gyur pa/ /rdzu 'phrul che gzi mi bzad pa/ /drang srong 'jigs pa zhig 'ongs so/ /bdag gi sems la bsams pa ni/ /sdug bsngal bkren

par gyur pa ni/ /sngon chad bsod nams ma byas pas/ /des bdag 'di ltar bkren par gyur/ /ma la bdag gis dge sbyong 'di/ /snum khur gtsang ma 'di sbyin te/ /bdag ni ltogs par shi bla yi/ /'di lta bkren pa mi rung ngo / /de la bdag sems dad byas nas/ /yid

mgu ba dang rangs pa yis/ /dge slong dam pa mchod 'os pa'i/ /yon gnas de la snum khur phul/ /skal ldan gyis ni de blangs nas/ /bdag nyid la ni snying brtse'i phyir/ /de nyid du ni longs spyad nas/ /de nas mkha' la 'phags par gyur/ /

de nas smon lam btab pa ni/ /bdag ni bkren par mi 'gyur zhing / /kha dog bzang po rnams dang ni/ /rigs btsun pa yang don du gnyer/ /gnas brtan 'di lta bu dag dang / /bdag ni lhan cig 'grogs par shog /khyod nyid kyis

ni gang rtogs pa/ /de 'dra'i chos kyang shes par shog /dge ba'i las de byas pas na/ /bde ba mang po nyams su myong / /bsod nams byas pas mdzes pa yi/ /lha dang mi ni rnams su gyur/ /lha dang mi yi rgyal srid kyang / /

bdag gis mang po nyams su myong / /las de yis ni lan 'ga' yang / /bdag ni ngan 'gror ma song ngo / /de nas las kyi lhag mas ni/ /bdag gi yang srid tha ma 'dir/ /shAkya rnams kyi grong mchog tu/ /rigs btsun par ni bdag skyes

so/ /bdag gi skye ba tha ma ni/ /mi'i srid thob pa 'di yin te/ /yang dag sangs rgyas bla med pa/ /shAkya seng ge 'di mnyes byas/ /gang tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ /nye du'i gnas su gshegs pa na/ /de tshe bdag ni nye du yi/ /mdun du bdar nas

rab tu byung / /bdag gi smon pa gang yin pa/ /de ni bdag gis yongs rdzogs te/ /mya ngan 'das pa bsil gyur pa'i/ /dgra bcom pa yang bdag gis thob/ /rgyal po'i rgyud las rab byung ba/ /sangs rgyas nye du bzang ldan gyis/ /ma dros

pa yi mtsho chan du/ /rang gi las ni lung bstan to/ /shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyi le'u ste nyi shu dgu pa'o// // de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa mdzes bzang la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang

ldan pa mdzes bzang tshe dang ldan pa shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa mdzes bzang gis kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa mdzes bzang gis de'i

tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/ skyob pa log par dad sel gyi/ /mchod rten zhig ni rtsig pa na/ /de tshe bdag ni khar len pa/ /gla mir gyur te de nas ni/ /bdag gis mchod rten rtsig pa la/ /yang dang yang du dpyad pa ni/ /

mchod rten 'di ni che ches pas/ /nam zhig na ni mthar phyin 'gyur/ /mchod rten 'di ni 'phang dma' zhing / /chung ngu zhig tu byas gyur na/ /'god pa chung zhing nyon mongs med/ /myur du mthar yang phyin par

'gyur/ /las kyi rnam smin de dang ni/ /ngag gi nyes par spyad pa des/ /de nas 'chi 'pho'i dus byas te/ /dmyal ba rnams su skyes par gyur/ /dmyal ba nas ni shi 'phos bdag /gang dang gang du skyes par ni/ /kha dog ngan cing bong chung la/ /

bdag ni yongs kyis smad par gyur/ /'od srung gi ni gsung rab tshe/ /sngon ni khu byug phor gyur nas/ /bA rA Na sI'i lam gyi bar/ /tshal stug po yi nang na gnas/ /de na 'jig rten rab gsal mdzad/ /dge slong dge 'dun mdun byas la/ /

bdag gis 'jam dbyangs skad phyung zhing / /nam mkha' las ni der bskor to/ /ji tsam yang dag sangs rgyas ni/ /bsod snyoms don phyir gshegs mthong na/ /'byung ba dang ni gshegs pa la/ /rtag tu yang ni bskor ba byas/ /dge ba'i rtsa

ba de yis ni/ /bdag gis mi yi srid thob nas/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bla med pa/ /ded dpon 'di ni mnyes par byas/ /shAkya seng ge'i bstan pa la/ /bdag gis rab byung thob nas ni/ /mya ngan 'das pa bsil gyur pa'i/ /

dgra bcom pa yang bdag gis thob/ /bdag ni thams cad gzigs pa yis/ /'jam dbyangs rnams kyi mchog dang ni/ /mang du thos dang chos 'dzin dang / /dge ba'i spobs pa can du bstan/ /lha 'am yang na mi yang rung / /

'khor bzhi po dag bdag las ni/ /snyan cing 'jebs pa'i chos thos nas/ /thams cad rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/ /dge ba nyung ngu byas pa dang / /mi dge mang po byas pa yi/ /las rnams chud mi za bas na/ /de yi 'bras
bu nyams su myong / /de ltar gnas brtan mdzes bzang gis/ /dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas/ /ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/ /rang gi las ni lung bstan to/ /mdzes bzang gi le'u ste sum bcu pa'o// //

sdom ni/ lam phran sprul khol ma 'gags dang / /nag po lnga pa sgra gcan dang / /dga' bo nor dang nye sde dang / /bzang ldan dang ni mdzes bzang ngo / /de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa gnas

'jog sbrang rtsi can la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa gnas 'jog sbrang rtsi can tshe dang ldan pa mdzes bzang gis rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa gnas 'jog sbrang rtsi can gyis kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba

lung ston cig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa gnas 'jog sbrang rtsi can gyis de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/ bdag ni sngon ni yangs pa yi/ spra chen spre'u dbang gyur pa na/ /lhung bzed mang po mthong nas ni/ /

rgyal ba'i lhung bzed blangs pa las/ /dge slong rnams kyis bdag bkag nas/ /de nas bcom ldan bka' stsal pa/ /'di ni lhung bzed mi gcog gis/ /dge slong rnams kyis ma dgag zhig /ston pa'i lhung bzed khyer nas ni/ /shing

gi khar ni 'dzegs nas su/ /sbrang rtsis yongs su bkang nas kyang / /dal bus rim gyis babs nas ni/ /lhung bzed sbrang rtsi can thogs te/ /ston pa la ni phul ba las/ /ston pa srog chags bcas par ni/ /mkhyen

te bdag las ma bzhes nas/ /bdag gis phyogs gcig song nas ni/ /de la srog chags yod mthong nas/ /srog chags med par gtsang byas te/ /ston pa la ni phul ba dang / /'on kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis ni/ /bdag

las sbrang rtsi ma bzhes par/ /ma brtags thugs su chud nas ni/ /bde bar gshegs pas ma bzhes snyam/ /de nas lhung bzed sbrang rtsi can/ /de tshe bdag gis chus btab nas/ /sems ni mgu dang dga' ba yis/ /rdzogs

sangs rgyas la phul ba las/ /de nas gang zag zla med pa/ /ston pa'i phyag 'jam gnyis kyis su/ /bdag la lhung bzed bzhes nas ni/ /de ni nyan thos rnams la gtad/ /bdag ni rab tu dga' gyur nas/ /thal mo legs par sbyar byas te/ /

de nas chos rgyal spyan snga nas/ /gar byed cing ni de nas song / /de nas smon lam btab pa ni/ /mi nyid dag ni thob nas su/ /ston pa 'di la brten nas ni/ /byang chub dam pa 'di reg shog /dge ba'i rtsa ba des na bdag /mi yi srid pa thob nas ni/ /

rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bla med pa/ /ded dpon 'di ni mnyes par byas/ /shAkya seng ge'i bstan pa la/ /bdag gis byang chub thob nas kyang / /mya ngan 'das pa bsil gyur pa'i/ /dgra bcom pa yang bdag gis thob/ /bdag ni dgra bcom dbang

gyur cing / /mngon shes drug ldan rdzu 'phrul che/ /dge slong rnams kyis bdag la ni/ /gnas 'jog sbrang rtsi can du shes/ /bsod nams byas pas grags ldan pa/ /bdag ni rtag tu bkur zhing mchod/ /dge slong dge 'dun yongs bskor nas/ /

bdag ni rgyu zhing song ba na/ /de nas dgon pa'i lam du ni/ /dge slong dge 'dun skom gyur nas/ /de na sems la smon pa ni/ /de ring sbrang rtsi rnyed gyur cig /de nas mi ma yin rnams kyis/ /bdag smon shes te phyogs bzhi nas/ /sbrang rtsi khur

gyis blangs nas ni/ /de dag tu ni 'bul bar byed/ /bdag gis sbrang rtsi ci dgos pa/ /bzang po dag las blangs nas ni/ /dge slong dge 'dun tshim byas te/ /de nas lhag par legs par gyur/ /'das ma thag pa'i skye ba la/ /spre'u yi rgyal

po de byas pas/ /log par ltung nas bdag 'phos nas/ /'chi med go 'phang reg gyur te/ /ji skad bdag gis smon pa yi/ /thams cad 'byor pa nyid du gyur/ /ston pa bkur sti byas pas 'dir/ /rang gi don ni yongs su rdzogs/ /btsun pa

bdag gis dge ba gang / /bgyis pa dran pa 'di lags te/ /de yi 'bras bu sdug pa dang / /bde 'byung 'dod pa nyams su myong / /de ltar gnas 'jog sbrang rtsi can/ /dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas/ /ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/ /
rang gi las ni lung bstan to/ /gnas 'jog sbrang rtsi can gyi le'u ste sum bcu rtsa gcig pa'o// //'dul ba gzhi/ / bam po lnga bcu rtsa bzhi pa/ de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams

kyis tshe dang ldan pa rgyu can la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa rgyu can tshe dang ldan pa gnas 'jog sbrang rtsi can gyis rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/ /tshe dang ldan pa rgyu can gyis kyang da rang gi las kyi

rgyu ba lung ston cig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rgyu can gyis de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/ bshes ldan grong du bdag gis sngon/ /bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig na/ /sangs rgyas rnam par

gzigs pa ni/ /grong khyer dam par 'jug pa mthong / /thugs rje che ldan mthong nas ni/ /me tog sil mas gtor nas der/ /me tog rtsa bas yar brteg cing / /gyen du kha bltas khang bzangs gnas/ /de nas bdag ni rab dga' bas/ /

thub pa'i zhabs la mgos gtugs nas/ /thal mo legs par sbyar nas ni/ /de la bskor ba byas par gyur/ /bdag gis chos ni ma thos shing / /bdag ni skyabs su ma song bar/ /sems dad nyid cig byas nas ni/ /bde gshegs drung nas

bdag song ngo / /mthu chen rnam par gzigs pa la/ /dge ba'i las de byas pas na/ /bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig tu/ /ngan 'gro mngon par mi shes so/ /bdag ni lha lus rab dga' zhing / /lha yi 'dod pa yang dag 'byor/ /mi nyid

rnyed pa thob nas kyang / /bdag ni nor chen phyug por gyur/ /bdag gi skye ba tha ma ni/ /mi'i srid thob pa 'di yin te/ /nor che longs spyod che ba yi/ /bram ze rnams kyi rigs su gyur/ /sgra nges sbyor dang shes gsal bcas/ /skyes bu chen po

mtshan dang ni/ /tshig gi don bcas ston pa yis/ /gsang tshig rnams kyi pha rol phyin/ /bram ze lnga brgya rnams la ni/ /tshal du gsang tshig brjod pa'i phyir/ /bram ze rnams kyis yongs bskor nas/ /bdag ni khyim nas byung ba las/ /bdag

gis rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni/ /dge slong dge 'dun mdun bdar nas/ /dpa' bo chen po ma ga d+ha'i/ /grong mchog tu ni 'jug pa mthong / /bdag gis thugs rje ldan mthong nas/ /yid dga' bar ni gyur pa dang / /sngon gyi rgyu ni de dag gis/ /

mtshan rnams la ni brtags pa las/ /'jig rten mgon po'i mtshan rnams ni/ /sum bcu rtsa gnyis yongs rdzogs shing / /dpe byad rnams kyis mdzes pa yi/ /grags par ldan pa mthong bar gyur/ /mtshan dang ldan pa de mthong

nas/ /mgo bo yis ni phyag byas te/ /phyogs gcig 'dug nas gus pas ni/ /'dren pa de la mngon bstod pa/ /ji ltar gsang tshigs la gda' ba/ /khyod la de bzhin de gda' bas/ /khyod sangs rgyas par the tshom med/ /

'jig rten gyi ni ston pa mchog /khyod ni tshangs pa brgya byin khyod/ /khyod las lhag pa ma mchis te/ /khyod ni nyi ma khyab 'jug lags/ /khyod ni 'jig rten bla na med/ /rgyal ba khyod 'dra 'ang ma mthong na/ /lhag pa lta zhig ga la zhig /lha dang

bcas pa'i 'jig rten na/ /khyod ni rgyal ba bdud zil non/ /khyod ni mgon med rnams kyi gnas/ /rten med rnams kyi skyabs kyang lags/ /khyod kyi nyan thos nyid du mchis/ /khyod ni bdag gi skyabs mdzod cig /de nas gser gyi

mchod sdong lta'i/ /phyag ni de yis brkyang mdzad de/ /rgyal ba'i phyag ni smad mdzad nas/ /bdag gi mgo la kun du byugs/ /yid ni rab tu dang byas pas/ /khyod kyis bsod nams mang po bskyed/ /sems ni rab tu dang rnams

kyi/ /yon chung bar ni mi 'gyur ro/ /yon gnas bla na med pa yi/ /sangs rgyas la ni khyod kyis bsten/ /bram ze khye'u yis mchod sbyin byas/ /zhing rab la ni sa bon btab/ /ngan song gi ni lam bcad pas/ /

khyod la ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pa med/ /bram ze khye'u yis bdud rtsi yis/ /sgo phye bar ni dogs med byos/ /khyod ni rab tu 'byung 'dod na/ /ral pa kun ni myur spongs te/ /nga yi spyan sngar rab byung la/ /bram ze

tha ba med par gyis/ /bdag ni chos nyid la dga' nas/ /de na slob ma'i tshogs smra ba/ /khyod ni bram zer gyur zin na/ /ji ltar dge sbyong mgo reg 'gyur/ /dkar po'i rigs 'di spangs nas ni/ /nag po'i rigs 'di

khas len nam/ /'jig rten na ni bram ze gtso/ /pha rol phyin cing tshangs pa yi/ /snying dang kha nas skyes pa yin/ /bram ze tshangs pas sprul pa yin/ /khyed cag kun ni mi mkhas pa/ /khyed cag kun ni mi shes pa/ /'di na bdag ci gsang tshig gi/ /de nyid rig cing pha rol phyin/ /

bdag ni shes rab mtha' yas kyis/ /gsungs pa ji ltar shes pa bzhin/ /de bzhin du ni bdag byed kyis/ /gang dag der 'gro mi 'dod pa/ /ci sems ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin/ /gar dga' der ni 'deng la rag /bdag ni gsang tshig don mi gnyer/ /ltos par yang ni mi byed do/ /de nas bdag gi slob ma'i

tshogs/ /mchi mas brnangs shing ngu bzhin gyis/ /snying ni rje rje skad smras nas/ /de nas de rnams phyogs phyogs dong / /de nas thugs rje che ldan pa'i/ /thub pas bdag la gsungs pa ni/ /dge slong tshur shog

bka' stsal pas/ /bdag ni bsnyen par rdzogs par gyur/ /khyim rnams nas ni khyim med par/ /yang dag dad pas rab tu byung / /sangs rgyas bstan pa chub byas nas/ /mngon par shes kun reg gyur te/ /sngon gyi gnas ni

rjes su dran/ /lha yi mig ni rnam par dag /bdag sngon gang na 'dug pa yi/ /'chi 'pho skye ba shes par gyur/ /zag pa zad pa thob pas na/ /bdag gis rdzu 'phrul mngon du byas/ /de ltar gnas brtan rgyu can gyis/ /dge slong dge 'dun

mdun 'dug nas/ /ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/ /rang gi las ni lung bstan to/ /gnas brtan rgyu can gyi le'u ste sum bcu rtsa gnyis pa'o// // de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa kauN+Di n+ya la

'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa kauN+Di n+ya tshe dang ldan pa rgyu can gyis rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kauN+Di n+yas kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kauN+Di n+yas de'i tshe rang gi las

kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/ sngon ni thub chen 'od srung gi/ /dam pa'i chos ni nub pa na/ /nyan thos thams cad 'dus nas su/ /phan tshun dag tu smras pa ni/ /ston pa thugs rje 'od srung ni/ /mya ngan 'das pas nges par yang / /

rab tu byung ba srab gyur cing / /dam chos kyang ni ston mi 'gyur/ /bdag cag ji skad thos pa'i chos/ /phan tshun yang dag gsal byas nas/ /sangs rgyas bstan las spro ba dang / /brtson 'grus brtsam pas gnas par bya/ /de dag

ri la 'dzegs nas ni/ /zag pa zad pa ma thob par/ /re shig 'di nas mi ldang zhes/ /rtswa yi gding ba dag la 'khod/ /srog la yang ni mi lta bar/ /brtson 'grus brtsams te gnas pa na/ /bdun gyis mngon par shes la reg /dge slong dag

ni mya ngan 'das/ /de yi bdun pa bdag yin te/ /dbang po brtul zhing bsod nams chung / /snyoms med sbyor la brtson pa yi/ /so so'i skye bo 'chi dus byas/ /bdag gis brtson 'grus ma btang zhing / /de bzhin rab tu brtson gnas pas/ /

dga' ldan rnams dang skal mnyam pa'i/ /lha yi 'jig rten rnams su skyes/ /de na shAkya seng ge yi/ /thub chen byang chub sems dpa' mthong / /thub pa lha yi tshogs la ni/ /skyo bar 'gyur ba'i chos ston mdzad/ /bdag gis de yi

chos bshad pa/ /thos nas rtse gcig yid gyur te/ /dam chos yid la byed pa ni/ /lan 'ga'ang rnam par ma spangs so/ /lha yi 'jig rten bdag son nas/ /grong khyer ser skya zhes bya ba'i/ /kauN+Di n+ya rus bram ze yi/ /rigs can du ni

skyes par gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa'i grags chen ldan/ /zas gtsang sras por gyur nas ni/ /dad pas byung nas dka' spyod pa/ /spyad par gyur pa de yi tshe/ /rgyal po'i mchog ni zas gtsang gis/ /bdag bkug nas kyang

smras pa ni/ /rab tu 'byung bar 'dod par gyis/ /der ni de yi nad g.yog byos/ /de tshe bdag gis yid dad pas/ /byang chub sems dpa'i rim gro byas/ /lam 'di'i rnam dag 'gyur min zhes/ /yid byung nas ni gshegs par

gyur/ /gang tshe shAkya thub pas ni/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba na/ /kun gyi thog mar bdag gis ni/ /de yi dam chos rtogs par gyur/ /'od srung gi ni gsung rab la/ /tshangs par spyod la bdag gis gnas/ /sangs rgyas bdag gis

mnyes byas shing / /zag pa zad pa thob par gyur/ /de ltar gnas brtan kauN+Di n+yas/ /dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas/ /ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/ /rang gi las ni lung bstan to/ /kauN+Di n+ya'i le'u ste sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'o// //

de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor tshe dang ldan pa kauN+Di n+yas rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/ /tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis kyang da rang gi las kyi

rgyu ba lung ston cig /tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis kyang de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/ bdag ni sngon gyi tshe rabs na/ /bA rA Na sI'i rgyal khab tu/ /rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba'i/ /'dreg mkhan du ni gyur

pa na/ /de yi skra dang kha spu rnams/ /'dreg cing 'chos par byed pa na/ /de nas mngon par rangs gyur nas/ /bgo ba dag ni bdag la byin/ /gus dang bcas pa'i sdug sems kyis/ /rgyal po'i rim gro byed pa na/ /mnyes nas de nas de la ni/ /

ma thos pa yi tshigs bcad bsgrags/ /'dod pa rnams ni mnog chung zhing / /sdig pa'i rtsa dang mya ngan rtsa/ /rnam par smin pa rtsub pa yin/ /bram ze'i khye'u ni gang zhig gis/ /'dod pa'i yon tan spangs nas ni/ /rab byung thob pa

legs thob yin/ /ma thos tshigs bcad des thos nas/ /de nas skyo bar gyur pa dang / /rgyal po bdag ni gnang bar mdzod/ /khyim ma mchis par rab 'byung ngo / /de nas rgyal pos bdag la smras/ /gal te rab tu byung nas kyang / /phyir kyang

bdag la lta ba yi/ /khas blang ba ni bya ba'i rigs/ /rgyal dbang khyod la bdag gis ni/ /de bzhin bgyi bar dam bca' yis/ /bdag rab byung nas slar yang ni/ /lta bar bdag la thugs ches mdzod/ /de nas rgyal pos gnang

nas ni/ /bdag gis dgon pa'i nags song nas/ /gzhung can drung du nyer song ste/ /khyim med par ni rab tu byung / /ji ltar rigs par rab byung nas/ /tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi po yi/ /tshad med pa la rab bsgoms pas/ /

bdag gis 'dod chags bral ba thob/ /rgyal po de yi tshe la ni/ /de tshe bdag ming gang gA skyong / /'byor pa che zhing mthu yang che/ /skye bo'i tshogs kyis mchod par gyur/ /gzhung can drung du song nas ni/ /mgo bo yis ni phyag

byas te/ /bdag gis phyogs gcig 'dug nas ni/ /'di skad kyi ni tshig smras so/ /slob dpon bdag gi tshig gson cig /mi yi dbang po tshangs byin la/ /slar yang lta bar bgyi ba yi/ /dam bcas pa ni chung zhig mchis/ /

gnang bar bya'o bram ze khyod/ /bA rA Na sI'i grong khyer song / /khyod ni brdzun du mi 'gyur bar/ /dam bcas pa yi mthar phyung shig /gnang bar bya yis khyod song la/ /kho bo yi ni tshig bzhin gyis/ /'di nas song la mi dbang po/ /tshangs

sbyin dad pa skyed par gyis/ /gzhung can gyis ni bdag gnang nas/ /drang srong bskor ba byas nas ni/ /bA rA Na sI'i grong khyer du/ /rim bzhin du ni song ba las/ /de bzhin der ni bdag 'ongs zhes/ /tshangs sbyin nyid kyis

thos nas ni/ /rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen pos ni/ /bdag gi drung du nye bar 'ongs/ /shing rta las babs bdag gi ni/ /rkang pa gnyis la phyag byas nas/ /phyogs gcig tu ni 'dug par gyur/ /'dod pa rnams las rgal 'gyur

ba'i/ /de la chos ni bshad pa dang / /rgyal pos thos nas yid dga' bas/ /'dod pa don du mi gnyer gyur/ /rgya che'i sems dang yid dga' bas/ /tshangs sbyin gyis ni 'di skad smras/ /bdag 'dod don du gnyer min pas/ /

bdag kyang rab tu 'byung bar bya/ /rgyal po tshur spyon dgon pa'i nags/ /dben pa dag tu bzhud par bgyi/ /bram ze drang srong gzhung can gyi/ /drung du nye bar bzhud par mdzod/ /rgyal po des ni bu thu bo/ /'jigs med rgyal srid

la bzhag ste/ /rgyal mchog rgyal srid spangs nas ni/ /khyim med par yang rab tu byung / /nang mi dang ni blon chen dang / /grong khyer pa ni thams cad dang / /gnyen gyi tshogs kyis yongs bskor nas/ /rab tu 'byung phyir mngon

du byung / /gzhung can drung du song nas ni/ /mgo bos phyag ni byas nas kyang / /rgyal pos thal mo sbyar nas ni/ /rab tu 'byung bar gsol ba btab/ /stong phrag dag ni du ma dang / /khyim med par ni rab byung ste/ /

skra dang kha spu bregs nas kyang / /ngur smrig gos ni bgos par gyur/ /gzhung can shin tu mnyam bzhag pas/ /tshangs pa'i 'jig rten skye 'gyur ba'i/ /tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi po yi/ /chos ni kun la bshad par byas/ /gus dang bcas pa'i byams

sems kyis/ /rgyal po de yi rim gro byas/ /de nas 'chi 'pho'i dus byas te/ /'od gsal rnams su song bar gyur/ /'od gsal nas ni shi 'phos nas/ /slar yang 'dir ni 'ongs pa na/ /gang dang gang du skyes par ni/ /nor che

ba dang phyug por gyur/ /lha rnams dang ni mi rnams kyi/ /bde ba mang po nyams su myong / /dus kyi tha ma 'di la ni/ /bdag gi lus kyi tha ma la/ /shAkya rnams kyi yul du ni/ /grong khyer ser skya zhes byar skyes/ /spyod yul spyod pa phun tshogs pa'i/ /

shAkya rnams kyi 'dreg mkhan gyur/ /shAka sras thugs brtse'i bdag nyid can/ /nyan thos bcas la rim gro byas/ /rgyal po chen po'i 'byor pas ni/ /rab tu 'byung bar mngon 'byung ba/ /de rnams bdag gis skra bregs nas/ /'di skad

kyi ni tshig smras so/ /dpon po 'tsho ba ma stsal na/ /bdag ni ji ltar 'tsho bar 'gyur/ /de yi rgyan ni gang yin dang / /gos rnams gyon pa gang yin pa/ /'di ni khyod kyi 'tsho ba'o zhes/ /des ni kun dga' bdag la byin/ /rin chen mang po

brtags nas ni/ /de la bdag ni skyo gyur nas/ /'di dag thams cad spangs nas ni/ /bdag ni rab 'byung gsol ba bya/ /bkren pa bdag la 'di lta bu'i/ /rin chen rnams kyis ci zhig bya/ /gzhan 'ga' zhig gis thos na

ni/ /srog la gdon lto za bar 'gyur/ /bdag gis nyid kyi snod spyad na/ /gang yin shing la btags nas su/ /bor nas bdag ni khyim dag nas/ /byung ste nges par 'byung bar bya/ /bdag ni rin chen don gnyer min/ /bdag kyang

rab tu 'byung bar bya/ /bdag gi tshig de shAkya yi/ /rgyal pos thos nas 'di skad smras/ /khyod ni thog mar rab byung dang / /rgan pa nyid du khyod 'gyur ro/ /rjes su thugs brtser dgongs nas ni/ /bdag la dge slong tshur shog gsungs/ /bdag

ni thog mar rab tu byung / /de nas rgyal rigs rab byung nas/ /bdag gi rkang la phyag byas pas/ /shAkya de rnams nga rgyal bor/ /de ltar bdag ni rab byung bas/ /mngon par shes pa drug reg nas/ /dgra bcom mngon shes drug ldan zhing / /bdag ni 'dul ba'i pha

rol phyin/ /ston pa nyid kyis 'dul ba 'dzin/ /rnams kyi mchog tu bsngags pa ste/ /ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/ /nye ba 'khor gyis las lung bstan/ /nye ba 'khor gyi le'u ste sum bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o// // de nas 'jig rten mgon pos ni/ /

gnas brtan 'od byed la gsungs pa/ /khyod kyis sngon byas gang yin pa'i/ /rang gi las ni lung ston cig /rgyal ba'i gsung dbyangs thos nas ni/ /sngon chad bdag gis gang bgyis pa'i/ /rang gi las ni dran pa gang / /de ni thub pa'i spyan

sngar gsol/ /'jig rten gtso bo skyob pa po/ /sangs rgyas pad ma bla ma yi/ /mchod rten tshal stug bzhugs pa ni/ /ri dgas gdug pa rnams kyis bsten/ /mchod rten de la phyag bgyid pa/ /rngo thog pa ni 'ga' ma mchis/ /mi de

rnams ni bsod nams dang / /sdig pa rab tu ma 'tshal to/ /bdag gis song nas shing rnams dang / /rtswa rnams bsal ba bgyis nas ni/ /phyags ma dag ni blangs nas kyang / /de nas thams cad phyag dar bgyis/ /bskor ba brgyad dang

phyag bgyis te/ /mchod pa bgyis nas slar log lags/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba des na bdag /lha rnams su ni skyes pa na/ /'dod pa thams cad 'byor gyur cing / /sum bcu rtsa gsum rnams su dga'/ /lha yul lha yi rgyal srid ni/ /

sum bcu rtsa drug bar du bgyis/ /de na bdag gi gnas mchis pa/ /gser gyi 'od ni shin tu gsal/ /rgyar ni dpag tshad sum bcu drug /khor yug dpag tshad drug bcu tham/ /rgyal ba'i mchod rten de phyags nas/ /ngo mtshar

byung ba gzhan yang ni/ /mi yi nang du mi dbang ni/ /lan bdun bar du bgyis par gyur/ /rgyal ba'i mchod rten de phyags nas/ /ngo mtshar byung ba gzhan yang ni/ /bdag gi lus kyi gzi brjid ni/ /gser gyi kha dog lta bur gyur/ /rgyal

ba'i mchod rten de phyags nas/ /ngo mtshar byung ba gzhan yang ni/ /bram ze dang ni rgyal rigs dang / /rigs gnyis su ni bdag skyes lags/ /rgyal ba'i mchod rten phyags nas ni/ /bdag la ngo mtshar gzhan byung ba/ /khyogs dang glang chen

stong dang ni/ /bzhon pa mchog ni rnams kyis mchi/ /rgyal ba'i mchod rten phyags nas ni/ /bdag la ngo mtshar gzhan byung ba/ /bdag gi mdun na sdong dum dang / /tsher ma gyo mo rang nyid sel/ /rgyal ba'i mchod rten de phyags nas/ /

ngo mtshar byung ba gzhan yang ni/ /skad cig tsam yang bdag gis su/ /bro 'tshal bar ni mi dran lags/ /rgyal ba'i mchod rten phyags nas ni/ /bdag la ngo mtshar gzhan byung ba/ /gang dang gang du bdag mchi bar/ /kun du bkra shis

phun sum tshogs/ /rgyal ba'i mchod rten de phyags nas/ /ngo mtshar byung ba gzhan yang ni/ /rtag tu bkur zhing mchod pas na/ /lha yi spyod pa lta bu mchi/ /skyob pa'i mchod rten phyags nas ni/ /ngo mtshar byung ba gzhan yang ni/ /

bdag gis lus la lan 'ga' yang / /gnod pa byung bar mi dran lags/ /de ltar sangs rgyas sangs rgyas chos/ /dri ma med pa bsam mi khyab/ /bsam mi khyab la mngon dad pa'i/ /rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu che/ /de bas rga shi zad pa dang / /

phun sum 'byor pa 'dod pas ni/ /rgyal ba yi ni mchod rten la/ /mchod pa bla na med pa gyis/ /btsun pa bdag gis dge ba gang / /bgyis pa dran pa 'di lags te/ /de yi 'bras bu yid 'ong zhing / /bde 'byung 'dod pa nyams su myong / /

de ltar dge slong 'od byed kyis/ /dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas/ /ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/ /rang gi las ni lung bstan to/ /'od byed kyi le'u ste sum bcu rtsa lnga pa'o// // de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan

rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa nam gru la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa nam gru tshe dang ldan pa 'od byed kyis rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa nam grus kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa

nam grus de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/ /'di nas bskal pa bye ba'i sngon/ /sangs rgyas kun zil gnon de la/ /bdag gis dge ba gang bgyis pa/ /btsun pa bdag gis dran lags te/ /brgya stong phrag ni du ma yi/ /nyan thos

rnams kyis mdun bdar nas/ /rgyal po'i pho brang dpe med du/ /skyes bu dam pa gshegs pa na/ /bdag kyang dgos pa zhig gi phyir/ /grong khyer gzhan nas der phyin nas/ /de na rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni/ /mtshan mchog sum bcu rtsa gnyis

ldan/ /me dang nor bu glog 'od dang / /nyi ma zla ba'i 'od 'dra mthong / /'od kun zil gyis mnan nas ni/ /sangs rgyas gzi brjid khyad par 'phags/ /gzi brjid me phung lta bu ste/ /sngon ma mthong ba mthong nas ni/ /bdag gi mdun na 'dug pa

yi/ /bram ze zhig la dris pa dang / /dris pas bdag la 'di skad smras/ /'di ni sangs rgyas rnam 'dren pa/ /lha dang mi mchog rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /zla med pa yi gang zag yin/ /bdag gis sangs rgyas sgra thos nas/ /de tshe bdag ni rab

dgar gyur/ /dga' zhing mgu ba skyes pas na/ /lus ni thams cad bde bar gyur/ /mi ma yin rnams lha yul gyi/ /rol mo'i sgra rnams 'byin pa thos/ /lha yi tsan dan phye ma yang / /grong khyer dam pa de ru bab/ /kha cig ut+pal

tsam pa gzhan/ /de bzhin pa ri sha ka dang / /gzhan dag tsan dan phye ma 'thor/ /bdag ni thal mo sbyar byas nas/ /yid ni mgu zhing rangs pa yis/ /nam mkha' la ni 'phags te gnas/ /dga' dang rab tu dga' ba yis/ /

lus kun tu ni khyab par gyur/ /dri dang phreng ba la sogs phyir/ /mtha' dag tu ni brgyugs pa las/ /de yi tshe na bskor kyang ni/ /me tog gcig kyang ma rnyed do/ /de tshe de na bdag gis ni/ /ha cang ring ba ma yin par/ /gdugs byed pa

yi tshong khang na/ /dung ltar dkar ba'i gdugs shig mthong / /gdugs phyir bdag gis de la ni/ /gsol btab nas ni gdugs blangs te/ /sems ni rab tu dang ba yis/ /sangs rgyas la ni gdugs bzung ngo / /bdag gi lag nas

gdugs shor ba/ /bar snang dag la mngon 'phags nas/ /ston pa gshegs na gdugs 'gro zhing / /bzhugs pa na yang sdod par gyur/ /nam mkha'i ngos la sprin lta bur/ /sangs rgyas la ni grib ma byed/ /thub pa'i sku ni mi 'dor bar/ /bar snang la ni 'dug

par gyur/ /de nas bdag dang skye bo gzhan/ /cho 'phrul rnams la brtags nas ni/ /thal mo legs par sbyar byas te/ /de bzhin gshegs la mgos phyag byas/ /de nas rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / /nyan thos mtshan

ma bzung nas ni/ /rjes su dran pas yid dga' zhing / /khyim gyi las kyi mtha' byas so/ /kye ma'o thob pa legs thob ste/ /sangs rgyas mthong nas dran pa rnyed/ /yon tan bla na med pa ni/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas la bdag gis phul/ /yon gnas

bla na med pa la/ /bdag gis gdugs phul gang yin pa'i/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba des na bdag /rin chen bdun dang ldan par gyur/ /de nas sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i/ /lha yi nang du bdag skyes te/ /lha yi rgyal por bdag gyur nas/ /lha ni bye ba rnams

kyis mchod/ /slar yang mir ni 'ongs pa na/ /stobs kyis sgyur ba'i rgyal gyur cing / /nor chen brtson 'grus che ba ste/ /rgyal po rnams kyis mdun gyis bltas/ /bdag gis las 'di byas pas ni/ /yang dang yang du 'khor ba na'ang / /

bdag byed pa yi las de ni/ /lan 'ga'ang bar ni ma bcad do/ /de lta bu yi yon gnas la/ /bdag gis dad pas phul ba yi/ /dge ba'i las de byas pas na/ /ngan 'gror song ba mi dran no/ /bdag gi skye ba tha ma ni/ /mi srid thob pa

'di yin te/ /yang dag sangs rgyas bla med pa/ /ded dpon 'di ni mnyes par byas/ /shAkya seng ge'i bstan pa la/ /bdag gis rab byung thob nas ni/ /mya ngan 'das pa bsil gyur pa'i/ /dgra bcom pa yang bdag gis thob/ /

bdud kyis lus ni lus chen po/ /ri bo lta bu dpag tshad tsam/ /nam mkha' la ni sprin lta bur/ /mdog mi sdug pa sprul pa dang / /de nas bdag ni g.yeng byed pa/ /'di ko su zhig snyam pa las/ /'di ni tho 'tsham byed pa yi/ /

bdud yin par ni myur du shes/ /sdig can khyod 'dir ci dgar zad/ /lus ni khor yug gcig lta bu/ /mgo yang lhun po lta bur ni/ /byas te 'dir ni 'ong la rag /bdag ni dgra bcom dbang gyur pa/ /rig gsum ldan pa'i dge sbyong ste/ /

sangs rgyas kyis gsungs gang yin pa'i/ /bde bar gnas pa rnams kyang thob/ /bsod snyoms byas pa lan cig gis/ /zhag bdun du yang 'dug nas ni/ /rnam par grol ba'i dga' myong ba/ /de lta bu dag bdag gis bsgoms/ /

btsun pa bdag gis dge ba ni/ /gang bgyis dran pa 'di lags te/ /de yi 'bras bu yid 'ong zhing / /bde 'byung 'dod pa nyams su myong / /de ltar nam gru blo ldan gyis/ /dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas/ /ma dros pa yi mtsho

chen du/ /rang gi las ni lung bstan to/ /nam gru'i le'u ste sum bcu rtsa drug pa'o// // de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis rang rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin nas/ bcom ldan 'das

la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bdag cag gis rang rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan lags kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de nyid kyi phrin las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan pa'i rigs lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das

kyis phrin las ci zhig mdzad na/ des na byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas na yang gor ma'i dum bus zhabs kyi mthe bo rma byung bar gyur lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs

pa nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan rnams su las rnams byas shing bsags pa tshogs rnyed pa zhes bya ba nas/ 'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba ri 'or zhig

na khyim bdag gcig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/ de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed ces bya ba nas/ /khye'u zhig btsas nas bskyed bsrings te chen

por gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/ /de'i ma shi nas de nas khyim bdag des chung ma gzhan zhig blangs te/ de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed ces bya ba nas de las kyang khye'u zhig btsas so zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /de nas khyim

bdag des khye'u phu bo shos chung ma blangs nas de rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las khye'u dang bu mo mang du btsas so/ /ji tsam dus phyi zhig na khyim bdag dang chung ma dang bcas te shi nas bu de phu bo nyid

kyi drung du song ba dang / chung mas smras pa/ rje'i sras khye'u 'di khyod kyi cir mchi lags/ /des smras pa/ spun du 'ong ngo / /rje'i sras ci 'di yang khyim gyi bgo skal dbang ngam/ 'di la yang phyed la bdag cag la yang phyed

yin no/ /rje'i sras 'di ni mi gcig pa lags na/ ji ltar 'di la yang phyed la bdag cag mang po la yang phyed lags/ bzang mo 'di ni 'jig rten gyi chos yin no/ /rje'i sras gal te de lta na 'di khum shig /bzang mo

nor gyi phyir nu bo bsad du ga la rung / des de la yang dang yang du smras pa dang 'dod pa la bstan pas ni sdig pa'i las mi bya ba ci yang med pas des khas blangs so/ /des bsams pa/ gal te grong du bsad na ni skye bo mang pos tshor bar 'gyur

gyis/ dgon par bsad par bya'o snyam nas des de bos te smras pa/ nu bo me tog dang yam sreg shing gi phyir dgon par 'dong ngo / /de de dang lhan cig dgon par dong ba las de nas des ri phug tu rdos bsnun te bsad do/ /dge slong dag

ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na gang gis khyim bdag gi bu yis khyim gyi nu bo de dgon par rdos gsod pa de ni nga nyid yin te/ nga yis khyim gyi nu bo nor gyi phyir dgon par rdos bsnun te bsad pa gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam

par smin pas nga lo mang po dang / lo brgya phrag mang po dang / lo stong phrag mang po dang / lo brgya stong phrag mang por sems can dmyal ba rnams su btsos so/ /las de kho na'i lhag mas de bzhin gshegs pa nga mngon

par rdzogs par byang chub na yang zhabs kyi mthe bo rdo'i dum bus rma byung bar gyur to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis/ phrin las ci zhig mdzad na phrin las de'i rnam par smin pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la seng

ldeng gi tshal pa zug par gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan rnams su las rnams byas shing bsags pa tshogs rnyed pa zhes bya ba nas/

'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba gnas shig na ded dpon gnyis shig gnas pa las/ de gnyis kyis gru bo che legs par bsgrubs nas nor bsgrub pa'i phyir rgya mtsho

chen por zhugs pa dang rjes su 'thun pa'i rlung gis rin po che'i gling du phyin to/ /de na gcig gis ni bag yod par rin po che rnams kyis gru bkang ngo / /gcig shos kyis ni bag med par ro/ /de gnyis chas pa las ji tsam na

de'i gru bag med par bkang ba de bying bar gyur to/ /gru bying ba des smras pa/ bdag 'o nir chug shig /des de srang la bcal te rin po che las bor nas gru bo cher bcug go/ /de der zhugs nas bsams pa/ 'di ni don

grub pas 'gro la bdag ni don med pa 'di lta mi srid kyis 'di'i gru dbug par bya'o snyam nas/ des dben par dal bus dbug par brtsams pa las ded dpon des rig nas smras pa/ ded dpon gru ma dbug zhig /thams cad tshul

ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur ta re/ phrag dog la mngon par zhen pa'i blo can de slar bzlog kyang ma btub nas/ de nas des mdung thung gis bsad do/ /dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na ded

dpon gang gis ded dpon gsod pa de ni nga nyid yin te/ ngas ded dpon mdung thung gis bsad pa gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas nga lo mang po dang / lo brgya phrag mang po dang / lo stong phrag mang po dang / lo brgya

stong phrag mang por sems can dmyal ba rnams su btsos so/ /las de'i lhag ma kho nas de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par rdzogs par byang chub na yang zhabs la seng lding gi tshal pas zug par gyur to/ /btsun pa bcom
ldan 'das kyis phrin las ci zhig mdzad na phrin las de'i rnam par smin pas yul sa lar ji ltar lhung bzed bkrus pas zhugs pa'i lhung bzed bkrus pa de kho na bzhin du phyir gshegs te bsod snyoms gcig

kyang ma brnyes par gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan rnams su las rnams byas shing bsags pa tshogs rnyed pa zhes bya ba nas

'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba bA rA Na sI'i grong khyer na bram ze'i khye'u zhig gnas so/ /sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ba med pa na 'jig rten du rang sangs rgyas
dman pa dang / ngan pa la snying brtse ba can/ bas mtha'i gnas mal la dga' ba/ 'jig rten gyi yon gnas gcig pu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i tshe rang sangs rgyas nyon mongs 'joms zhes bya ba 'jig

rten du byung nas/ de bA rA Na sI'i grong khyer na drang srong smra ba ri dgas kyi nags na nye bar rten cing gnas so/ /de snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te bA rA Na sIr bsod snyoms la zhugs so/ /

bram ze'i khye'u zhig kyang zas kyi phyir bsod snyoms la khyim zhig tu zhugs pa las des zas ma thob nas de phyir byung ngo / /rang sangs rgyas nyon mongs med kyis khyim der bsod snyoms la zhugs so/ /bram ze'i khye'u des de

zhugs pa mthong nas des bsams pa/ rab tu byung ba de ci dag byed pa blta'o snyam nas de slar log ste de'i phyi bzhin du 'brang zhing sgo phag tu bsdad pa las/ ji tsam na khyim bdag gi chung mas rang sangs rgyas de lus

mdzes shing sems dang ba mthong nas/ de nas de dad pa skyes te de'i lhung bzed gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' bas bkang ngo / /des de thogs te phyir byung ba bram ze'i khye'u des mthong nas smras pa/ kye rab tu byung ba re shig khyod

kyis bsod snyoms ci 'dra ba zhig grub pa lta'o/ /de ma bsams par ye shes mthong ba mi 'jug pas des bstan to/ /de nas phrag dog la mngon par zhen pa'i blo can des de'i lag par thal mos bsnun pa dang lhung bzed lhung bas kha zas

rnams sa la bo ba dang bram ze'i khye'u des rdog pas brdzis so/ /rang sangs rgyas des de la smras pa/ bzhin bzangs khyod kyis ci'i phyir kha zas rnams chud gzan/ ci ste khyod slong bar gyur na ngas byin par 'gyur ba zhig /

des rang sangs rgyas de la smad pa mang du byas nas/ slar log pa dang drang srong smra ba ri dgas kyi nags su song nas 'dug go/ /dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi bram ze gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin te/

phrag dog la mngon par zhen pa'i blo can ngas rang sangs rgyas kyi zas bcad pa byas pa gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas lo mang po zhes bya ba nas/ sems can dmyal ba rnams su btsos so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/ /

las kyi lhag ma de kho nas da ltar nga mngon par rdzogs par byang chub na yang yul sa lar zan gcad pa byas so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis phrin las ci zhig mdzad na/ phrin las de'i rnam par smin pas kun tu rgyu mo mdzes
mas yang dag pa ma lags pas skur pa btab lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan rnams su las rnams byas shing bsags pa tshogs

rnyed pa zhes bya ba nas/ 'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba skye dgu rnams kyi tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs shes bya ba'i

bar du ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de'i gsung rab la spun gnyis shig rab tu byung bar gyur te/ gnas 'jog dang / b+ha ra dwA dza zhes bya'o/ /de nas gnas 'jog gis ni brtson pa dang / 'bad pa dang / brtsal ba byas pas nyon mongs pa thams cad

spangs te/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /b+ha ra dwA dzas kyang klags shing bton pas sde snod gsum la byang bar gyur te/ sde snod gsum gyi chos kyi gtam la rigs pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa dang ldan par gyur to/ /

des ji tsam na khyim bdag gcig la bskul nas/ des de'i ched du gtsug lag khang yo byad thams cad dang ldan pa zhig rtsig tu bcug go/ /de nas des phu bo gnas 'jog la spring ba/ lhan cig 'khod kyis shog shig /des thos nas

'ongs so/ /de nas khyim bdag des spyod lam zhi ba/ lus mdzes pa/ sems dang ba de mthong ngo / /de mthong nas mngon par dad par gyur te/ de dad pa skyes nas kha zas bsod pas tshim par byas te chen po la 'os pa'i ras zung cig

bskon to/ /de nas b+ha ra dwA dza phrag dog skyes nas bdag ni 'di'i thams cad la sngon du 'gro ba yin na/ bdag la ni 'dis lan 'ga' yang ras ma byin/ 'di ni 'ongs nas ring por ma lon pa kho nar ras zung bskon no snyam nas/

de phu bo gnas 'jog la nyes pa'i glags tshol bar gyur to/ /des de tshor nas bsams pa/ 'di ni phrag dog gi rang bzhin can yin pas gal te/ bdag gis 'di la ras zung 'di ma byin par gyur na lhag par yang mi dga' ba myong bar 'gyur ro

snyam nas/ des de la byin na 'on kyang de nyes pa'i glags tshol ba lhur len cing 'dug go/ /khyim bdag de'i mngag gzhug ma bu mo zhig gtsug lag khang der song zhing byi dor gyi las byed do/ /b+har dwA dzas de la smras pa/ bu mo kho bos ras zung

'di khyod la sbyin gyis/ khyod kyis kho bo'i tshig bzhin byos shig /des smras pa/ 'phags pa bdag gis ci zhig bgyi/ khyod kho bo'i ras zung 'di gyon la khyim gyi byi dor gyi las byos shig /gal te khyim bdag gis khyod

kyi ras zung 'di ga las 'ongs shes 'dri dang / 'phags pa gnas 'jog gis bdag la stsal to zhes smros shig /gal te ci'i phyir 'dri dang / dpon po skyes pa rnams kyis bud med rnams la ci'i slad du stsol ba de yang 'dri 'am zhes smros shig /

de nas des ji skad bsgo ba bzhin du thams cad byas pa dang / de nas khyim bdag des gnas 'jog la ma dad pa bskyed pa dang bdag nyid chen po de dag ni bkur sti ma yin pas skrag pas de langs te song ngo / /dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/

de'i tshe de'i dus kyi b+ha ra dwA dza gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin te/ ngas de na dgra bcom pa la yang dag pa ma yin pas skur pa btab pa gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas lo mang po dang zhes bya ba nas/ sems can dmyal

ba rnams su btsos so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /da ltar nga mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa na yang kun tu rgyu mo mdzes mas yang dag pa ma yin par skur ba btab bo/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis phrin

las ci zhig mdzad na phrin las de'i rnam par smin pas bram ze'i bu mo rtswa mis yang dag pa ma lags pas skur pa btab lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis

sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan rnams su las rnams byas shing bsags pa thun mong dang / thun mong ma yin pa/ tshogs rnyed pa zhes bya ba nas/ 'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/ /thun mong gang

zhe na/ dge slong dag sngon byung bA rA Na sI na bram ze rig byed dang / rig byed kyi yan lag gi pha rol tu phyin pa zhig bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya la bram ze rnams kyi gsang tshig ston te/ de bA rA Na sI na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs

kyis lhag par bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ rjed cing mchod de dgra bcom par bkur ro/ /ji tsam na drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa zhig ljongs rgyu zhing song ba las bA rA Na sIr phyin pa dang / bA rA Na sI

na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs kyis lus mdzes pa dang sems dang ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang skye bo'i tshogs thams cad mngon par dad par gyur te/ gang gi sbyin pa 'am/ bya ba 'am/ 'jig rten pha rol gyi ched yod pa gang

yin pa de de la byed do/ /de nas bram ze de'i rnyed pa dang bkur sti nub par gyur nas/ drang srong de la phrag dog skyes nas phrag dog la mngon par zhen pa'i blos bram ze'i khye'u rnams la smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u

dag 'di ni drang srong ma yin te/ 'on kyang 'di ni 'dod pa la longs spyod pa yin no/ /de rnams kyis smras pa/ mkhan po de de bzhin te/ 'di ni 'dod pa la longs spyod pa lags kyis 'di ni drang srong ma lags so/ /de nas de rnams

kyis lam po che dang / tshong 'dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnams su bram ze dang khyim bdag gi khyim rnams su smras pa/ 'di ni drang srong ma yin te/ 'on kyang 'dod pa la longs spyod pa yin no/ /skye bo'i tshogs

chen pos thos nas ma dad pa bskyed pa dang / de bkur sti ma yin pas skrag nas bA rA Na sIr song ngo / /dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi bram ze gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/ /

bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya po gang yin pa de dag ni dge slong lnga brgya po 'di dag yin no/ /ngas drang srong la yang dag pa ma yin pas skur pa btab pa gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pa zhes bya ba nas/ sems
can dmyal ba rnams su btsos so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /las kyi lhag ma de kho nas da ltar mngon par rdzogs par byang chub na yang dge slong lnga brgya dang / thabs gcig la bram ze'i
bu mo rtswa mis yang dag pa ma yin pas skur ba btab ste/ de ni thun mong zhes bya'o// //
zhwa dmar cod pan 'dzin pa bzhi pa spyan snga thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyan sngar gtugs te/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen stod lung pa chen po'i thugs dam dang bstun nas dag par byas pa'o/ /
